[03] atha vattamānādīnaṃ vacanatthaṃ kathayāma -- tattha ^b^vattamānā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena vattamānā? vattamānakālavacanaṭṭhena. paccuppannabhāvena hi vattatīti vattamāno, paccuppannakriyāsaṅkhāto kālo. tabbācakavasena vattamāno kālo etissā atthīti ayaṃ ^b^ti anti^eb^ādivibhatti vattamānā. tathā ^a^M0.0080^ea^ hi ``gacchati devadatto''ti ettha devadattassa paccuppannaṃ gamanakriyaṃ vibhattibhūto ^b^ti^eb^saddoyeva vadati, tasmā tabbācakavasena vattamāno kālo etissā atthīti vattamānāti vuccati. ^b^pañcamī^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena pañcamī? pañcamaṃ vattamānaṭṭhānaṃ gamanaṭṭhena, pañcannañca saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇaṭṭhena. tathā hi niyogā atītānāgatapaccuppannakālikānaṃ parokkhāhiyyattanajjatanībhavissantīvattamānāsaṅkhātānaṃ pañcannaṃ vibhattīnamantare pañcamībhūtāya vattamānāya sayampi paccuppannakālikabhāvena samānaṭṭhānattā pañcamaṃ vattamānaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatīti pañcamī. yathā nadantī gacchatīti nadī. tathā niyogā atītānāgatakālikā parokkhāhiyyattanajjatanībhavissantīsaṅkhātā catasso vibhattiyo upādāya sayampi vattamānāvibhatti viya pañcannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇīti pañcamī. ^b^sattamī^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena sattamī? sattannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇaṭṭhena. tathā hi atītānāgatapaccuppannakālikā parokkhāhiyyattanajjatanībhavissantīvattamānāpañcamīsaṅkhātā cha vibhattiyo upādāya sayampi paccuppannakālikā hutvā sattannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇīti sattamī.

[03] ^b^parokkhā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena parokkhā? parokkhe bhavāti atthena. tathā hi cakkhādindriyasaṅkhātassa akkhassa paro tirobhāvo parokkhaṃ, tabbācakabhāvena parokkhe bhavāti parokkhā. ^b^hiyyattanī^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena hiyyattanī? hiyyo pabhuti atīte kāle bhavā tabbācakabhāvenāti atthena. ^b^ajjatanī^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena ajjatanī? ajja pabhuti atīte kāle bhavā tabbācakabhāvenāti atthena. ^b^bhavissantī^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena bhavissantī? ``evaṃ anāgate bhavissatī''ti atthaṃ pakāsentī eti gacchatīti atthena. ^b^kālātipattī^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena kālātipatti? kālassātipatanavacanaṭṭhena. tathā hi kālassa atipatanaṃ accayo atikkamitvā pavatti kālātipatti, labhitabbassa atthassa nipphattirahitaṃ kriyātikkamanaṃ ^a^M0.0081^ea^. ^b^kālo^eb^ti cettha kriyā adhippetā. karaṇaṃ kāro, kāro eva kālo ^b^ra^eb^kārassa ^b^la^eb^kāraṃ katvā uccāraṇavasena. ayaṃ pana vibhatti tabbācakattā kālātipattīti. ayaṃ pana vattamānādīnaṃ vacanatthavibhāvanā.
[06] iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
[22] tadevaṃ nāmikaṃ ñe yyaṃ, saliṅgaṃ savibhattikaṃ..

[03] idamettha niruttilakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ -- paccattavacane paṭhamā vibhatti bhavati, upayogavacane dutiyā vibhatti bhavati, karaṇavacane tatiyā vibhatti bhavati, sampadānavacane catutthī vibhatti bhavati, nissakkavacane pañcamī vibhatti bhavati, sāmivacane chaṭṭhī vibhatti bhavati, bhummavacane sattamī vibhatti bhavati, āmantanavacane aṭṭhamī vibhatti bhavati. tatruddānaṃ --

[03] tatra ^a^M0.0083^ea^ ^b^paccattavacanaṃ^eb^ nāma tividhaliṅgavavatthānagatānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsakānaṃ paccattasabhāvaniddesattho. ^b^upayogavacanaṃ^eb^ nāma yo yaṃ karoti, tena tadupayuttaparidīpanattho. ^b^karaṇavacanaṃ^eb^ nāma tajjāpakatanibbattakaparidīpanattho. ^b^sampadānavacanaṃ^eb^ nāma tappadānaparidīpanattho. ^b^nissakkavacanaṃ^eb^ nāma tannissaṭatadapagamaparidīpanattho. ^b^sāmivacanaṃ^eb^ nāma tadissaraparidīpanattho. ^b^bhummavacanaṃ^eb^ nāma tappatiṭṭhāparidīpanattho. ^b^āmantanavacanaṃ^eb^ nāma tadāmantanaparidīpanattho. evaṃ ñatvā payogāni asammuyhantena yojetabbāni.

[03] ye pana ``yo dhammo bhūto, yā dhammajāti bhūtā, yaṃ dhammajātaṃ bhūta''nti evaṃ liṅgattaye yojanārahattā aniyataliṅgā aññepi ^b^bhūtaparābhūtasambhūta^eb^saddādayo sandissanti pāvacanavare, tepi nānopasagganipātapadehi yojanavasena saddaracanāyaṃ sukhumatthaggahaṇe ca viññūnaṃ kosallajananatthaṃ niyatapulliṅgesu pakkhipitvā dassessāma.

[21] bindu, i, u-ime antā, tayo ñeyyā vibhāvinā.
[21] antā satteva pulliṅge, itthiyaṃ pañca vā cha vā.
[22] napuṃsake tayo evaṃ, dasa pañcahi chabbidhā..

[03] yasmā panettha ``bhūto''tiādayo saddā nibbacanābhidheyyakathanatthasādhakavacanapariyāyavacanatthuddhāravasena vuccamānā pākaṭā honti suviññeyyā ca, tasmā imesaṃ nibbacanādīni yathāsambhavaṃ vakkhāma viññūnaṃ tuṭṭhijananatthañceva sotārānamatthesu paṭutarabuddhipaṭilābhāya ca. tatra ^b^bhūto^eb^ti khandhapātubhāvena bhavatīti bhūto, idaṃ tāva nibbacanaṃ. ``bhūto''ti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena satto vuccati, idamabhidheyyakathanaṃ. ``yo ca kālaghaso bhūto. sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya''nti ca idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṃ. atha vā ^b^bhūto^eb^ti evaṃnāmako amanussajātiyo sattaviseso, idamabhidheyyakathanaṃ. ``bhūtavijjā, bhūtavejjo, bhūtaviggahito''ti ca idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṃ. yañca pana ``satto macco pajā''tiādikaṃ tattha tattha āgataṃ vacanaṃ, idaṃ sattoti ^a^M0.0088^ea^ atthavācakassa ^b^bhūta^eb^saddassa pariyāyavacanaṃ. yañca ^b^niddesapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``maccoti satto naro mānavo poso puggalo jīvo jagu jantu hindagu manujo''ti āgataṃ, idampi pariyāyavacanameva. tāni sabbāni piṇḍetvā vuccante --
[21] satto macco jano bhūto, pāṇo hindagu puggalo.
[22] jantu jīvo jagu yakkho, pāṇī dehī tathāgato..
[21] sattavo mātiyo loko, manujo mānavo naro.
[21] pajāti itthiyaṃ vutto, liṅgato, na ca atthato.
[21] yo so jaṅghāya ulati, so satto jaṅghalo idha.

[03] imasmiṃ pakaraṇe ``pariyāyavacana''nti ca ``abhidhāna''nti ca ``saṅkhā''tiādīni ca ekatthāni adhippetāni, atthuddhāravasena pana ^b^bhūta^eb^saddo pañcakkhandhāmanussadhātusassatavijjamānakhīṇāsavasattarukkhādīsu dissati, tappayogo upari atthattikavibhāge āvibhavissati. ^b^bhāvako^eb^ti bhāvetīti bhāvako, idaṃ nibbacanaṃ. yo bhāvanaṃ karoti, so bhāvako. idamabhidheyyakathanaṃ. ``bhāvako nipako dhīro''ti idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṃ. ``bhāvako bhāvanāpasuto bhāvanāpayutto bhāvanāsampanno''ti idaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ. imāni ``bhūto bhāvako''ti dve padāni suddhakattuhetukattuvasena vuttānīti. ito paraṃ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā ``idaṃ nibbacana''nti ca ādīni ^a^M0.0089^ea^ avatvā katthaci atthasādhakavacanaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ atthuddhārañca yathārahaṃ dassessāma. tesu hi sabbattha dassitesu ganthavitthāro siyā, tasmā yesamattho uttāno, tesampi padānamabhidheyyaṃ na kathessāma, nibbacanamattameva nesaṃ kathessāma. yesaṃ pana gambhīro attho, tesamabhidheyyaṃ kathessāma.

[03] bhavanaṃ ^b^bhavo,^eb^ bhavo vuccati vuddhi. ^b^bhū^eb^saddassa atthātisayayogato vaḍḍhanepi dissamānattā bhavanaṃ vaḍḍhananti katvā. ``bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño''ti idaṃ vuddhiatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. atha vā bhavoti vuccati sassataṃ. ``sassato attā ca loko cā''ti hi sassatavasena pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi, tasmā bhavadiṭṭhī''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. tathā bhavoti bhavadiṭṭhi, bhavati sassataṃ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhi nāma. bhavadiṭṭhi hi uttarapadalopena bhavoti vuccati. ``bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṃsū''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. etthāyaṃ pāḷivacanattho -- ekacce samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavadiṭṭhiyā vā kāmabhavādinā vā sabbabhavato vimuttiṃ saṃsāravisuddhiṃ kathayiṃsūti. atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti bhavoti atthena sampattipuññāni bhavoti ca vuccanti. ``itibhavābhavatañca vītivatto''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ettha panāyaṃ pāḷivacanattho -- ^b^bhavo^eb^ti sampatti, ^b^abhavo^eb^ti vipatti. tathā bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. bhavoti sassataṃ, abhavoti ucchedo. bhavoti puññaṃ, abhavoti pāpaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ vītivattoti.

[03] sahokāsā ^a^M0.0090^ea^ khandhāpi bhavo. ``kāmabhavo rūpabhavo'' iccevamādi etassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ettha pana khandhā ``yo paññāyati, so sarūpaṃ labhatī''ti katvā ``bhavati avijjātaṇhādisamudayā nirantaraṃ samudetī''ti atthena vā ``bhavā''ti vuccanti. okāso pana ``bhavanti jāyanti ettha sattā nāmarūpadhammā cā''ti atthena ``bhavo''ti. apica kammabhavopi bhavo, upapattibhavopi bhavo. ``upādānapaccayā bhavo duvidhena atthi kammabhavo, atthi upapattibhavo''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. tattha kammameva bhavo kammabhavo. tathā upapatti eva bhavo upapattibhavo. etthūpapatti bhavatīti bhavo, kammaṃ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā ``sukho buddhānamuppādo''ti vutto. evaṃ bhavakāraṇattā phalavohārena bhavoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. atha vā bhāvanalakkhaṇattā bhāvetīti bhavo. kiṃ bhāveti? upapattiṃ. iti upapattiṃ bhāvetīti bhavoti vuccati. bhāvetītimassa ca nibbattetīti hetukattuvasenattho. atha vā ``bhavapaccayā jātī''ti vacanato bhavati etenāti bhavoti kammabhavo vuccati.

[07] vuttalakkhaṇo saṃsāropi bhavo. ``bhave dukkhaṃ bhavadukkhaṃ, bhave saṃsaranto''ti imānetassatthassa sādhakāni vacanāni. tatra kenaṭṭhena saṃsāro bhavoti kathīyati? bhavati ettha sattasammuti khandhādipaṭipāṭisaṅkhāte dhammapuñjasminti atthena ^a^M0.0091^ea^. idaṃ ^b^bhava^eb^saddassa bhāvakattukaraṇādhikaraṇasādhanavasenatthakathanaṃ.

[03] ^b^bhāvo^eb^ti ajjhāsayo, yo ``adhippāyo''tipi vuccati. ``thīnaṃbhāvo durājāno. nāmacco rājabhariyāsu, bhāvaṃ kubbetha paṇḍito. hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetī''ti evamādi etassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. apica vatthudhammopi bhāvo. ``bhāvasaṅketasiddhīna''nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ, cittampi bhāvo. ``accāhitaṃ kammaṃ karosi luddaṃ, bhāve ca te kusalaṃ natthi kiñcī''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. kriyāpibhāvo. ``bhāvalakkhaṇaṃ bhāvasattamī''ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. apica bhāvoti sattavevacananti bhaṇanti, dhātu vā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. tattha ajjhāsayo ca vatthudhammo ca cittañca satto cāti ime bhavatīti bhāvo. tathā pana bhāvetīti bhāvo, kriyā ^a^M0.0092^ea^ tu bhavananti bhāvo. sā ca bhavanagamanapacanādivasenānekavidhā. apica bhāvarūpampi bhāvo, yaṃ itthibhāvo pumbhāvo itthindriyanti ca vuccati. tatrāyaṃ vacanattho -- ``itthī''ti vā ``puriso''ti vā bhavati etena cittaṃ abhidhānañcāti bhāvo.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi ``itthiyā bhāvo itthibhāvo, itthīti vā bhavati etena cittaṃ abhidhānañcāti itthibhāvo''ti, tasmā pumbhāvoti etthāpi pumassa bhāvo pumbhāvo, pumāti vā bhavati etena cittaṃ abhidhānañcāti pumbhāvoti nibbacanaṃ samadhigantabbaṃ. idaṃ ^b^bhāva^eb^saddassa kattubhāvakaraṇasādhanavasenatthakathanaṃ.

[03] ^b^abhāvo^eb^ti na bhāvoti abhāvo, ko so? suññatā natthitā. ^b^sabhāvo^eb^ti attano bhāvo sabhāvo, attano pakati iccevattho. atha vā sabhāvoti dhammānaṃ sati atthasambhave yo koci sarūpaṃ labhati, tassa bhāvo lakkhaṇamiti saññito namanaruppanakakkhaḷaphusanādiākāro iccevattho. ``sāmaññaṃ vā sabhāvo vā, dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ mata''nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. apica sabhāvoti salakkhaṇo paramatthadhammo. kenaṭṭhena? saha bhāvenāti atthena. ^b^sabbhāvo^eb^ti sataṃ bhāvo sabbhāvo, sappurisadhammo iccevattho. atha vā attano bhāvo sabbhāvo. ``gāhāpayanti sabbhāva''nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. saṃvijjamāno vā bhāvo sabbhāvo. ``evaṃ gahaṇasabbhāvo''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ ^a^M0.0093^ea^ vacanaṃ. idaṃ ^b^sabhāva sabbhāva^eb^saddānaṃ bhāvasādhanavasenatthakathanaṃ.

[03] ^b^sambhavo^eb^ti sambhavanaṃ sambhavo, sambhavanakriyā, yutti vā. yutti hi sambhavoti vuccati ``sambhavo gahaṇassa kāraṇa''ntiādīsu. atha vā sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo. yato hi yaṃ kiñci sambhavati, so sambhavo. ^b^pabhavo^eb^ti pabhavanaṃ pabhavo, acchinnatā, pabhavati etasmāti vā pabhavo. yato hi yaṃ kiñci pabhavati, so pabhavo. ime pana ^b^sambhavapabhava^eb^saddā katthaci samānatthā katthaci bhinnatthāti veditabbā. kathaṃ? ^b^sambhava^eb^saddo hi bhavanakriyampi vadati yuttimpi paññattimpi sambhavarūpampi paccayatthampi, ^b^pabhava^eb^saddo pana bhavanakriyampi vadati nadippabhavampi paccayatthampi, tasmā paccayatthaṃ vajjetvā bhinnatthāti gahetabbā, paccayatthena pana samānatthāti gahetabbā. vuttañhetaṃ ``paccayo hetu nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ sambhavo pabhavotiādi atthato ekaṃ, byañjanato nāna''nti.
[07] ayampi gāthā etassatthassa sādhikā. idaṃ ^b^sambhavapabhava^eb^saddānaṃ bhāvāpādānasādhanavasenatthakathanaṃ.

[03] evamettha bhāvakattukammakaraṇāpādānādhikaraṇavasena cha sādhanāni pakāsitāni. tāni sampadānasādhanena sattavidhāni bhavanti, taṃ pana uttari āvibhavissati ``dhanamassa bhavatūti dhanabhūtī''tiādinā. iccevaṃ kitakavasena sabbathāpi sattavidhāni sādhanāni honti, yāni ``kārakānī''tipi vuccati, ito aññaṃ sādhanaṃ natthi. idha payogesvatthesu ca viññūnaṃ ^a^M0.0094^ea^ pāṭavatthaṃ sādhananāmaṃ pakāsitaṃ. tathā hi dunnikkhittasādhanehi padehi yojitā saddappayogā dubbodhatthā honti, sunikkhittasādhanehi pana padehi yojitā subodhatthā honti, tasmā payogāsādhanamūlakā, attho ca payogamūlako. payogānurūpañhi aviparītaṃ katvā atthaṃ kathanasīlā ``yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito''ti evamādīsu sādhanavasena gahetabbesu atthesu, aññesu catthesu paṭutarabuddhino paṇḍitāyeva ekantena bhagavato pariyattisāsanadharā nāma hontīti veditabbaṃ. ito paraṃ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā ``idaṃ nāma sādhana''nti na vakkhāma, kevalamidha dassitesu payogesu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthañceva vividhavicittapāḷigatike vividhatthasāre jinavaravacane sotūnaṃ buddhivijambhanatthañca atthasādhakavacanāniyeva yathārahaṃ suttageyyaveyyākaraṇagāthādīsu tato tato āharitvā dassessāma.

[03] ^b^pabhāvo^eb^ti pakārato bhavatīti pabhāvo, soyamānubhāvoyeva. ``pabhāvaṃ te na passāmi, yena tvaṃ mithilaṃ vaje''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^anubhavo^eb^ti anubhavanaṃ anubhavo, kiṃ taṃ? paribhuñjanaṃ. ^b^ānubhāvo^eb^ti tejussāhamantapabhūsattiyo. ``tejasaṅkhato ussāhamantapabhūsattisaṅkhāto vā mahanto ānubhāvo etassāti mahānubhāvo''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
[22] ānubhāvāti vuccanti, pabhāvāti ca te vade..

[03] atha ^a^M0.0095^ea^ vā ^b^ānubhāvo^eb^ti anubhavitabbaphalaṃ. ``anubhavitabbassa phalassa mahantatāya mahānubhāvo''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^parābhavo^eb^ti parābhavanaṃ parābhavo, atha vā parābhavatīti parābhavo. ``suvijāno parābhavo''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. apica ``dhammadessī parābhavo''ti pāṭhānurūpato parābhavissatīti parābhavoti anāgatakālavasenapi nibbacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. atha vā parābhavanti etenāti parābhavo. kiṃ taṃ? dhammadessitādi. ``paṭhamo so parābhavo''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^vibhavo^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. tañhi bhavato vigatattā bhavato vigatoti vibhavo, bhavassa ca taṃhetu vigatattā vigato bhavo etasmāti vibhavo. vibhavanti ucchijjanti vinassanti ito ariyadhanavilomakā kilesamahācorātipi vibhavo. ^b^vibhava^eb^saddassa nibbānābhidhānatte ``evaṃ bhave vijjamāne, vibhavo icchitabbako''ti idamettha sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. imāni pana nibbānassa pariyāyavacanāni --
[21] nibbānaṃ vibhavo mokkho, nirodho amataṃ samaṃ.
[22] santi asaṅkhatā dhātu, disā ca sabbatopabhaṃ..

[03] ^b^vibhavo^eb^ti vā vināsasampattidhanucchedadiṭṭhiyopi vuccanti. tattha vināso vibhavanaṃ ucchijjanaṃ nassananti atthena vibhavo. ``vibhavo sabbadhammānaṃ, ittheke sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapentī''ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. sampatti pana visesato bhavatīti vibhavo. ``rañño sirivibhavaṃ daṭṭhukāmā''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. dhanaṃ pana bhavanti vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti sattā etenāti vibhavo. ``asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbattī''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. idaṃ pana pariyāyavacanaṃ --
[21] dhanaṃ saṃ vibhavo dabbaṃ, sāpateyyaṃ pariggaho.
[22] oḍḍaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sakaṃ attho, iccete dhanavācakā..

[03] ucchedadiṭṭhi pana vibhavati ucchijjati ``attā ca loko ca puna cutito uddhaṃ na jāyatī''ti gahaṇato vibhavoti. ``vibhavataṇhā''ti ^a^M0.0097^ea^ idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. vibhavataṇhāti hi ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya taṇhāya nāmaṃ. ettha atthuddhāro vuccati --

[03] ^b^pātubhāvo^eb^ti pātubhavanaṃ pātubhāvo. ^b^āvibhāvo^eb^ti āvibhavanaṃ āvibhāvo, ubhinnametesaṃ pākaṭatā iccevattho. ^b^tirobhāvo^eb^ti tirobhavanaṃ tirobhāvo, paṭicchannabhāvo. ^b^vinābhāvo^eb^ti vinābhavanaṃ vinābhāvo, viyogo. ^b^sotthibhāvo^eb^ti sotthibhavanaṃ sotthibhāvo, suvatthibhāvo sukhassa atthitā, atthato pana nibbhayatā nirupaddavatā eva. ^b^atthibhāvo^eb^ti atthitā vijjamānatā avivittatā. ^b^natthibhāvo^eb^ti natthitā avijjamānatā vivittatā rittatā tucchatā suññatā. ^b^o^eb^kārantapulliṅganiddeso.

[03] abhibhavatīti ^b^abhibhavitā,^eb^ paraṃ abhibhavanto yo koci. evaṃ ^b^paribhavitā,^eb^ anubhavatīti ^b^anubhavitā,^eb^ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā anubhavanto yo koci. evaṃ ^b^samanubhavitā. paccanubhavitā,^eb^ ettha pana yathā ``amatassa dātā. anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā''tiādīsu ``dātā''ti padānaṃ kattuvācakānaṃ ``amatassā''tiādīhi padehi kammavācakehi chaṭṭhiyantehi saddhiṃ yojanā dissati, tathā imesampi padānaṃ ``paccāmittassa abhibhavitā''tiādinā yojanā kātabbā. evaṃ aññesampi evarūpānaṃ padānaṃ. ^b^ā^eb^kārantapulliṅganiddeso.

[03] bhavatīti ^b^bhavaṃ^eb^. bhavissatīti vā bhavaṃ, vaḍḍhamāno puggalo. ``suvijāno bhavaṃ hoti, suvijāno parābhavo. dhammakāmo ^a^M0.0098^ea^ bhavaṃ hoti, dhammadessī parābhavo''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. atha vā yena saddhiṃ katheti, so ``bhava''nti vattabbo, ``bhavaṃ kaccāyano. bhavaṃ ānando. maññe bhavaṃ patthayati, rañño bhariyaṃ patibbata''ntiādīsu. ettha pana dhātuatthe ādaro na kātabbo, sammutiattheyevādaro kātabbo ``saṅketavacanaṃ saccaṃ, lokasammutikāraṇa''nti vacanato. vohāravisayasmiñhi lokasammuti eva padhānā avilaṅghanīyā. parābhavatīti ^b^parābhavaṃ^eb^. evaṃ ^b^paribhavaṃ. abhibhavaṃ. anubhavaṃ^eb^. pabhavati pahoti sakkotīti ^b^pabhavaṃ,^eb^ pahonto yo koci. ^b^na^eb^ pabhavaṃ appabhavaṃ, ``appabhava''nti ca idaṃ jātake diṭṭhaṃ --
[22] sohaṃ appabhavaṃ tattha, sākhaṃ hatthehi aggahi''nti

[03] ^b^dhanabhūtī^eb^ti dhanamassa bhavatūti dhanabhūti. ^b^siribhūtī^eb^ti sobhāya ceva paññāpuññānañca adhivacanaṃ. sā assa bhavatūti siribhūti. evaṃ ^b^sotthibhūti, suvatthibhūti. i^eb^kārantapulliṅganiddeso.

[03] ^b^bhāvī^eb^ti bhavanasīlo bhāvī, bhavanadhammo bhāvī, bhavane sādhukārī bhāvī. evaṃ ^b^vibhāvī. sambhāvī. paribhāvī^eb^ti. tatra ^b^vibhāvī^eb^ti atthavibhāvane samattho paṇḍito vuccati. ettha vidvā, vijjāgato, ñāṇītiādi pariyāyavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. bhavanti catra --
[21] vidvā vijjāgato ñāṇī, vibhāvī paṇḍito sudhī.
[22] budho visārado viññū, dosaññū viddasu vidū..
[21] vipassī ^a^M0.0099^ea^ paṭibhāṇī ca, medhāvī nipako kavi.
[22] kusalo viduro dhīmā, gatimā mutimā cayaṃ..
[21] cakkhumā kaṇṇavā dabbo, dhīro bhūri vicakkhaṇo.
[03] ^b^sayambhū^eb^ti sayameva bhavatīti sayambhū. ko so? antarena paropadesaṃ sāmaṃyeva sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sabbaññutaṃ patto sakyamuni bhagavā. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --
[21] ``na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
[21] ahañhi arahā loke, ahaṃ satthā anuttaro.

[03] atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vigataviddhastaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro khandhasantāno sayambhū. so evaṃbhūto khandhasantāno loke aggapuggaloti vuccati. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ``ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso, katamo ekapuggalo? tathāgato bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho''ti. so ekapuggalo etarahi ``sabbaññū, sugato''tiādīhi yathābhuccaguṇādhigatanāmehi ca pasiddho, ``gotamo ādiccabandhū''ti gottato ca pasiddho, sakyaputto sakko sakyamuni sakyasīho sakyapuṅgavoti kulato ca pasiddho, suddhodanimāyādevīsutoti ^a^M0.0100^ea^ mātāpitito ca pasiddho, siddhatthoti gahitanāmena ca pasiddho. bhavanti catra --
[21] yo ekapuggalo āsi, buddho so vadataṃ varo.
[22] sakko iti ca avhito, tathā sakyamunīti ca..
[21] sammāsambuddho iti so, ñāto sattuttamoti ca.
[22] nāmaṃ guṇehi nissitaṃ, ko kavindo kathessati..
[03] tathā ^a^M0.0102^ea^ hi satthavāho naravaro chaḷabhiññoti evaṃpakārāni abhidhānapadāni visesakapadāpekkhakāni. kathaṃ?
[07] ``chaḷabhiññassa sāsana''nti ca evaṃ visesakapadāpekkhakāni bhavanti. buddho jino bhagavāti evaṃpakārāni pana no visesakāpekkhānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] keci panettha evaṃ vadeyyuṃ ``munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhūti evaṃpakārānaṃ idha vuttānamabhidhānānaṃ visesatthābhāvato punaruttidoso atthī''ti. tanna, abhidhānānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇīyānabhisaṅkharaṇīyavasena abhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānānīti dvedhā dissanato. tathā hi katthaci keci ``sakyasīho''ti abhidhānaṃ paṭicca ``sakyakesarī sakyamigādhipo''tiādinā nānāvividhamabhidhānamabhisaṅkharonti, pāvacanepi hi ``dviduggamavarahanutta'malatthā''ti pāṭho dissati. tathā keci ``dhammarājā''ti abhidhānaṃ paṭicca ``dhammadisampatī''tiādīni abhisaṅkharonti. ``sabbaññū''ti abhidhānaṃ paṭicca ``sabbadassāvī sabbadassī''tiādīni abhisaṅkharonti, ``sahassakkho''ti abhidhānaṃ paṭicca ``dasasatalocano''tiādīni abhisaṅkharonti. ``ādiccabandhū''ti abhidhānaṃ paṭicca ``aravindasahāyabandhū''tiādīni abhisaṅkharonti. ``ambuja''nti abhidhānaṃ paṭicca ``nīrajaṃ kuñja''ntiādīni abhisaṅkharonti. pāvacanepi hi ^a^M0.0103^ea^ yaṃ padumaṃ, taṃ jalajaṃ nāmāti mantvā paṭisambhidāppattehi ariyehi desanāvilāsavasena vutto ``padumuttaranāmino''ti vattabbaṭṭhāne ``jalajuttaranāmino''ti pāṭho dissati. evaṃ abhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni dissanti.

[03] ``buddho bhagavā''ti abhidhānāni pana anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni. vuttañhetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā ^b^sāriputtena^eb^ ``buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ, na pitarā kataṃ, na bhaginiyā kataṃ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṃ, na devatāhi kataṃ, vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho''ti, tathā ``bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ bhagavā''ti. evaṃ ``buddho bhagavā''ti abhidhānāni anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni. na hi tāni abhidhānāni ceva ``satthā sugato jino''tiādīni ca aññaṃ kiñci abhidhānaṃ paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni, nāpi aññāni abhidhānāni etāni paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni dissanti. tathā hi ``buddho''ti abhidhānaṃ paṭicca ``bujjhitā bodhetā bodhako''tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni na abhisaṅkharonti. tathā ``bhagavā satthā sugato''tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni paṭicca ``sampannabhago anusāsako sundaravacano''tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni nābhisaṅkharonti. evaṃ imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ ``munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhū''tiādinā nayena punarutti amhehi katāti daṭṭhabbā. evamaññatrāpi nayo netabbo. atridaṃ vuccati --
[22] dviduggamavaro buddho, iti nāmaṃ dvidhā bhave''ti..

[03] ^b^pabhū^eb^ti paraṃ pasayha bhavatīti pabhū, issaro. ``araññassa pabhū ayaṃ luddako''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^abhibhū^eb^ti ^a^M0.0104^ea^ abhibhavatīti abhibhū, asaññasatto. kiṃ so abhibhavi? cattāro khandhe arūpino. iti cattāro khandhe arūpino abhibhavīti abhibhū. so ca kho niccetanattā abhibhavanakriyāyāsati pubbevā'saññuppattito jhānalābhikāle attanā adhigatapañcamajjhānaṃ saññāvirāgavasena bhāvetvā cattāro arūpakkhandhe asaññibhave appavattikaraṇena abhibhavitumārabhi, tadabhibhavanakiccaṃ idāni siddhanti abhibhavīti abhibhūti vuccati. apica niccetanabhāvena abhibhavanabyāpāre asatipi pubbe sacetanakāle sabyāpārattā sacetanassa viya niccetanassāpi sato tassa upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṃ yujjateva. dissati hi loke sāsane ca sacetanassa viya acetanassapi upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṃ. taṃ yathā? kūlaṃ patitukāmaṃ, evaṃ loke. sāsane pana --

[07] ``aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāyā''ti ca ``phalaṃ toseti kassaka''nti ca ādi. ^b^abhibhū^eb^saddassa asaññasattābhidhānatte ``abhibhuṃ abhibhuto maññatī''ti idamettha sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. atha vā abhibhavatīti abhibhū, paresamabhibhavitā yo koci. visesato pana tathāgatoyeva abhibhū. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ``tathāgato bhikkhave abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī''ti. keci pana ``abhibhū nāma sahasso brahmā''ti vadanti.

[03] ^b^vibhū^eb^ti visesabhūtoti vibhū, ``bhavasotaṃ sace buddho, tiṇṇo lokantagū vibhū''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ ^a^M0.0105^ea^ vacanaṃ. ^b^vibhū^eb^ti hettha rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā visesabhūtoti attho. āha ca --
[22] dhārento brāhmaṇaṃ vaṇṇaṃ, bhikkhāya maṃ upāgamī''ti --

[07] idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^patibhū^eb^ti patibhūtoti patibhū, ``goṇassa patibhū''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^gotrabhū^eb^ti gottasaṅkhātaṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhūtoti gotrabhū, sotāpattimaggassa anantarapaccayena sikhāppattabalavavipassanācittena samannāgato puggalo. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ``katamo ca puggalo gotrabhū? yesaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti, tehi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo gotrabhū''ti, idamevettha atthasādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. apica samaṇoti gottamattamanubhavamāno kāsāvakaṇṭhasamaṇopi gotrabhū. so hi ``samaṇo''ti gottamattaṃ anubhavati vindati, na samaṇadhamme attani avijjamānattāti ``gotrabhū''ti vuccati, ``bhavissanti kho panānanda anāgatamaddhānaṃ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^vatrabhū^eb^ti sakko. so hi mātāpitibharaṇādīhi sattahi vattehi sakkattaṃ labhitvā aññe deve vattena abhibhavatīti vatrabhū. ^b^āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumhi labbhamānaṃ pattiatthampi gahetvā ``vattena aññe abhibhavitvā devissariyaṃ pattoti vatrabhū''ti ^a^M0.0106^ea^ vuttaṃ, ``vatranāmakaṃ vā asuraṃ abhibhavatīti vatrabhū''ti ca, ``vatrabhū jayataṃpitā''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ettha hi ^b^vatrabhū^eb^ti vatranāmakassa asurassa abhibhavitā. ^b^jayataṃ pitā^eb^ti jayantānaṃ pitā. ``sakko indo purindado'' iccādi pariyāyavacanaṃ. idaṃ tu dhātādhikāre pakāsessāma. ^b^parābhibhū^eb^ti paramabhibhavatīti parābhibhū. evaṃ ^b^rūpābhibhū^eb^tiādīsupi. ^b^sabbābhibhū^eb^ti sabbamabhibhavitabbaṃ abhibhavatīti sabbābhibhū. sabbābhibhūti ca idaṃ nāmaṃ tathāgatasseva yujjati. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --

[03] idāni aniyataliṅgānaṃ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ ^b^bhūtaparābhūta sambhūta^eb^saddādīnaṃ niddeso vuccati. tatra ^b^bhūto^eb^ti attano paccayehi abhavīti bhūto, bhūtoti jāto sañjāto nibbatto abhinibbatto pātubhūto, bhūtoti vā laddhasarūpo yo koci saviññāṇako vā aviññāṇako vā. atha vā tathākārena bhavatīti bhūto, bhūtoti sacco tatho avitatho aviparīto yo koci, ettha yo ^b^bhūta^eb^saddo saccattho, tassa ``bhūtaṭṭho''ti idamettha sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^parābhūto^eb^ti parābhavīti parābhūto. suṭṭhu bhūtoti ^b^sambhūto^eb^. visesena bhūtoti ^b^vibhūto^eb^. vissuto bhūtoti vā vibhūto, ``vibhūtārammaṇa''nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. vibhavīti vā ^b^vibhūto,^eb^ vinaṭṭhoti attho, ``rūpe vibhūte na phusanti phassā''ti ^a^M0.0107^ea^ idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. pākaṭo bhūtoti ^b^pātubhūto^eb^. āvi bhavatīti ^b^āvibhūto^eb^. evaṃ ^b^tirobhūto. vinābhūto^eb^. bhavitumanucchavikoti ^b^bhabbo^eb^. paribhaviyate soti ^b^paribhūto^eb^. yena kenaci yo pīḷito hīḷito vā, so paribhūto. gamyamānattho yathākāmacārī. abhibhaviyyate soti ^b^abhibhūto^eb^. adhibhaviyate soti ^b^adhibhūto^eb^. evaṃ ^b^addhabhūto^eb^. ettha ^b^adhi^eb^saddena samānattho ^b^addha^eb^saddo, ``cakkhu bhikkhave addhabhūtaṃ, rūpā addhabhūtā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ addhabhūta''nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ, tathā ``idha bhikkhave bhikkhu na heva anaddhabhūtaṃ attānaṃ na addhabhāvetī''ti padampi. tattha ^b^anaddhabhūta^eb^nti dukkhena anadhibhūtaṃ. dukkhena anadhibhūto nāma manussattabhāvo vuccati, taṃ na addhabhāveti nābhibhavatīti suttapadattho.

[03] anubhaviyate soti ^b^anubhūto^eb^. evaṃ ^b^samanubhūto. paccanubhūto. bhāvito^eb^. ettha bhāvitoti iminā samānādhikaraṇaṃ ``satisambojjhaṅgo kho kassapa mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito''tiādīsu guṇīvācakaṃ padhānapadaṃ sāsane daṭṭhabbaṃ. titthiyasamaye pana bhāvitoti kāmaguṇo vuccati. vuttañhetaṃ ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``na bhāvitamāsīsatī''ti. tatra bhāvitā nāma pañca kāmaguṇā, te na āsīsati na sevatīti suttapadattho. sambhāviyate soti ^b^sambhāvito^eb^. evaṃ ^b^vibhāvito. paribhāvito. anuparibhūto. manaṃparibhūto^eb^ti manaṃ paribhaviyittha soti manaṃparibhūto. ettha ^b^manaṃparibhūto^eb^ti īsakaṃ appattaparibhavano vuccati. ^b^mana^eb^nti hi nipātapadaṃ. ``atipaṇḍitena puttena, manamhi upakūlito, devadattena attano abuddhabhāvena ceva khantimettādīnañca ^a^M0.0108^ea^ abhāvena kumārakassapatthero ca therī ca manaṃ nāsito, manaṃ vuḷho ahosī''tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo. atra ^b^manaṃ^eb^saddassa kiñci yuttiṃ vadāma.
[22] santaṃ tassa manaṃ hoti, manamhi upakūlitoti..

[03] ^b^paribhavitabbo^eb^ti aññena paribhavituṃ sakkuṇeyyoti paribhavitabbo. evaṃ ^b^paribhottabbo paribhavanīyo. tabba^eb^paccayaṭṭhāne hi ^b^sakkuṇeyya^eb^padayojanā dissati ``aladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ laddhabbaṃ labhanīyaṃ laddhuṃ vā sakkuṇeyya''nti. atha vā paribhavanamarahatīti paribhavitabbo. evaṃ ^b^paribhottabbo paribhavanīyo^eb^. tathā hi ^b^tabba^eb^paccayaṭṭhāne ^b^arahati^eb^padayojanā dissati ``parisakkuṇeyyaṃ lābhamarahatīti laddhabba''nti. ettha pana ^b^paribhottabbo^eb^ti padassa atthibhāve ``khattiyo kho mahārāja daharoti na uññātabbo na paribhottabbo''ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. ^b^abhiadhi^eb^pubbā ^b^bhū^eb^dhātuyo samānatthā. sesāni dukāni nayānusārena ñeyyāni. ^b^bhamāno^eb^ti bhavatīti bhamāno, majjhe ^b^va^eb^kāralopo daṭṭhabbo. atridaṃ vattabbaṃ --
[21] ``kiṃ so bhamāno saccako'', iccatra pāḷiyaṃ pana.

[03] atrāyaṃ pāḷi ``kiṃ so bhamāno saccako nigaṇṭhaputto, yo bhagavato vādaṃ āropessatī''ti. ^b^vibhavamāno^eb^ti vibhavatīti vibhavamāno. evaṃ ^b^paribhavamāno^eb^tiādīsu. tattha ``abhisambhonto''timassa karonto nipphādento iccevattho. ``sabbāni abhisambhonto, sa rājavasatiṃ vase''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. yasmā panimāni ^a^M0.0109^ea^ ``bhavamāno''tiādīni vippakatapaccattavacanāni, tasmā saramāno rodati, gacchanto gaṇhāti, ``gacchanto so bhāradvājo, addasa accutaṃ isi''ntiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā rājā bhavamāno sampattimanubhavatītiādinā yojetabbāni. ``saramāno gacchanto''tiādīni hi ``yāto gato patto''tiādīhi sadisāni na honti, uttarakriyāpadāpekkhakāni honti ^b^tvā^eb^paccayantapadāni viyāti.

[03] ^b^paribhaviyamāno^eb^ti paribhaviyate soti paribhaviyamāno. evaṃ ^b^paribhuyyamāno^eb^tiādīsupi. imānipi vippakatapaccattavacanāni, tasmā ``rājapurisehi nīyamāno coro evaṃ cintesī''tiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā aññehi paribhaviyamāno tāṇaṃ gavesati. bhogo puggalenānubhaviyamāno parikkhayaṃ gacchatītiādinā yojetabbāni. evaṃ sabbatra īdisesu vippakatavacanesu yojetabbāni. ayaṃ aniyataliṅgānaṃ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ ^b^bhūta parābhūta sambhūta^eb^saddānaṃ niddeso. iccevaṃ pulliṅgānaṃ ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayānaṃ yathārahaṃ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.

[03] idāni itthiliṅganiddeso vuccati -- tatra ^b^bhāvikā^eb^ti bhāvetīti bhāvikā. yā bhāvanaṃ karoti, sā bhāvikā. ^b^bhāvanā^eb^ti vaḍḍhanā brūhanā phātikaraṇaṃ āsevanā bahulīkāro. ^b^vibhāvanā^eb^ti pakāsanā sandassanā. atha vā ^b^vibhāvanā^eb^ti abhāvanā antaradhāpanā. ^b^sambhāvanā^eb^ti ukkaṃsanā thomanā. ^b^paribhāvanā^eb^ti vāsanā, samantato vā vaḍḍhanā. ^b^ā^eb^kārantitthiliṅganiddeso.

[03] ^b^bhūmī^eb^ti sattāyamānā bhavatīti bhūmi, atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha thāvarā ca jaṅgamā cāti bhūmi. bhūmi vuccati ^a^M0.0110^ea^ pathavī. ``paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā''tiādīsu pana lokuttaramaggo bhūmīti vuccati. yā panandhabālamahājanena viññātā pathavī, tassimāni abhidhānāni --
[21] ``pathavī medanī bhūmi, bhūrī bhū puthuvī mahī.
[27] chamā vasumatī ubbī, avanī ku vasundharā.
[22] jagatī khiti vasudhā, dharaṇī go dharā''iti..
[03] atra ^b^bhū ku go^eb^saddā pathavīpadatthe vattantīti kutra diṭṭhapubbāti ce?

[03] ^b^bhūtī^eb^ti bhavanaṃ bhūti. ^b^vibhūtī^eb^ti vināso, visesato bhavanaṃ vā, atha vā visesato bhavanti sattā etāyāti vibhūti, sampattiyeva, ``rañño vibhūti. pihanīyā vibhūtiyo''ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^i^eb^kārantitthiliṅganiddeso.

[03] ^b^bhūrī^eb^ti pathavī. sā hi bhavanti etthāti bhūrīti vuccati, bhavati vā paññāyati vaḍḍhati cāti bhūrī, atha vā bhūtābhūtā tannissitā sattā ramanti etthāti bhūrī. pathavīnissitā hi sattā pathaviyaṃyeva ramanti, tasmā sā imināpi atthena bhūrīti vuccati. ^b^bhūrī^eb^saddassa pathavīvacane ``bhūripañño''ti atthasādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. apica bhūrī viyāti bhūrī, paññā, bhūrīti pathavīsamāya vitthatāya paññāya nāmaṃ, ``yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī, ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo''ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ imassatthassa sādhakaṃ. atha vā bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrī, paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ, ``bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā''ti ettha ^a^M0.0111^ea^ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ imassatthassa sādhakaṃ. atha vā paññāyeva rāgādayo dhamme abhibhavatīti bhūrī, rāgādiarayo abhibhavatītipi bhūrī. tathā hi ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ āyasmatā sāriputtena vuttaṃ ``rāgaṃ abhibhūyatīti bhūrī, paññā. dosaṃ mohaṃ...pe0... rāgo ari, taṃ ariṃ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā. doso. moho...pe0... sabbe bhavagāmino kammā ari, taṃ ariṃ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā''. ettha pana ``gotrabhū''ti padamiva ``aribhū''ti vattabbepi ^b^bhū^eb^saddaṃ pubbanipātaṃ katvā sandhivasena bhūrīti padamuccāritanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. apica īdisesu nāmikapadesu vināpi upasaggena abhibhavanādiatthā labbhantiyeva, nākhyātikapadesūti daṭṭhabbaṃ. idaṃ pana paññāya pariyāyavacanaṃ --
[21] ñāṇaṃ paññāṇamummaṅgo, sattho soto ca diṭṭhi ca.
[22] mantā bodho buddhi buddhaṃ, paṭibhānañca bodhiti..
[21] dhammo vijjā gati monaṃ, nepakkaṃ go matī muti.
[27] vīmaṃsā yoni dhonā ca, paṇḍā paṇḍiccayampi ca.

[03] ^b^bhūtī^eb^ti bhūtassa bhariyā. yathā hi petassa bhariyā ``petī''ti vuccati, evameva bhūtassa bhariyā ``bhūtī''ti vuccati. ^b^bhotī^eb^ti yāya saddhiṃ kathentena sā itthī ``bhotī'' iti vattabbā, tasmā iminā padena itthī vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbaṃ. yathā hi purisena saddhiṃ kathentena puriso ``bhavaṃ'' iti vohariyati, evameva itthiyā saddhiṃ kathentena itthī ``bhotī''iti vohariyati. ``kuto nu bhavaṃ bhāradvājo, ime ānesi dārake''ti, ``ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ, mā bhotī kupitā ahū''ti cettha nidassanaṃ. atha vā idhekacco satto itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmo, so ``bhotī''iti vattabbo, tasmā iminā padena itthīpi itthiliṅgena laddhanāmā anitthīpi vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbā. tathā hi devaputtopi ``devatā''ti itthiliṅgavasena voharitabbattā ^b^devatā^eb^saddamapekkhitvā ``bhotī''iti voharito, pageva devadhītā. tathā hi ``bhotī carahi jānāti, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitā''ti ettha pana ^b^devatā^eb^saddamapekkhitvā ``bhotī''iti itthi liṅgavohāro kato. atrāyaṃ ^a^M0.0113^ea^ suttapadattho ``yadi so kuhako dhanatthiko tāpaso na jānāti, bhotī devatā pana jānāti ki''nti. apica --
[22] karomi te taṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamā''ti --

[07] maṭṭhakuṇḍalīvatthusmiṃ pulliṅga^b^yakkha^eb^saddamapekkhitvā ``atthakāmo''ti pulliṅgavasena itthiliṅgañca ^b^devatā^eb^saddamapekkhitvā ``hitakāmā''ti itthiliṅgavasena purisabhūto maṭṭhakuṇḍalī voharito. aññatrāpi ^b^devatā^eb^saddamapekkhitvā devaputto itthiliṅgavasena voharito --
[21] ``na tvaṃ bāle vijānāsi, yathā arahataṃ vaco''ti.

[03] ettha pana ``ehi bāle khamāpehi, kusarājaṃ mahabbala''nti ettha ca itthīyeva itthiliṅgavasena voharitā, tasmā katthaci itthipurisapadatthasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ anapekkhitvā liṅgamattamevāpekkhitvā bhotī devatā, bhotī silā, bhotī jambū, bhotiṃ devatantiādīhi saddhiṃ paccattavacanādīni yojetabbāni. katthaci pana liṅgañca atthañca apekkhitvā ``bhotī itthī, bhotiṃ deva''ntiādinā yojetabbāni. ^b^vibhāvinī^eb^ti vibhāvetīti vibhāvinī. evaṃ ^b^paribhāvinī^eb^tiādīsupi. ^b^ī^eb^kārantitthiliṅganiddeso.

[03] ^b^bhūti^eb^ sattāyamānā bhavatīti bhū. atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha sattasaṅkhārāti bhū. bhū vuccati pathavī. ^b^abhū^eb^ti vaḍḍhivirahitā kathā, na bhūtapubbāti vā abhū, abhūtapubbā kathā. na bhūtāti vā abhū, abhūtā kathā. ``abhuṃ me kathaṃ nu bhaṇasi, pāpakaṃ vata bhāsasī''ti idametesamatthānaṃ ^a^M0.0114^ea^ sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^ū^eb^kārantitthiliṅganiddeso. niyatitthiliṅganiddesoyaṃ.

[03] aniyataliṅgānaṃ pana niyatitthiliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ ^b^bhūtaparābhūtasambhūta^eb^saddādīnaṃ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova. iccevaṃ itthiliṅgānaṃ ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayānaṃ yathārahaṃ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.

[03] idāni napuṃsakaliṅganiddeso vuccati -- tatra ^b^bhūta^eb^nti catubbidhaṃ pathavīdhātuādikaṃ mahābhūtarūpaṃ. tañhi aññesaṃ nissayabhāvena bhavatīti bhūtaṃ, bhavati vā tasmiṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya upādārūpanti bhūtaṃ. atha vā bhūtanti satto bhūtanāmako vā. bhūtanti hi napuṃsakavasena sakalo satto evaṃnāmako ca yakkhādiko vuccati. ``kālo ghasati bhūtāni, sabbāneva sahattanā. yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatāni, ujjhāpetvāna bhūtāni, tamhā ṭhānā apakkamī''ti evamādīsu napuṃsakappayogo veditabbo. gātābandhasukhatthaṃ liṅgavipallāsoti ce? tanna, ``yakkhādīni mahābhūtāni yaṃ gaṇhanti, neva tesaṃ tassa anto, na bahi ṭhānaṃ upalabbhatī''ti cuṇṇiyapadaracanāyampi ^b^bhūta^eb^saddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattadassanatoti avagantabbaṃ. ^b^mahābhūta^eb^nti vuttappakāraṃ catubbidhaṃ mahābhūtarūpaṃ. tassa mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. kathaṃ? mahantaṃ bhūtanti mahābhūtaṃ, māyākārasaṅkhātena mahābhūtena samantipi mahābhūtaṃ, yakkhādīhi mahābhūtehi samantipi mahābhūtaṃ, mahantehi ghāsacchādanādipaccayehi bhūtaṃ pavattantipi mahābhūtaṃ, mahāvikārabhūtantipi mahābhūtaṃ. evaṃ mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. atridaṃ suṭṭhupalakkhitabbaṃ --
[22] yojetabbā tiliṅge te, iti ñe yyaṃ visesato..
[22] idāni bhūto, cittāni, bhūtāni vimalāni tu..
[03] ^b^bhavitta^eb^nti vaḍḍhitaṭṭhānaṃ. tañhi bhavanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti bhavittanti vuccati, ``janittaṃ me bhavittaṃ me, iti paṅke avassayi''nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
[03] ^b^bhūna^eb^nti bhavanaṃ bhūnaṃ vaddhi. ``ahameva dūsiyā bhūnahatā, rañño mahāpatāpassā''ti, ``bhūnahaccaṃ kataṃ mayā''ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.

[03] ^b^bhavana^eb^nti bhavanakriyā. atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti ettha sattā puttadhītāhi nānāsampattīhi cāti bhavanaṃ vuccati geho, ``pettikaṃ bhavanaṃ mamā''ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ``geho gharañca āvāso, bhavanañca niketana''nti idaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ. ^b^parābhavana^eb^nti avaddhimāpajjanaṃ. ^b^sambhavana^eb^nti suṭṭhu bhavanaṃ. ^b^vibhavana^eb^nti ucchedo vināso vā. ^b^pātubhavana^eb^nti pākaṭatā sarūpalābho iccevattho. ^b^āvibhavana^eb^nti paccakkhabhāvo. ^b^tirobhavana^eb^nti paṭicchannabhāvo. ^b^vinābhavana^eb^nti vinābhāvo. ^b^sotthibhavana^eb^nti suvatthitā. ^b^paribhavana^eb^nti pīḷanā hīḷanā vā. ^b^abhibhavana^eb^nti vidhamanaṃ. ^b^adhibhavana^eb^nti ajjhottharaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0116^ea^. ^b^anubhavana^eb^nti paribhuñjanaṃ. ^b^samanubhavana^eb^nti suṭṭhu paribhuñjanaṃ. ^b^paccanubhavana^eb^nti adhipatibhāvenapi suṭṭhu paribhuñjanaṃ. niggahītantanapuṃsakaliṅganiddeso.
[03] ^b^atthavibhāvī^eb^ti atthassa vibhāvanasīlaṃ cittaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ vā kulaṃ vā atthavibhāvi. evaṃ ^b^dhammavibhāvi. i^eb^kārantanapuṃsakaliṅganiddeso.

[03] ^b^gotrabhū^eb^ti paññattārammaṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ vā gotrabhucittaṃ. tañhi kāmāvacaragottamabhibhavati, mahaggatagottañca bhāveti nibbattetīti ``gotrabhū''ti vuccati. apica gotrabhūti nibbānārammaṇaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ pavattaṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ vā phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pavattaṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ. tesu hi paṭhamaṃ puthujjanagottamabhibhavati, ariyagottañca bhāveti, gottābhidhānā ca nibbānato ārammaṇakaraṇavasena bhavatīti ``gotrabhū''ti vuccati, dutiyaṃ pana saṅkhārārammaṇampi samānaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvena sasampayuttāni phalacittāni gottābhidhāne nibbānamhi bhāvetīti ``gotrabhū''ti vuccati. idaṃ pāḷivavatthānaṃ --
[21] dīghabhāvena vuttaṃ tu, napuṃsakanti no vade.
[22] binduvantī'tare bhedā, tayo iti hi bhāsitā..
[03] cittena saha bhavatīti ^b^cittasahabhu,^eb^ cittena saha na bhavatīti ^b^nacittasahabhu,^eb^ rūpaṃ. ^b^u^eb^kārantanapuṃsakaliṅganiddeso. niyatanapuṃsakaliṅganiddesoyaṃ.

[03] aniyataliṅgānaṃ ^a^M0.0117^ea^ niyatanapuṃsakaliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ ^b^bhūtaparābhūta^eb^saddādīnaṃ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova. iccevaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayānaṃ yathārahaṃ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito. iccevaṃ sabbathāpi liṅgattayaniddeso samatto.
[06] iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
[21] vippakiṇṇakathā ettha, evaṃ vutte na hessati.

[03] puriso, purisā. purisaṃ, purise. purisena, purisehi, purisebhi. purisassa, purisānaṃ. purisā, purisasmā, purisamhā, purisehi, purisebhi. purisassa, purisānaṃ. purise, purisasmiṃ, purisamhi, purisesu. bho purisa, bhavanto purisā.

[03] ayamāyasmatā mahākaccānena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena katasmā ^b^niruttipiṭaka^eb^to uddharito ^b^purisa^eb^iccetassa pakatirūpassa ^a^M0.0118^ea^ nāmikapadamālānayo. tatra purisavacanaekavacanaputhuvacanesu paccattavacanādīni bhavanti. taṃ yathā? puriso tiṭṭhati, purisā tiṭṭhanti. tatra ^b^puriso^eb^ti purisavacane ekavacane paccattavacanaṃ bhavati, ^b^purisā^eb^ti purisavacane puthuvacane paccattavacanaṃ bhavati.
[03] purisaṃ passati, purise passati. tatra ^b^purisa^eb^nti purisavacane ekavacane upayogavacanaṃ bhavati, ^b^purise^eb^ti purisavacane puthuvacane upayogavacanaṃ bhavati.

[03] purisena kataṃ, purisehi kataṃ, purisebhi kataṃ. tatra ^b^purisenā^eb^ti purisavacane ekavacane karaṇavacanaṃ bhavati, ^b^purisehi, purisebhī^eb^ti purisavacane puthuvacane karaṇavacanaṃ bhavati.
[03] purisassa dīyate, purisānaṃ dīyate. tatra ^b^purisassā^eb^ti purisavacane ekavacane sampadānavacanaṃ bhavati, ^b^purisāna^eb^nti purisavacane puthuvacane sampadānavacanaṃ bhavati.

[03] purisā nissaṭaṃ, purisasmā nissaṭaṃ, purisamhā nissaṭaṃ, purisehi nissaṭaṃ, purisebhi nissaṭaṃ. tatra ^b^purisā^eb^ti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṃ bhavati. ^b^purisasmā^eb^ti...pe0... ^b^purisamhā^eb^ti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṃ bhavati, ^b^purisehi, purisebhī^eb^ti purisavacane puthuvacane nissakkavacanaṃ bhavati.
[03] purisassa pariggaho, purisānaṃ pariggaho. tatra ^b^purisassā^eb^ti purisavacane ekavacane sāmivacanaṃ bhavati, ^b^purisāna^eb^nti purisavacane puthuvacane sāmivacanaṃ bhavati.

[03] purise patiṭṭhitaṃ, purisasmiṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, purisamhi patiṭṭhitaṃ, purisesu patiṭṭhitaṃ. tatra ^b^purise^eb^ti purisavacane ekavacane bhummavacanaṃ bhavati, ^b^purisasmi^eb^nti...pe0... ^b^purisamhī^eb^ti...pe0... ^b^purisesū^eb^ti purisavacane puthuvacane bhummavacanaṃ bhavati.

[03] bho ^a^M0.0119^ea^ purisa tiṭṭha, bhavanto purisā tiṭṭhatha. tatra ^b^bho purisa^eb^iti purisavacane ekavacane ālapanaṃ bhavati, ^b^bhavanto purisā^eb^iti purisavacane puthuvacane ālapanaṃ bhavatīti iminā nayena sabbattha nayo vitthāretabbo.

[03] yamakamahātherena katāya pana ^b^cūḷaniruttiyaṃ^eb^ ``bho purisa''iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ vatvā ``bho purisā''iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ. kiñcāpi tādiso nayo niruttipiṭake natthi, tathāpi bahūnamālapanavisaye ``bho yakkhā''itiādīnaṃ ālapanabahuvacanānaṃ ^b^jātakaṭṭhakathā^eb^dīsu dissanato pasatthatarova hoti viññūnaṃ pamāṇañca, tasmā iminā yamakamahātheramatenapi ``puriso purisā purisa''ntiādīni vatvā āmantane ``bho purisa, bho purisā, bhavanto purisā''ti nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.

[03] tattha ^b^puriso^eb^ti paṭhamāya ekavacanaṃ. ^b^purisā^eb^ti bahuvacanaṃ. ^b^purisa^eb^nti dutiyāya ekavacanaṃ. ^b^purise^eb^ti bahuvacanaṃ. ^b^purisenā^eb^ti tatiyāya ekavacanaṃ. ^b^purisehi, purisebhī^eb^ti dve bahuvacanāni. ^b^purisassā^eb^ti catutthiyā ekavacanaṃ. ^b^purisāna^eb^nti bahuvacanaṃ. ^b^purisā, purisasmā, purisamhā^eb^ti tīṇi pañcamiyā ekavacanāni. ^b^purisehi, purisebhī^eb^ti dve bahuvacanāni. ^b^purisassā^eb^ti chaṭṭhiyā ekavacanaṃ. ^b^purisāna^eb^nti bahuvacanaṃ. ^b^purise, purisasmiṃ, purisamhī^eb^ti tīṇi sattamiyā ekavacanāni. ^b^purisesū^eb^ti bahuvacanaṃ. ^b^bho purisā^eb^ti aṭṭhamiyā ekavacanaṃ. ^b^bho purisā, bhavanto purisā^eb^ti dve bahuvacanāni.

[03] kiñcāpetesu ``purisā''ti idaṃ paṭhamāpañcamīaṭṭhamīnaṃ, ``purise''ti idaṃ dutiyāsattamīnaṃ, ``purisehi, purisebhī''ti tatiyāpañcamīnaṃ, ``purisāna''nti catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ ekasadisaṃ, tathāpi atthavasena asaṅkarabhāvo veditabbo. kathaṃ? ``puriso ^a^M0.0120^ea^ tiṭṭhati, purisā tiṭṭhanti. purisaṃ passati, purise passatī''tiādinā.

[03] tattha ca ^b^bho^eb^ti āmantanatthe nipāto. so na kevalaṃ ekavacanaṃyeva hoti, atha kho bahuvacanampi hotīti ``bho purisā''iti bahuvacanappayogopi gahito. ``bhavanto''tidaṃ pana bahuvacanameva hotīti ``purisā''ti puna vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. iti yamakamahātherena ``bho purisa''iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ vatvā ``bho purisā''iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ. tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ca nipātabhūto ^b^bho^eb^saddo ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā bhijjati. atrimāni nidassanapadāni -- ``api nu kho sapariggahānaṃ tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ apariggahena brahmunā saddhiṃ saṃsandati sametīti, no hidaṃ bho gotama. acchariyaṃ bho ānanda, abbhutaṃ bho ānanda, ehi bho samaṇa, bho pabbajita''iccādipāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca ^b^bho^eb^saddassa ekavacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṃ, ``tena hi bho mamapi suṇātha. yathā mayameva arahāma taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ, nāhaṃ bho samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṃ subhāsitato nābbhanumodāmi, passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ. bho yakkhā ahaṃ imaṃ tumhākaṃ bhājetvā dadeyyaṃ. aparisuddho panamhi, bho dhuttā tumhākaṃ kriyā mayhaṃ na ruccati. so te purise āha bho tumhe maṃ mārentā rañño dassetvāva mārethā''ti iccādi pana pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca ^b^bho^eb^saddassa bahuvacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṃ. ^b^kaccāyana^eb^ppakaraṇe pana ``bho purisa, bho purisā''ti padadvayaṃ ālapanekavacanavasena vuttaṃ. taṃ yathā āgamehi na virujjhati, tathā gahetabbaṃ.

[03] keci ^a^M0.0121^ea^ pana adūraṭṭhassālapane ``bho purisa''iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchanti, dūraṭṭhassālapane pana ``bho purisā''iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchanti. adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānaṃ itthīnañca ālapane na kiñci vadanti. tathā adūraṭṭhāya dūraṭṭhāya ca itthiyā ālapane te pucchitabbā ``adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapane kathaṃ vattabba''nti. addhā te evaṃ puṭṭhā uttari kiñci vattuṃ na sakkhissanti. evampi te ce vadeyyuṃ ``bhavanto purisāti imināva adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṃ bhavatī''ti. tadā te vattabbā ``yadi bhavanto purisā''ti iminā advejjhena vacanena adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṃ bhavati, evaṃ sante ``bho purisa''iti rassapadenapi dūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṃ vattabbaṃ, evaṃ avatvā kimatthaṃ adūraṭṭhassālapane ``bho purisa''iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchatha, kimatthañca dūraṭṭhassālapane ``bho purisā''iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchatha.

[03] nanu ``taggha bhagavā bojjhaṅgā, taggha sugata bojjhaṅgā''tiādīsu ālapanapadabhūtaṃ ``bhagavā''iti dīghapadaṃ samīpe ṭhitakālepi dūre ṭhitakālepi buddhassālapanapadaṃ bhavitumarahateva, tathā ālapanapadabhūtaṃ ``sugata''iti rassapadampi. yasmā panetesu ``bhagavā''ti ālapanapadassa na katthacipi rassattaṃ dissati, ``sugatā''ti ālapanapadassa ca na katthacipi dīghattaṃ dissati, tasmā dīgharassamattābhedaṃ acintetvā ``purisa''iti rassavasena vuttapadaṃ pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitassa purisassa āmantanakāle adūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṃ bhavati, āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisassa āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṃ bhavatīti gahetabbaṃ. tathā ``bhavanto purisā, bho yakkhā, bho dhuttā''tiādīni ^a^M0.0122^ea^ dīghavasena vuttāni ālapanabahuvacanapadānipi pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitapurisānaṃ āmantanakāle adūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavanti, āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisādīnaṃ āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavantīti gahetabbāni. tathā hi brāhmaṇā katthaci katthaci rassaṭṭhānepi dīghaṭṭhānepi āyatena sarena majjhimāyatena sarena accāyatena ca sarena vedaṃ paṭhanti likhitumasakkuṇeyyena gītassarena viya. iti sabbakkharesupi āyatena sarenuccāraṇaṃ labbhateva likhitumasakkuṇeyyaṃ, tasmā asampathamanotaritvā ``bho purisa''iti vacanena dūraṭṭhassa ca adūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṃ bhavati, ``bho purisā, bhavanto purisā''ti imehi vacanehipi dūraṭṭhānañca adūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. iti dūraṭṭhassa adūraṭṭhānañca āyatena sarena āmantanameva pamāṇaṃ, na dīgharassamattāviseso, tasmā ``bho sattha, bho rāja, bho gaccha, bho muni, bho daṇḍi, bho bhikkhu, bho sayambhu, bhoti kaññe, bhoti patti, bhoti itthi, bhoti yāgu, bhoti vadhu, bho kula, bho aṭṭhi, bho cakkhu''iccevamādīhi padehi adūraṭṭhassālapanañca dūraṭṭhassālapanañca bhavati. ``bhavanto satthā, satthāro, bhotiyo kaññā, kaññāyo''ti evamādīhipi padehi adūraṭṭhānañcālapanaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[21] tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, rañño puttaṃ adassayuṃ.
[22] na katthacipi dīghattaṃ, iti nīti mayā matā..
[03] idampettha vattabbaṃ ``kuto nu bho idamāyātaṃ `dūraṭṭhassālapanaṃ adūraṭṭhassālapanami'ti''? saddasatthato. saddasatthaṃ nāma na sabbaso buddhavacanassopakārakaṃ, ekadesena pana hoti.

[03] imasmiṃ pakaraṇe ``bahuvacana''nti vā ``puthuvacana''nti vā ``anekavacana''nti vā atthato ekaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ, tasmā sabbattha ``bahuvacana''nti vā ``puthuvacana''nti vā ``anekavacana''nti vā vohāro kātabbo, puthuvacanaṃ anekavacananti ca idaṃ sāsane niruttaññūnaṃ vohāro, itaraṃ saddasatthavidūnaṃ.

[03] kasmā pana imasmiṃ pakaraṇe dvivacanaṃ na vuttanti? yasmā buddhavacane dvivacanaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā na vuttanti. nanu buddhavacane vacanattayaṃ atthi, tathā hi ``āyasmā''ti idaṃ ekavacanaṃ, ``āyasmantā''ti idaṃ dvivacanaṃ, ``āyasmanto''ti idaṃ bahuvacananti? tanna, yadi ``āyasmantā''ti idaṃ vacanaṃ dvivacanaṃ bhaveyya, ``puriso purisā''tiādīsu kataraṃ dvivacananti vadeyyātha, tasmā buddhavacane dvivacanaṃ nāma natthi. teneva hi ^b^si yo aṃ yo nā hī^eb^tiādinā ekavacanabahuvacanāneva dassitānīti.

[03] nanu ca bho ``suṇantu me āyasmantā, ajja uposatho pannaraso. yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kareyyāmā''ti ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ dve sandhāya ``āyasmantā''ti vuttaṃ, ``uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā''tiādīsu pana pāḷīsu bahavo sandhāya ``āyasmanto''ti vuttaṃ, na ca sakkā vattuṃ ``yathā tathā vutta''nti ^a^M0.0124^ea^, parivāsādiārocanepi aṭṭhakathācariyehi viññātasugatādhippāyehi ``dvinnaṃ ārocentena `āyasmantā dhārentū'ti, tiṇṇaṃ ārocentena `āyasmanto dhārentū'ti vattabba''nti vuttattāti? saccaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pana vinayavohāravasena vuttanti. nanu vinayo buddhavacanaṃ, kasmā ``buddhavacane dvivacanaṃ nāma natthī''ti vadathāti? saccaṃ vinayo buddhavacanaṃ, tathāpi vinayakammavasena vuttattā upalakkhaṇamattaṃ, na sabbasādhāraṇabahuvacanapariyāpannaṃ. yadi hi ``āyasmantā''ti idaṃ dvivacanaṃ siyā, tappayogānipi kriyāpadāni dvivacanāneva siyuṃ, tathārūpānipi kriyāpadāni na santi. na hi akkharasamayakovido jhānalābhīpi dibbacakkhunā vassasatampi vassasahassampi samavekkhanto buddhavacane ekampi kriyāpadaṃ dvivacananti passeyya, evaṃ kriyāpadesu dvivacanassābhāvā nāmikapadesu dvivacanaṃ natthi. nāmikapadesu tadabhāvāpi kriyāpadesu tadabhāvo veditabbo. sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ dvīsupi dvivacanāni santi, māgadhabhāsāyaṃ pana natthi.

[03] apica ``puthuvacana''nti niruttivohāropi ``buddhavacane dvivacanaṃ natthī''ti etamatthaṃ dīpeti. tañhi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṃbhūtaṃ vacanaṃ, tattha vā vuttehi atthehi visuṃbhūtassa atthassa vacanaṃ ``puthuvacana''nti vuccati. kathamidaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṃbhūtaṃ vacananti ce? yasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ ``puthuvacana''nti vohāro natthi, tasmā idaṃ tehi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttehi dvivacanabahuvacanehi visuṃbhūtātthassa vacananti vuccati. kathañca pana sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttehi visuṃbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti ce? yasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ dve upādāya dvivacanaṃ vuttaṃ, na ticatupañcādike ^a^M0.0125^ea^ bahavo upādāya, bahavo pana upādāya bahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ, na dve upādāya, ayaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāya viseso. māgadhabhāsāyaṃ pana dviticatupañcādike bahavo upādāya puthuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttehi atthehi visuṃbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti vuccati. ayaṃ māgadhabhāsāya viseso. tasmātra puthubhūtassa, puthuno vā atthassa vacanaṃ ``puthuvacana''nti attho samadhigantabbo.
[03] idāni ``puriso, purisā, purisa''nti niruttipiṭakato uddharitanayaṃ nissāya pakatirūpabhūtassa ^b^bhūta^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate --

[03] bhūto, bhūtā. bhūtaṃ, bhūte. bhūtena, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. bhūtassa, bhūtānaṃ. bhūtā, bhūtasmā, bhūtamhā, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. bhūtassa, bhūtānaṃ. bhūte, bhūtasmiṃ, bhūtamhi, bhūtesu. bho bhūta, bhavanto bhūtā.

[03] atha vā ``bho bhūtā''iti bahuvacanaṃ viññeyyaṃ. yathā panettha ^b^bhūta^eb^iccetassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālā purisanayena yojitā, evaṃ bhāvakādīnañca aññesañca taṃsadisānaṃ nāmikapadamālā ^b^purisa^eb^nayena yojetabbā. etthaññāni taṃsadisāni nāma ``buddho''tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ ^b^buddha^eb^iccādīni pakatirūpāni.

[03] kecettha vadeyyuṃ ``nanu bho `orodhā ca kumārā cā'ti pāṭhassa dassanato ^b^orodha^eb^saddo itthiliṅgo''ti? tanna, tattha hi ``orodhā''ti idaṃ okārantapulliṅgameva, ^b^nā'^eb^kārantitthiliṅgaṃ, tumhe pana ^b^``ā^eb^kārantitthiliṅga''nti maññamānā evaṃ vadatha, na panidaṃ ^b^ā^eb^kārantitthiliṅgaṃ, atha kho ``mātugāmā''tipadaṃ viya bahuvacanavasena vuttamākārantapadanti. nanu ca bho ^b^sammohavinodani^eb^yādīsu ^b^orodha^eb^saddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭā, kathanti ce? ``rukkhe adhivatthā devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva manaṃ palobhetvā `ito te sattadivasamatthake upaṭṭhāko rājā marissatī'ti supine ārocesi. thero taṃ kathaṃ sutvā rājorodhānaṃ ācikkhi. tā ekappahāreneva mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsū''ti. ettha hi ``rājorodhāna''nti vatvā ``tā''ti vuttattāva ^b^orodha^eb^saddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭāti? tanna, atthassa duggahaṇato. duggahito hi ettha tumhehi attho, ettha pana ^b^orodha^eb^saddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṃ sandhāya ``tā''ti vuttattā ``tā itthiyo''ti ayamevattho. tumhe pana amātāpitarasaṃvaddhattā ācariyakule ca anivuṭṭhattā etaṃ sukhumatthamajānantā yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhārūḷhaṃ vadatha.
[21] bhuñjanatthaṃ kathanatthaṃ, mukhaṃ hotīti no vade.
[22] yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhārūḷhaṃ, vacanaṃ paṇḍito naroti..

[03] na mayaṃbho yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhārūḷhaṃ vadāma, aṭṭhakathācariyānaññeva vacanaṃ gahetvā vadāma, aṭṭhakathāyeva amhākaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ ^a^M0.0128^ea^, na mayaṃ tumhākaṃ saddahāmāti. amhākaṃ saddahatha vā mā vā, mā tumhe ``aṭṭhakathācariyānaññeva vacanaṃ gahetvā vadāmā''ti aṭṭhakathācariye abbhācikkhatha. na hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi ^b^``orodha^eb^saddo itthiliṅgo''ti vuttaṭṭhānamatthi, tasmāpi aṭṭhakathācariye abbhācikkhatha, na yuttaṃ buddhādīnaṃ garūnamabbhācikkhanaṃ mahato anatthassa lābhāya saṃvattanato. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ``attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati, tato attānañca khaṇatī''ti.

[03] evaṃ abbhācikkhanassa ayuttataṃ sāvajjatañca dassetvā punapi te idaṃ vattabbā -- ^b^jātakaṭṭhakathāyampi^eb^ tumhehi āhaṭaudāharaṇasadisaṃ udāharaṇamatthi, taṃ suṇātha. kosiyajātakaṭṭhakathāyañhi ``satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ mātugāmaṃ ārabbha kathesi. sā kirekassa saddhassa pasannassa upāsakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā pāpadhammā''ti pāṭho dissati. ettha hi ``mātugāmaṃ ārabbha kathesī''ti vatvā ``sā''ti vuttattā tumhākaṃ matena ^b^mātugāma^eb^saddo itthiliṅgoyeva siyā, na pulliṅgo, kimidaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanampi na passatha, tadeva pana aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ passatha, kiṃ sā eva aṭṭhakathā tumhākaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ, na tadaññāti.

[03] yadi ^b^tā^eb^saddaṃ apekkhitvā ^b^orodha^eb^saddassa itthiliṅgattamicchatha, etthāpi ^b^sā^eb^saddamapekkhitvā ^b^mātugāma^eb^saddassa itthiliṅgattamicchathāti. evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyeyyuṃ. etthāpi ^b^mātugāma^eb^saddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṃ sandhāya ``sā''ti vuttattā ``sā itthī''ti ayamevattho. katthaci ^a^M0.0129^ea^ hi padhānavācakena pulliṅgena napuṃsakaliṅgena vā samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittāpulliṅgavasena vā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena vā niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā itthipadatthamevāpekkhitvā itthiliṅganiddeso dissati. taṃ yathā? ``idha visākhe mātugāmo susaṃvihitakammantā hoti saṅgahitaparijanā bhattumanāpaṃ carati, sambhataṃ anurakkhatī''ti ca, ``ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya, daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca. idha mallike ekacco mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā, appampi vuttā samānā abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthiyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarotī''ti ca, ``taṃ kho pana bhikkhave itthiratanaṃ rañño cakkavattissa pubbuṭṭhāyinī pacchānipātinī kiṃkārapaṭissāvinī''ti ca ime payogā.

[03] katthaci pana padhānavācakena napuṃsakaliṅgena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā purisapadatthamevāpekkhitvā pulliṅganiddeso dissati. taṃ yathā? ``pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṃ. taṃ kho pana rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṃ ñātānaṃ pavesetā aññātānaṃ nivāretā''ti. katthaci padhānavācakena liṅgattayena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānurūpaṃ niddeso dissati. taṃ yathā? sā itthī ``sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā. aṭṭhahi kho nakulamāte dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā manāpakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ ^a^M0.0130^ea^ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. saddho purisapuggalo, saddhaṃ kulaṃ, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvaha''nti.
[03] ^b^seyya^eb^iti saddo pana yebhuyyena okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato. kathaṃ? seyyo amitto matiyā upeto. esāva pūjanā seyyo, ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo.
[21] yaso ca appabuddhīnaṃ, viññūnaṃ ayaso ca yo.
[22] ayasova seyyo viññūnaṃ, na yaso appabuddhinaṃ..
[21] dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā.
[22] pavivekaṃ dukkhaṃ seyyo, yañce kāmamayaṃ sukhaṃ..
[22] maraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve adhammika''nti..

[07] evamayaṃ ^b^seyya^eb^ iti saddo ^b^o^eb^kārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati. katthaci pana ^b^ā^eb^kārantabhāve ṭhatvā itthiliṅgānukūlo dissati ``itthīpi hi ekacciyā, seyyā posa janādhipā''ti. niggahītanto pana hutvā napuṃsakaliṅgānukūlo apasiddho. evaṃpakāre payoge kiṃ tumhe na passathāti. evaṃ vuttā ca te niruttarāva bhavissanti.

[03] sacepi ^a^M0.0131^ea^ te ettha evaṃ vadeyyuṃ ``tattha tattha suttappadese aṭṭhakathādīsu ca `mātugāmo'ti vā `mātugāmenā'ti vā ^b^o^eb^kārantapulliṅgabhāvena ^b^mātugāma^eb^saddassa dassanato pulliṅgabhūtaṃ ^b^mātugāma^eb^saddaṃ anapekkhitvā itthipadatthameva apekkhitvā ``sā itthī''ti ^b^itthī^eb^saddena ^b^sā^eb^saddassa sambandhaggahaṇaṃ mayaṃ sampaṭicchāma, `orodho'ti vā `orodhenā'ti vā ^b^o^eb^kārantapulliṅgabhāvena ṭhitassa ^b^orodha^eb^saddassa adassanato pana tumhehi vuttaṃ purimatthaṃ na sampaṭicchāmā''ti. tadā tesaṃ imāni ^b^vinayapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ āgatapadāni dassetabbāni ``tena kho pana samayena rājā udeno uyyāne paricāresi saddhiṃ orodhena, atha kho rañño udenassa orodho rājānaṃ udenaṃ etadavocā''ti. evaṃ imāni suttapadāni dassetvā ^b^suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ``rāmo nāma rājā kuṭṭharogī orodhehi ca nāṭakehi ca jigucchamāno''ti vacanañca dassetvā ``gacchatha tumhe garukulamupagantvā bhagavato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ sādhukaṃ padabyañjanāni uggaṇhathā''ti uyyojetabbā.

[03] idāni ^b^mātugāma^eb^saddādīsu kiñci vinicchayaṃ vadāma -- ^b^mātugāma^eb^saddo ca ^b^orodha^eb^saddo ca ^b^dāra^eb^saddo cāti ime itthipadatthavācakāpi samānā ekantena pulliṅgā bhavanti. tesu ^b^dāra^eb^saddassa ekasmiṃ atthe vattamānassāpi bahuvacanakattameva saddasatthavidū icchanti, na ekavacanakattaṃ. mayaṃ pana ^b^dāra^eb^saddassa ekasmiṃ atthe ekavacanakattaṃ, yebhuyyena pana bahuvacanakattaṃ anujānāma, bavhatthe vattabbameva natthi. pāḷiyañhi ^b^dāra^eb^saddo yebhuyyena bahuvacanako bhavati, ekavacanako appo. tatrime payogā --
[27] puttā ca dārā ca mayañca sabbe.
[22] tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na miyyare''ti ca,
[22] sahasā sampiyāyena, taṃ jaññāvasalo itī''ti ca,
[22] dissati paradāresu, taṃ parābhavato mukha''nti ca,
[07] ``puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā''ti ca byāse, samāse pana ``puttadārā disā pacchā, puttadārehi mattano''ti ca evamādayo bahuvacanappayogā bahavo bhavanti.
[03] ekavacanappayogā pana appā. seyyathidaṃ? ``garūnaṃ dāre, dhammaṃ care yopi samuñjakaṃ care, dārañca posaṃ dadamappakasmi''nti ca,
[22] dhammena dāraṃ posenti, te namassāmi mātalī''ti ca,
[21] ``yo icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ.

[03] samāhāralakkhaṇavasena panesa ^b^dāra^eb^saddo napuṃsakaliṅgekavacanopi katthaci bhavati. ``ādāya puttadāraṃ. puttadārassa saṅgaho''iti evaṃ idha vuttappakārena liṅgañca atthañca sallakkhetvā ``puriso purisā''ti pavattaṃ purisasaddanayaṃ nissāya ^a^M0.0133^ea^ sabbesaṃ ``bhūto bhāvako bhavo''tiādīnaṃ ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayānaṃ aññesa^b^ñco^eb^kārantapadānaṃ nāmikapadamālāsu saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi saddhammaṭṭhitiyā kosallamuppādetabbaṃ.

[03] kiṃ pana sabbāni ^b^o^eb^kārantapadāni ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbappakārena ekasadisāneva hutvā paviṭṭhānīti? na paviṭṭhāni. kānici hi ^b^o^eb^kārantapadāni ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca, kānici ^b^o^eb^kārantapadāni ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca, kānici ^b^o^eb^kārantapadāni ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā appaviṭṭhāneva. tatra katamāni kānici ^b^o^eb^kārantapadāni ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca? ``saro vayo ceto''tiādīni. ^b^saro^eb^iti hi ayaṃsaddo ususaddasaravanākārādisaravācako ce, ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā paviṭṭho. rahadavācako ce, ^b^mano^eb^gaṇapakkhikattā ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭho. ^b^vayo^eb^iti saddo parihānivācako ce, ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā paviṭṭho. āyukoṭṭhāsavācako ce, ^b^mano^eb^gaṇapakkhikattā ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭho. ^b^ceto^eb^ iti saddo yadi paṇṇattivācako, ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā paviṭṭho. yadi pana cittavācako, ^b^mano^eb^gaṇapakkhikattā ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭho. ^b^mano^eb^gaṇo ca nāma --

[03] mano ^a^M0.0134^ea^, manā. manaṃ, mano, mane. manasā, manena, manehi, manebhi. manaso, manassa, manānaṃ. manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. manaso, manassa, manānaṃ. manasi, mane, manasmiṃ, manamhi, manesu. bho mana, bhavanto manā.

[03] atha vā ``bho manā''iti bahuvacanampi ñeyyaṃ. evaṃ vaco, vacā. vacaṃ, vaco, vace. vacasātiādinā nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. ^b^aha^eb^saddassa pana bhummekavacanaṭṭhāne ahasi, ahe, ahasmiṃ, ahamhi, ahu, ahanīti yojetabbā.
[03] idāni rūpantaravisesadassanatthaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgassa ^b^mana^eb^saddassapi nāmikapadamālaṃ vadāma, aṭṭhāne ayaṃ kathitāti na codetabbaṃ.

[03] manaṃ, manāni, manā. manaṃ, manāni, mane. manena, manehi, manebhi. manassa, manaso, manānaṃ. manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. manassa, manaso, manānaṃ. mane, manasmiṃ, manamhi, manesu. bho mana, bhavanto manā. atha vā ``bho manāni, bho manā''evampi bahuvacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. evamuttaratrāpi nayo.

[03] ettha ca pulliṅgassa ^b^mana^eb^saddassa paccattakaraṇasampadānasāmibhummavacanāni mano manasā manaso manasīti rūpāni ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni, napuṃsakaliṅgassa ca ^b^mana^eb^saddassa paccattavacanāni ``manaṃ manānī''ti rūpāni ca, aṭṭhamyopayogavacanānaṃ ``manaṃ manānī''ti rūpadvayañca ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni, tāni sabbāni kamato samasamāni.

[03] keci ^b^o^eb^kāranto ^b^mano^eb^iti saddo napuṃsakaliṅgoti vadanti, te vattabbā -- yadi so napuṃsakaliṅgo siyā, tassadisehi ^b^vaco vayo^eb^tiādisaddehipi napuṃsakaliṅgeheva bhavitabbaṃ, na ``te napuṃsakaliṅgā''ti garū vadanti, ``pulliṅgā''icceva vadanti. yasmā ca ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``kāyo anicco; mano ^a^M0.0135^ea^ anicco''ti ca ``kāyo dukkho, mano dukkho''ti ca ``nicco vā anicco vāti anicco bhante''ti ca evamādayo pulliṅgappayogā bahavo diṭṭhā. tena ñāyati ^b^mano^eb^saddo ekantena pulliṅgoti. yadi pana napuṃsakaliṅgosiyā, ``anicco dukkho''ti evamādīni taṃsamānādhikaraṇāni anekapadasatānipi napuṃsakaliṅgāneva siyuṃ. na hi tāni napuṃsakaliṅgāni, atha kho abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattakāni vāccaliṅgāni. evaṃ ^b^mano^eb^saddassa pulliṅgatā paccetabbāti, sace ^b^mano^eb^saddo napuṃsakaliṅgo na hoti, kathaṃ ``manānī''ti napuṃsakarūpaṃ dissatīti? saccaṃ ``manānī''ti napuṃsakaliṅgameva, tathāpi ^b^mano^eb^gaṇe pamukhabhāvena gahita^b^sso^eb^kārantassa ^b^mana^eb^saddassa rūpaṃ na hoti. atha kiñcarahīti ce? ^b^citta^eb^saddena samānaliṅgassa samānasutittepi ^b^mano^eb^gaṇe apariyāpannassa niggahītantasseva ^b^mana^eb^saddassa rūpaṃ. ^b^mana^eb^saddo hi punnapuṃsakavasena dvidhā bhijjati ``mano manaṃ''iti yathā ``ajjavoajjava''nti. ``mano ce nappadussati. santaṃ tassa manaṃ hotī''ti hi pāḷi. yadi ca so ^b^mano^eb^saddo napuṃsakaliṅgo na hoti.

[07] ^b^ettha mano^eb^saddena samānādhikaraṇo ``patita''nti saddo napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvena kasmā sannihito. yasmā ca samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvena sannihitaṃ, tasmā saddantarasannidhānavasena ^b^mano^eb^saddo napuṃsakaliṅgoti ñāyatīti? tanna, samānādhikaraṇapadassa sabbattha liṅgavisesājotanato. yadi hi samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ sabbattha liṅgavisesaṃ joteyya, ``cattāro indriyānī''ti etthāpi ``cattāro''ti ^a^M0.0136^ea^ padaṃ ^b^indriya^eb^saddassa pulliṅgattaṃ kareyya, na ca kātuṃ sakkoti. ^b^indriya^eb^saddo hi ekantena napuṃsakaliṅgo. yadi tumhe ``patita''nti samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ nissāya ^b^mano^eb^saddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattamicchatha, ``cattāro indriyānī''ti etthapi ``cattāro''ti samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ nissāya ^b^indriya^eb^saddassa pulliṅgattaṃ icchathāti. na mayaṃ bho ^b^indriya^eb^saddassa pulliṅgattaṃ icchāma, atha kho napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃyeva icchāma, ``cattāro''ti padaṃ liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitattā ``cattārī''ti gaṇhāma, tasmā ``cattāri indriyānī''ti atthaṃ dhāremāti. yadi evaṃ ``patitaṃ asubhesu munissa mano''ti etthāpi ``patita''nti padaṃ liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitanti mantvā ``patito''ti atthaṃ dhārethāti. na dhārema ettha liṅgavipallāsassa anicchitabbato. yadi hi ^b^mano^eb^saddo pulliṅgo siyā, taṃsamānādhikaraṇapadaṃ ``patito''ti vattabbaṃ siyā. kimācariyo evaṃ vattuṃ na jāni, jānamāno eva so ``patito''ti nāvoca, ``patita''nti panāvoca, tena ñāyati ^b^``mano^eb^saddo napuṃsakaliṅgo''ti. mā tumhe evaṃ vadetha, samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ nāma katthaci padhānaliṅgamanuvattati, katthaci nānuvattati, tasmā na taṃ liṅgavisesajotane ekantato pamāṇaṃ. ``mātugāmo, orodho, āvuso visākha, ehi visākhe, cittāni aṭṭhīnī''ti evamādirūpavisesoyeva pamāṇaṃ. yadi samānādhikaraṇapadeyeva liṅgaviseso adhigantabbo siyā, ``cattāro ca mahābhūtā''tiādīsu liṅgavavatthānaṃ na siyā. yasmā evamādīsupi ṭhānesu liṅgavavatthānaṃ hotiyeva. kathaṃ? ``cattāro''ti pulliṅgaṃ ``mahābhūtā''ti napuṃsakanti, tasmā ``patitaṃ asubhesu munissa mano''ti etthāpi ``patita''nti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ ``mano''ti pulliṅganti vavatthānaṃ bhavatīti. idaṃ sutvā te tuṇhī bhavissanti. tato ^a^M0.0137^ea^ tesaṃ tuṇhībhūtānaṃ idaṃ vattabbaṃ -- yasmā ^b^mano^eb^gaṇe pavattānaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṃsakavasena yojetabbāni, tasmā ^b^mano^eb^gaṇe pamukhassa ^b^mano^eb^saddassapi samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṃsakavasena yojitāni. tathā hi pubbācariyā ``saddhammatejavihataṃ vilayaṃ khaṇena, veneyyasattahadayesu tamo'payāti. dukkhaṃ vaco etasminti dubbaco. avanataṃ siro yassa soyaṃ avaṃsiro, appakaṃ rāgādi rajo yesaṃ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā''tiādinā saddaracanaṃ kubbiṃsu, na pana tehi ^b^vaco siro rajo^eb^saddādīnaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ īdisī saddaracanā katā, atha kho ^b^siromano^eb^saddānaṃ ^b^mano^eb^gaṇe pavattānaṃ pulliṅgasaddānaṃ katthacipi īdisānipi liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitāni samānādhikaraṇapadāni hontīti paresaṃ jānāpanādhippāyavatiyā anukampāya viracitā. etthāpi tumhākaṃ matena ^b^mano^eb^saddassa napuṃsakaliṅgatte sati ^b^vaco siro^eb^ iccādayopi napuṃsakaliṅgattamāpajjanti napuṃsakaliṅgavasena samānādhikaraṇapadānaṃ niddiṭṭhattā. kiṃ panetesampi napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ icchathāti. addhā te idampi sutvā nibbeṭhetumasakkontā tuṇhī bhavissanti. kiñcāpi te aññaṃ gahetabbakāraṇaṃ apassantā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ ``yadi bho ^b^mano^eb^ saddo napuṃsakaliṅgona hoti, kasmā veyyākaraṇā ^b^`mano^eb^saddo napuṃsakaliṅgo'ti vadantī''ti? te vattabbā -- yadi tumhe veyyākaraṇamataṃ gahetvā ^b^mano^eb^saddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ rocetha, nanu bhagavāyeva loke asadiso mahāveyyākaraṇo mahāpuriso visārado parappavādamaddano. bhagavantañhi padakā veyyākaraṇā ambaṭṭhamāṇavapokkharasātisoṇadaṇḍādayo ca brāhmaṇā saccakanigaṇṭhādayo ca paribbājakā ^a^M0.0138^ea^ vādena na sampāpuṇiṃsu, aññadatthu bhagavāyeva mattavāraṇagaṇamajjhe kesarasīho viya asambhīto nesaṃ nesaṃ vādaṃ maddesi, mahante ca ne atthe patiṭṭhāpesi, evaṃvidhena bhagavatā vohārakusalena yasmā ``kāyo anicco''ti ca ``kāyo dukkho, mano anicco, mano dukkho''ti ca evamādinā vuttā ^b^mano^eb^saddassa pulliṅgabhāvasūcanikā bahū pāḷiyo dissanti, tasmā ^b^mano^eb^saddo pulliṅgoyevāti sārato paccetabboti. evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyissanti.
[03] saro, sarā. saraṃ, sare. sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. sarassa, sarānaṃ. sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. sarassa, sarānaṃ. sare, sarasmiṃ, saramhi, saresu. bho sara, bhavanto sarā.
[03] ayaṃ pana ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa ^b^mano^eb^gaṇapakkhikassa rahadavācakassa ^b^sara^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā --

[03] saro, sarā. saraṃ, saro, sare. sarasā, sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. saraso, sarassa, sarānaṃ. sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. saraso, sarassa, sarānaṃ. sarasi, sare, sarasmiṃ, saramhi, saresu. bho sara, bhavanto sarā, bho sarā iti vā.
[03] vayo, vayā. vayaṃ, vaye. vayena, vayehi, vayebhīti ^b^purisa^eb^nayena ñe yyo. ayaṃ ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa parihānivācakassa ^b^vaya^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā.

[03] ayaṃ ^a^M0.0139^ea^ pana ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa ^b^mano^eb^gaṇapakkhikassa āyukoṭṭhāsavācakassa ^b^vaya^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā -- vayo, vayā. vayaṃ, vayo, vaye. vayasā, vayena, vayehi, vayebhīti ^b^mana^eb^nayena ñeyyo. tassa ceto paṭissosi, araññe luddagocaro. cetā haniṃsu vedabbaṃ.
[03] ceto, cetā. cetaṃ, cete. cetena, cetehi, cetebhīti ^b^purisa^eb^nayena ñeyyo. ayaṃ ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa paṇṇattivācakassa ^b^ceta^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā.

[03] ayaṃ pana ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa cittavācakassa ^b^ceta^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā -- ceto, cetā. cetaṃ, ceto, cete. cetasā, cetena, cetehi, cetebhīti ^b^mana^eb^nayena ñeyyo. yaso kulaputto, yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ, yasena kulaputtenāti ekavacanavasena ^b^purisa^eb^nayena yojetabbā, ekavacanaputhuvacanavasena vā. evaṃ kānici okārantapadāni ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena paviṭṭhāni cāti iminā nayena sabbapadāni paññācakkhunā upaparikkhitvā viseso veditabbo. avisesaññuno hi evamādivibhāgaṃ ajānantā yaṃ vā taṃ vā byañjanaṃ ropentā yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ virādhenti, tasmā yo ettha amhehi pakāsito vibhāgo, so saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi sakkaccamuggahetabbo. katamāni kānici okārantapadāni ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca? ^b^mano vaco tejo^eb^saddādayo ceva ^b^ayya^eb^saddo ca, tatra ^b^mana^eb^saddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālā heṭṭhā vibhāvitā.

[03] ^b^ayya^eb^saddassa ^a^M0.0140^ea^ pana nāmikapadamālāyaṃ ``ayyo, ayyā. ayyaṃ, ayye''ti ^b^purisa^eb^nayena vatvā ālapanaṭṭhāne ``bho ayya, bho ayyo''ti dve ekavacanāni, ``bhavanto ayyā, bhavanto ayyo''ti dve bahuvacanāni ca vattabbāni. ettha ^b^ayyo^eb^ iti saddo paccattavacanabhāve ekavacanaṃ, ālapanavacanabhāve ekavacanañceva bahuvacanañca. tatrime payogā ``ayyo kira sāgato ambatitthikena nāgena saṅgāmesi, pivatu bhante ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṃ pasanna''nti evamādīni ^b^ayyo^eb^saddassa paccattekavacanappayogāni, ``atha kho sā itthī taṃ purisaṃ etadavoca `nāyyo so bhikkhu maṃ nippāṭesi, apica ahameva tena bhikkhunā gacchāmi, akārako so bhikkhu, gaccha khamāpehī'ti'' evamādīni ^b^ayyo^eb^saddassa ālapanekavacanappayogāni, ``etha'yyo rājavasatiṃ, nisīditvā suṇātha me. etha mayaṃ ayyo samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajissāmā''ti evamādīni ^b^ayyo^eb^saddassa ālapanabahuvacanappayogāni. bhavati catra --
[07] evaṃ kānici ^b^o^eb^kārantapadāni ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca.
[03] katamāni kānici ^b^o^eb^kārantapadāni ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā appaviṭṭhāni? ^b^go^eb^saddoyeva. ^b^go^eb^saddassa hi ayaṃ nāmikapadamālā --

[03] go, gāvo, gavo. gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ, gāvo, gavo. gāvena, gavena, gohi, gobhi. gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. gāvā, gāvasmā, gāvamhā, gavā, gavasmā, gavamhā, gohi, gobhi. gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. gāve, gāvasmiṃ, gāvamhi, gave, gavasmiṃ ^a^M0.0141^ea^, gavamhi, gāvesu, gavesu, gosu. bho go, bhavanto gāvo, gavo. ayaṃ ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā appaviṭṭhassa ^b^go^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā.

[03] nanu ca bho ^b^go^eb^saddo attanā sambhūta^b^goṇa^eb^saddamālāvasena ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭho ceva ekadesena na paviṭṭho cāti? saccaṃ. ^b^goṇa^eb^saddo ^b^go^eb^saddavasena sambhūtopi ``vatticchānupubbikā saddapaṭipattī''ti vacanato ^b^go^eb^saddato visuṃ amhehi gahetvā ^b^purisa^eb^naye pakkhitto. tassa hi visuṃ gahaṇe yutti dissati syādīsu ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato, tasmā ^b^go^eb^saddato sambhūtampi ^b^goṇa^eb^saddaṃ anapekkhitvā suddhaṃ ^b^go^eb^saddameva gahetvā ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā ^b^go^eb^saddassa appaviṭṭhatā vuttā.

[03] nanu ca bho paccattavacanabhūto ^b^go^eb^iti saddo ^b^puriso^eb^ti saddena sadisattā ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭhoti? tanna, ^b^go^eb^saddo hi nicca^b^mo^eb^kāranto, na ^b^purisa^eb^saddādayo viya paṭhamaṃ ^b^a^eb^kārantabhāve ṭhatvā pacchā paṭila^b^ddho^eb^kārantaṭṭho. teneva hi paccattavacanaṭṭhānepi ālapanavacanaṭṭhānepi ^b^go^eb^icceva tiṭṭhati. yadi paccattavacanattaṃ paṭicca ^b^go^eb^saddassa ^b^purisa^eb^naye ekadesena paviṭṭhatā icchitabbā, ``kānici ^b^o^eb^kārantapadānī''ti evaṃ vuttā ^b^o^eb^kārantakathā kamatthaṃ dīpeyya, nipphalāva sā kathā siyā, tasmā amhehi yathāvutto nayoyeva āyasmantehi manasi kātabbo. evaṃ ^b^go^eb^saddassa ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā daṭṭhabbā.

[03] kecettha evaṃ puccheyyuṃ ^b^``go^eb^saddassa tāva `go, gāvo, gavo. gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ' iccādinā nayena ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā amhehi ñātā, ^b^jaraggava puṅgavā^eb^disaddā pana kutra naye ^a^M0.0142^ea^ paviṭṭhā''ti? tesaṃ evaṃ byākātabbaṃ ^b^``jaraggava puṅgavā^eb^disaddā sabbathāpi ^b^purisa^eb^naye paviṭṭhā''ti. tathā hi tesaṃ ^b^go^eb^saddato ayaṃ viseso, jaranto ca so go cāti jaraggavo. ettha ^b^na^eb^kāralopo ^b^ta^eb^kārassa ca ^b^ga^eb^kārattaṃ bhavati samāsapadattā, samāse ca ^b^si^eb^mhi pare ^b^go^eb^sadda^b^sso^eb^kārassa ^b^avā^eb^deso labbhati, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ ``visāṇena jaraggavo''ti ekavacanarūpaṃ dissati. tathā hi aññattha anupapadattā ^b^gavo^eb^iti bahuvacanapadaṃyeva dissati. idha pana sopapadattā samāsapadabhāvamāgamma ``jaraggavo''ti ekavacanapadaṃyeva dissati. tathā hi jaraggavoti ettha jarantā ca te gavo cāti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena nibbacanīyatā na labbhati lokasaṅketavasena ekasmiṃ atthe nirūḷhattāti. ``jaraggavo, jaraggavā. jaraggavaṃ, jaraggave. jaraggavenā''ti ^b^purisa^eb^nayena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. esa nayo ^b^puṅgavo sakyapuṅgavo^eb^tiādīsupi.

[03] tatra ^b^puṅgavo^eb^ti gunnaṃ yūthapati nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho. yo pāḷiyaṃ ``muhuttajātova yathā gavaṃpati, samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara''nti ca ``gavañce taramānānaṃ, ujuṃ gacchati puṅgavo''ti ca āgato. īdisesu pana ṭhānesu keci ``pumā ca so go cāti puṅgavo''ti vacanatthaṃ bhaṇanti. mayaṃ pana padhāne nirūḷho ayaṃ saddoti vacanatthaṃ na bhaṇāma. na hi ^b^puṅkokilo^eb^tiādisaddānaṃ kokilādīnaṃ pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā viya imassa pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā sambhavati, atha kho padhānabhāvappakāsane ca samatthatā sambhavati. tena ``sakyapuṅgavo''tiādīsu nisabhasaṅkhāto puṅgavo viyāti puṅgavo, sakyānaṃ, sakyesu ^a^M0.0143^ea^ vā puṅgavo sakyapuṅgavotiādinā samāsapadattho gahetabbo. atha vā uttarapadatte ṭhitānaṃ ^b^sīhabyagghanāgā^eb^disaddānaṃ seṭṭhavācakattā ``sakyapuṅgavo''tiādīnaṃ ``sakyaseṭṭho''tiādinā attho gahetabbo. iti sabbathāpi ^b^purisa^eb^naye pavattanato ^b^jaraggava puṅgavā^eb^disaddānaṃ ^b^go^eb^saddassa padamālato visadisapadamālatā vavatthapetabbā. ^b^go^eb^saddassa pana ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā ca vavatthapetabbā.

[03] ^b^āpa^eb^sadde ācariyānaṃ liṅgavacanavasena matibhedo vijjati, tasmā taṃmatena tassa ^b^purisa^eb^naye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā bhavati. ``aṅguttarāpesū''ti ^b^pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ``mahiyā pana nadiyā uttarena āpo''ti vuttaṃ, ^b^ṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ pana taṃ ulliṅgitvā ``mahiyā nadiyā āpo tassa janapadassa uttarena honti, tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpo''ti vuttaṃ. evaṃ ^b^āpa^eb^saddassa ekantena itthiliṅgatā bahuvacanatā ca ācariyehi icchitā, tesaṃ mate ^b^āpo^eb^iti itthiliṅge paṭhamābahuvacanarūpe honte dutiyātatiyāpañcamīsattamīnaṃ bahuvacanarūpāni kīdisāni siyuṃ. tathā hi ``purise, purisehi purisebhi purisesū''ti rūpavato pulliṅgassa viya ^b^o^eb^kārantitthiliṅgassa ekāra^b^ehi^eb^ kārādiyuttāni rūpāni katthacipi na dissanti. ato tesaṃ mate padamālānayo atīva dukkaro.

[03] ^b^iccāpa^eb^saddassa ^a^M0.0144^ea^ itthiliṅgabahuvacanantatā veyyākaraṇānaṃ mataṃ nissāya anumatāti veditabbā. ^b^aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^āpo^eb^ iti saddassa napuṃsakaliṅgekavacanavasena vutto payogo diṭṭho ``omattaṃ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ jāta''nti. ^b^jātakapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ tu tassekavacanantatā diṭṭhā. tathā hi ``suciṃ sugandhaṃ salilaṃ, āpo tatthābhisandatī''ti. imasmiṃ padese ^b^āpo^eb^ iti saddo ekavacanaṭṭhāne ṭhito diṭṭho. kecettha vadeyyuṃ ``āpoti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ salilaṃ suci sugandhaṃ hutvā tattha abhisandatīti ^b^salilaṃ^eb^saddavasena ekavacanappayogo kato, na nāmasaddavasena. āpasaddo hi ekantenitthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacananto ca. tathā hi `āpo tatthābhisandantī'ti bahuvacanavasena tappayogo vattabbopi chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ vacanavipallāsavasena niddiṭṭho''ti. tanna, ``āpo tatthābhisandare''ti vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā ``tāni ajja padissare''ti bahuvacanappayogā viya. yasmā evaṃ na vuttaṃ, yasmā ca pana pāḷiyaṃ ``āpo labbhati, tejo labbhati, vāyo labbhatī''ti ekavacanappayogo dissati, tasmā ``āpo''ti saddassa ekavacanantatā paccakkhato diṭṭhāti.

[03] athāpi ce vadeyyuṃ -- nanu pāḷiyaṃyeva tassa bahuvacanantatā paccakkhato diṭṭhā ``āpo ca devā pathavī ca, tejo vāyo tadāgamu''nti? tampi na. ettha hi ``devā''ti saddaṃ apekkhitvā ``āgamu''nti bahuvacanappayogo kato, na ``āpo''ti saddaṃ. yadi ``āpo''ti saddaṃ sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā, ``pathavī''ti ``tejo''ti ``vāyo''ti ca saddampi sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā ^a^M0.0145^ea^. evaṃ sante ^b^pathavī tejo vāyo^eb^saddāpi bahuvacanakabhāvamāpajjeyyuṃ, na pana āpajjanti. na hete bahuvacanakā, atha kho ekavacanakā eva. rūḷhīvasena te pavattā pakatiāpādīsu atthesu appavattanato. tathā hi āpokasiṇādīsu parikammaṃ katvā nibbattā devā ārammaṇavasena ``āpo''tiādināmaṃ labhantīti. evaṃ vuttāpi te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ ``nanu ca bho `aṅguttarāpesū'ti bahuvacanapāḷi dissatī''ti? te vattabbā -- asampathamavatiṇṇā tumhe, na hi tumhe saddappavattiṃ jānātha, ``aṅguttarāpesū''ti bahuvacanaṃ pana ``kurūsu aṅgesu aṅgānaṃ magadhāna''ntiādīni bahuvacanāni viya rūḷhīvasena ekassāpi janapadassa vuttaṃ, na āpasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sandhāya. ``aṅguttarāpesū''ti ettha hi āpasaṅkhāto attho upasajjanībhūto, pulliṅgabahuvacanena pana vutto janapadasaṅkhāto atthoyeva padhāno ``āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo''ti ettha samaṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ upasajjanakaṃ katvā pavattassa ^b^āgatasamaṇa^eb^saddassa saṅghārāmasaṅkhāto attho viya, tasmā āpasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā yo aṅguttarāpo nāma janapado, tasmiṃ aṅguttarāpesu janapadeti attho veditabbo. tathā hi ``aṅguttarāpesu viharati āpaṇaṃ nāma aṅgānaṃ nigamo''ti pāḷi dissati. tattha uttarena mahāmahiyā nadiyā āpo yesaṃ te uttarāpā, aṅgā ca te uttarāpā cāti aṅguttarāpā, tesu aṅguttarāpesu. evaṃ ekasmiṃ janapadeyeva bahuvacanaṃ na āpasaṅkhāte atthe, tena ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ ``tasmiṃ aṅguttarāpesu janapade''ti. evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā bhavissanti.

[03] tathāpi ye evaṃ vadanti ^b^``āpa^eb^saddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanakocā''ti. te pucchitabbā ``kiṃ paṭicca tumhe āyasmanto ^b^`āpa^eb^saddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā'ti vadathā''ti ^a^M0.0146^ea^? te evaṃ puṭṭhā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ -- ``aṅgāyeva so janapado, mahiyā pana nadiyā uttarena āpo, tāsaṃ avidūrattā uttarāpoti vuccatī''ti ca ``mahiyā pana nadiyā āpo tassa janapadassa uttarena honti, tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpoti vuccatī''ti ca evaṃ pubbācariyehi abhisaṅkhato saddaracanāviseso dissati, tasmā itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā''ti vadāmāti. saccaṃ dissati, so pana saddasatthe veyyākaraṇānaṃ mataṃ gahetvā abhisaṅkhato, saddasatthañca nāma na sabbathā buddhavacanassopakārakaṃ, ekadesena pana hoti, tasmā kaccāyanappakaraṇe icchitānicchitasaṅgahavivajjanaṃ kātuṃ ``jinavacanayuttañhi, liṅgañca nippajjate''ti lakkhaṇāni vuttāni.

[03] yadi ca ^b^āpa^eb^saddo itthiliṅgabahuvacanako, kathaṃ ^b^āpo^eb^ti padaṃ sijjhatīti? ^b^āpa^eb^saddato paṭhamā^b^yo^eb^vacanaṃ katvā ^b^tasso^eb^kārādesañca katvā ^b^āpo^eb^ti padaṃ sijjhati ``gāvo''ti padamivāti. visamamidaṃ nidassanaṃ, ``gāvo''ti padañhi ni^b^cco^eb^kārantena ^b^go^eb^saddena sambhūtaṃ. tathā hi ^b^yo^eb^mhi pare ^b^go^eb^saddanta^b^ssāvā^eb^desaṃ katvā tato ^b^yo^eb^na^b^mo^eb^kārādesaṃ katvā ``gāvo''ti nipphajjati, ^b^āpa^eb^sadde pana dve ādesā na santi. buddhavacanañhi patvā ^b^āpa^eb^saddo ^b^a^eb^kārantatāpakatiko jāto, na aññathāpakatikoti.
