[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0207^ea^ ^b^mahārāja^eb^saddassa ^b^o^eb^kārantatte siddhe ``mahārājā, mahārājasmā, mahārājamhā''ti pañcamiyā ekavacanañca ``mahārāje, mahārājasmiṃ, mahārājamhī''ti sattamiyā ekavacanañca siddhāni eva honti pāḷiyaṃ avijjamānānampi nayavasena gahetabbattā. ``rājena, rājassā''tiādīni pana nayavasena gahetabbāni na honti. kasmāti ce? yasmā ``rājā brahmā sakhā attā''iccevamādīni ``puriso urago''tiādīni viya aññamaññaṃ sabbathā sadisāni na honti. tathā hi nesaṃ ``raññā brahmunā sakhinā attanā attena sānā pumunā''tiādīni visadisānipi rūpāni bhavanti, tasmā tāni na sakkā nayavasena jānituṃ. evaṃ dujjānattā pana pāḷiyaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu ca yathārutapadāneva gahetabbāni. ^b^mahārāja^eb^saddādīnaṃ pana ^b^o^eb^kārantabhāve siddheyeva ^b^``purisa^eb^nayogadhā ime saddā''ti nayaggahaṇaṃ dissati, tasmā amhehi nayavasena ``mahārājā, mahārājasmā''tiādīni vuttāni. yathā hi --
[22] yassa te kaḍḍhamānassa, hatthā daṇḍona muccatī''ti

[07] ettha ``hatthā''ti, ``attadaṇḍā bhayaṃ jāta''nti ettha pana ``daṇḍā''ti ca ^b^o^eb^kārantassa pañcamiyekavacanassa dassanato ``uragā, paṭaṅgā, vihagā''tiādīnipi ^b^o^eb^kārantāni pañcamiyekavacanāni gahetabbāni honti. yathā ca ``dāṭhini mātimaññavho, siṅgālo mama pāṇado''ti ettha ``maññavho''ti, ``suddhā suddhehi saṃvāsaṃ, kappayavho patissatā''ti ettha pana ``kappayavho''ti ca kriyāpadassa dassanato ``gacchavho, bhuñjavho, sayavho''tiādīnipi gahetabbāni honti. gaṇhanti ca tādisāni padarūpāni sāsane sukusalā kusalā, tasmā amhehipi nayaggāhavasena ``mahārājā ^a^M0.0208^ea^, mahārājasmā''tiādīni vuttāni. nayaggāhavasena pana gahaṇe asati kathaṃ nāmikapadamālā paripuṇṇā bhavissanti, satiyeva tasmiṃ paripuṇṇā bhavanti.

[03] tathā hi buddhavacane anekasatasahassāni nāmikapadāni kriyāpadāni ca pāṭiekkaṃ pāṭiekkaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanakāhi sattahi aṭṭhahi vā nāmavibhattīhi channavutiyā ca ākhyātikavacanehi yojitāni na santi, nayavasena pana santiyeva, iti nayavasena ``mahārājā, mahārājasmā''tiādīni amhehi ṭhapitāni. ``mahārājā tiṭṭhanti, mahārājā tumhe tiṭṭhathā''ti imāni pana ``atha kho cattāro mahārājā mahatiyā ca yakkhasenāya mahatiyā ca kumbhaṇḍasenāyā''ti dassanato,

[07] dassanato ca vuttāni. ``mahārāja''ntiādīnipi pāḷiñca pāḷinayañca disvā eva vuttāni. asamāse ``rājaṃ, rājenā''tiādīni na passāma, tasmā suṭṭhu vicāretabbamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ. idañhi duddasaṃ vīrajātinā jānitabbaṭṭhānaṃ. sace panāyasmanto buddhavacane vā porāṇikāsu vā aṭṭhakathāsu asamāse ``rājaṃ, rājenā''tiādīni passeyyātha, tadā sādhukaṃ manasi karotha. ko hi nāma sabbappakārena buddhavacane vohārappabhedaṃ jānituṃ samattho aññatra pabhinnapaṭisambhidehi mahākhīṇāsavehi.

[03] brahmā ^a^M0.0209^ea^, brahmā, brahmāno. brahmānaṃ, brahmaṃ, brahmāno. brahmunā, brahmehi, brahmebhi, brahmūhi, brahmūbhi. brahmassa, brahmuno, brahmānaṃ, brahmūnaṃ. brahmunā, brahmehi, brahmebhi, brahmūhi, brahmūbhi. brahmassa, brahmuno, brahmānaṃ, brahmūnaṃ. brahmani, brahmesu, bho brahma, bho brahme, bhavanto brahmāno.

[03] ^b^yamakamahāthera^eb^ruciyā ``bho brahmā''iti bahuvacanaṃ vā. ettha pana ``paṇḍitapurisehi devehi brahmūhī''ti ^b^ṭīkā^eb^vacanassa dassanato, ``brahmūnaṃ vacīghoso hotī''ti ca ``brahmūnaṃ vimānādīsu chandarāgo kāmāsavo na hotī''ti ca ^b^aṭṭhakathā^eb^vacanassa dassanato, ``vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ na bhāsiṃ, dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme''ti āhaccabhāsitassa ca dassanato ``brahmūhi, brahmūbhi, brahmūnaṃ, brahme''ti padāni vuttāni, etāni cūḷaniruttiniruttipiṭakakaccāyanesu na āgatāni.

[03] sakhā, sakhā, sakhino, sakhāno, sakhāyo. sakhaṃ, sakhāraṃ, sakhānaṃ, sakhino, sakhāno, sakhāyo. sakhinā, sakhārehi, sakhārebhi, sakhehi, sakhebhi. sakhissa, sakhino, sakhīnaṃ, sakhārānaṃ, sakhānaṃ. sakhārasmā, sakhinā, sakhārehi, sakhārebhi, sakhehi, sakhebhi. sakhissa, sakhino, sakhīnaṃ, sakhārānaṃ, sakhānaṃ. sakhe, sakhesu, sakhāresu. bho sakha, bho sakhā, bho sakhi, bho sakhī, bho sakhe, bhavanto sakhino, sakhāno, sakhāyo.

[03] ^b^yamakamahāthera^eb^matena ``bho sakhā''iti bahuvacanaṃ vā. pāḷiyaṃ pana ^b^suvaṇṇakakkaṭajātake^eb^ ``hare sakhā kissa nu maṃ jahāsī''ti dīghavasena vutto ^b^sakhā^eb^saddo ālapanekavacanaṃ, tasmā yamakamahātheranayo na yujjatīti ce ^a^M0.0210^ea^? no na yujjati. yasmā ``netādisā sakhā honti, labbhā me jīvato sakhā''ti ^b^manojajātake sakhā^eb^saddo ekavacanampi hoti bahuvacanampi. tathā hi tattha paṭhamapāde bahuvacanaṃ, dutiyapāde panekavacanaṃ, tasmā yamakamahātherena paccattālapanabahuvacanaṭṭhāne ^b^sakhā^eb^saddo vutto. ettha ca ``sabbamitto sabbasakho, sabbabhūtānukampako''ti pāṭhānulomena samāse labbhamānassa ^b^sakha^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā bhavati ``sabbasakho, sabbasakhā, sabbasakhaṃ, sabbasakhe''tiādinā ^b^purisa^eb^nayena. tatrāyaṃ samāsaviggaho -- sabbesaṃ janānaṃ sakhā, sabbe vā janā sakhino etassāti sabbasakho, yathā sabbaverīti.

[03] attā, attā, attāno. attānaṃ, attaṃ, attāno. attanā, attena, attanehi, attanebhi. attano, attānaṃ. attanā, attanehi, attanebhi. attano, attānaṃ. attani, attanesu. bho atta, bhavanto attā, bhonto attāno.
[03] ettha pana attaṃ niraṅkatvāna piyāni sevati.

[07] pāḷīsu ``atta''nti dassanato ``atta''nti idha vuttaṃ, ``attena vā attaniyena vā''ti pāḷidassanato pana ``attenā''ti. ^b^cūḷaniruttiyaṃ^eb^ pana ``attassā''ti catutthīchaṭṭhīnamekavacanaṃ āgataṃ, etaṃ kaccāyane niruttipiṭake ca na dissati. katthaci pana ``attesū''ti āgataṃ. sabbānetāni sāṭṭhakathaṃ jinatantiṃ oloketvā gahetabbāni.
[03] ``ātumā ^a^M0.0211^ea^, ātumā, ātumāno. ātumānaṃ, ātumaṃ, ātumāno. ātumena, ātumehi, ātumebhī''tiādinā ^b^purisa^eb^nayena vatvā ``bho ātuma, bhavanto ātumā, ātumāno''ti vattabbaṃ.
[03] tatra ^b^atta^eb^saddassa samāse ``bhāvitatto, bhāvitattā. bhāvitattaṃ, bhāvitatte. bhāvitattena, bhāvitattehi, bhāvitattebhī''ti ^b^purisa^eb^nayeneva nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
[03] sā, sā, sāno. sānaṃ, sāne. sānā, sānehi, sānebhi. sāssa, sānaṃ. sānā, sānehi, sānebhi. sāssa, sānaṃ. sāne, sānesu. bho sā, bhavanto sāno. ^b^sā^eb^ vuccati sunakho.

[03] ettha ca ``na yattha sā upaṭṭhito hoti. sāva vārenti sūkara''nti nidassanapadāni. keci pana ^b^sā^eb^saddassa dutiyātatiyādīsu ``saṃ, se. senā''tiādīni rūpāni vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. na hi tāni ``saṃ, se. senā''tiādīni rūpāni buddhavacane ceva aṭṭhakathādīsu ca niruttipiṭake ca dissanti. evaṃ pana ^b^niruttipiṭake^eb^ vuttaṃ ``sā tiṭṭhati, sāno tiṭṭhanti. sānaṃ passati, sāne passati. sānā kataṃ, sānehi kataṃ, sānebhi kataṃ. sāssa dīyate, sānaṃ dīyate. sānā nissaṭaṃ, sānehi nissaṭaṃ, sānebhi nissaṭaṃ. sāssa pariggaho, sānaṃ pariggaho. sāne patiṭṭhitaṃ, sānesu patiṭṭhitaṃ. bho sā, bhavanto sāno''ti, tasmā niruttipiṭake vuttanayeneva nāmikapadamālā gahetabbā.

[03] atridaṃ ^a^M0.0212^ea^ vattabbaṃ -- yathā ``sehi dārehi asantuṭṭho''tiādīsu pulliṅge vattamānassa ``sako''iti atthavācakassa sasaddassa ``attano ayanti so''ti etasmiṃ atthe ``so, sā. saṃ, se. sena, sehi, sebhi. sassa, sānaṃ. sā, sasmā, samhā, sehi, sebhi. sassa, sānaṃ. se, sasmiṃ, samhi, sesū''ti ^b^purisa^eb^nayena rūpāni bhavanti, na tathā sunakhavācakassa ^b^sā^eb^saddassa rūpāni bhavanti. yathā vā ``hiṃsanti attasambhūtā, tacasāraṃva saṃ phalaṃ. sāni kammāni tappenti, kosalaṃ sena'santuṭṭhaṃ, jīvaggāhaṃ agāhayī''tiādīsu napuṃsakaliṅge vattamānassa sakamiccatthavācakassa ^b^sa^eb^saddassa ``saṃ, sāni, sā. saṃ, sāni, se. sena, sehi, sebhi. sassa, sānaṃ. sā, sasmā, samhā, sehi, sebhi. sassa, sānaṃ. se, sasmiṃ, samhi, sesū''ti ^b^citta^eb^nayena rūpāni bhavanti, na tathā sunakhavācakassa ^b^sā^eb^saddassa rūpāni bhavanti. evaṃ sante kasmā tehi ācariyehi dutiyātatiyāṭhāne ``saṃ, se. senā''ti vuttaṃ, kasmā ca pañcamīṭhāne ``sā, sasmā, samhā''ti vuttaṃ, sattamīṭhāne ca ``se, sasmiṃ, samhī''ti ca vuttaṃ? sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ, takkagāhamattena gahitaṃ akāraṇaṃ. sunakhavācako hi ^b^sā^eb^saddo ^b^ā^eb^kārantatāpakatiko, na ^b^purisa citta^eb^saddādayo viya ^b^a^eb^kārantatāpakatiko. yāya imassa īdisāni rūpāni siyuṃ, sā ca pakati natthi. na ceso ``rājā, brahmā, sakhā, attā'' iccevamādayo viya paṭhamaṃ ^b^a^eb^kārantabhāve ṭhatvā pacchā paṭiladdha^b^ā^eb^kārantatā, atha kho nicca^b^mo^eb^kārantatāpakatiko ^b^go^eb^saddo viya nicca^b^mā^eb^kārantatāpakatiko. nicca^b^mā^eb^kārantatāpakatikassa ca ^b^e^eb^varūpāni rūpāni na bhavanti, tasmā ^b^niruttipiṭake^eb^ pabhinnapaṭisambhidena āyasmatā ^b^mahākaccāyanena^eb^ na vuttāni. sacepi maññeyyuṃ ``attaṃ, attenā'ti ^a^M0.0213^ea^ ca dassanato `saṃ, senā'ti imāni pana gahetabbānī''ti. na gahetabbāni ``rājā, brahmā, sakhā, attā, sā, pumā''iccevamādīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ padamālāvasena visadisattā nayavasena gahetabbākārassa asambhavato. īdise hi ṭhāne nayaggāhavasena gahaṇaṃ nāma sadosaṃyeva siyā, tasmā nayaggāhavasenapi na gahetabbāni.

[03] aparampi atra vattabbaṃ -- yathā hi ``sāhi nārīhi te yantī''ti vutte ``attano nārī''ti, ``sā nārī''ti evaṃ atthavato itthiliṅgassa ^b^kaññā^eb^saddena sadisassa ^b^sā^eb^saddassa ``sā, sā, sāyo. saṃ, sā, sāyo. sāya, sāhi, sābhi. sāya, sānaṃ. sāya, sāhi, sābhi. sāya, sānaṃ. sāya, sāyaṃ, sāsū''ti ^b^kaññā^eb^nayena rūpāni bhavanti, na tathā imassa sunakhavācakassa ^b^sā^eb^saddassa rūpāni bhavanti. evaṃ sante kasmā te ācariyā tatiyābahuvacanaṭṭhāne ca ``sāhi, sābhī''ti rūpāni icchanti, kasmā ca sattamībahuvacanaṭṭhāne ``sāsū''ti? idampi akāraṇaṃ ^b^ā^eb^kārantapulliṅgattā. kasmā ca pana catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanaṭṭhāne pubbakkharassa rassavasena ``sassa''iti rūpaṃ icchanti? idampi akāraṇaṃ sunakhavācakassa ^b^sā^eb^saddassa ^b^ā^eb^kārantatāpakatikattā. ^b^ā^eb^kārantatāpakatikassa ca ^b^sā^eb^saddassa yathā ^b^a^eb^kārantatāpakatikassa ^b^purisa^eb^saddassa ``purisassā''ti catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanarūpaṃ bhavati evarūpassa rūpassa abhāvato. teneva āyasmā kaccāno ^b^niruttipiṭake^eb^ sunakhavācakassa ^b^sā^eb^saddassa rūpaṃ dassento catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanaṭṭhāne pubbakkharassa dīghavasena ``sāssa''iti rūpamāha. kasmā ca pana te ācariyā catutthekavacanaṭṭhāne ``sāya''iti rūpaṃ icchanti? idampi akāraṇaṃ, ṭhapetvā hi ^b^ā^eb^kārantitthiliṅge ^b^gha^eb^saññato ^b^ā^eb^kārato paresaṃ ^b^nā^eb^dīnaṃ ^b^āyā^eb^desañca ^b^a^eb^kārantato punnapuṃsakaliṅgato ^a^M0.0214^ea^ parassa catutthekavacanassa ^b^āyā^eb^desañca ^b^ā^eb^kārantapulliṅge a^b^gha^eb^to ^b^ā^eb^kārantato parassa catutthekavacanassa katthacipi ^b^āyā^eb^deso na dissati. ^b^niruttipiṭake^eb^ ca tādisaṃ rūpaṃ na vuttaṃ, avacanaṃyeva yuttataraṃ buddhavacane aṭṭhakathādīsu ca anāgamanato. yā panamhehi niruttipiṭakaṃ nissāya buddhavacanañca sunakhavācakassa ^b^sā^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā vuttā, sāyeva sārato paccetabbā. etthāpi nānāatthesu vattamānānaṃ liṅgattayapariyāpannānaṃ ^b^sā so saṃ^eb^iccetesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālāsu padānaṃ sadisāsadisatā daṭṭhabbā.

[03] ettha siyā -- yo tumhehi ^b^sā^eb^saddo ^b^``taṃ^eb^saddatthe ca sunakhe ca sakamiccatthe ca vattatī''ti icchito, kathaṃ taṃ ``sā''ti vutteyeva ``imassa atthassa vācako''ti jānantīti? na jānanti, payogavasena pana jānanti lokiyajanā ceva paṇḍitā ca. payogavasena hi ``sā maddī nāgamāruhi, nātibaddhaṃva kuñjara''ntiādīsu ^b^sā^eb^saddassa taṃsaddatthatā viññāyati, evaṃ ^b^sā^eb^saddo ^b^taṃ^eb^saddatthe ca vattati. ``na yattha sā upaṭṭhito hoti. bhagavato sājātimpi sutvā sattā amatarasabhāgino bhavantī''tiādīsu ^b^sā^eb^saddassa sunakhavācakatā viññāyati.

[03] ettha pana ^b^sā^eb^saddassa rassabhāvakaraṇena ``sapāko''ti pāḷi ṭhitāti atthaṃ aggahetvā ``sānaṃ sunakhānaṃ idaṃ maṃsanti sa''miti atthaṃ gahetvā ``saṃ pacatīti sapāko''ti vuttanti ^a^M0.0215^ea^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ``sapākoti sapākacaṇḍālo'' icceva vuttaṃ. tampi etadevatthaṃ dīpeti. evaṃ ^b^sā^eb^saddo sunakhe ca vattati. ``sā dārā jantūnaṃ piyā''ti vutte pana ``sakā dārā sattānaṃ piyā''ti atthadīpanavasena ^b^sā^eb^saddassa sakavācakatā paññāyati. evaṃ ^b^sā^eb^saddo sakamiccatthe ca vattati. iti ^b^sā^eb^saddaṃ payogavasena īdisatthassa vācakoti jānanti. atridaṃ vuccati --
[03] ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ ``na yattha sā upaṭṭhito hotī''ti ekavacanappayogadassanato ca,
[21] ``asantā kira maṃ jammā, tāta tātāti bhāsare.
[07] bahuvacanappayogadassanato ca, ^b^niruttipiṭake^eb^ ``sāno''iccādidassanato ca ``sā, sā, sāno. sānaṃ, sāne. sānā''tiādinā sunakhavācakassa ^b^sā^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā kathitā.

[03] pumā, pumā, pumāno. pumānaṃ, pumāne. pumānā, pumunā, pumena, pumānehi, pumānebhi. pumassa, pumuno, pumānaṃ. pumānā, pumunā, pumānehi, pumānebhi. pumassa, pumuno, pumānaṃ. pumāne, pumānesu. bho puma, bhavanto pumā, pumāno. ``bho pumā''iti bahuvacane nayopi ñeyyo.

[22] yo jānaṃ pucchito pañhaṃ, aññathā naṃ viyākare''ti

[03] tatra yamakamahātherena ālapanavacanaṭṭhāneyeva ``gacchanto, mahanto, caranto''tiādīnaṃ bahuvacanattaṃ kathitaṃ, paccattavacanaṭṭhāne ^a^M0.0223^ea^ ekavacanattaṃ. kehici pana paccattavacanaṭṭhāne ekavacanabahuvacanattaṃ, ālapanavacanaṭṭhāne bahuvacanattaṃyeva kathitaṃ. ``gacchaṃ, mahaṃ, cara''ntiādīnaṃ pana ālapanaṭṭhāne ekavacanattaṃ. mayaṃ pana buddhavacane anekāsu cāṭṭhakathāsu ``gacchanto, mahanto''tiādīnaṃ bahuvacanappayogānaṃ ``gacchaṃ, mahaṃ''iccādīnañca sānusārālapanekavacanappayogānaṃ adassanato ``gacchanto bhāradvājo. sa gacchaṃ na nivattati. mahanto lokasannivāso''tiādīnaṃ pana paccattekavacanappayogānaññeva dassanato tādisāni rūpāni anijjhānakkhamāni viya maññāma. ^b^niruttipiṭake^eb^ paccattālapanaṭṭhāne ``mahanto, bhavanto, caranto''tiādīnaṃ bahuvacanattameva kathitaṃ, na ekavacanattaṃ. tathā hi tattha ``mahaṃ bhavaṃ caraṃ tiṭṭha''nti gāthaṃ vatvā ``mahaṃ tiṭṭhati, mahanto tiṭṭhantī''ti ca, ``bho mahā, bhavanto mahanto''ti ca, ``bhavaṃ tiṭṭhati, bhavanto tiṭṭhantī''ti ca ādi vuttaṃ.

[03] ettha pana ``bhavaṃ, bhavanto''ti padāni yattha ``honto hontā''ti kriyatthaṃ na vadanti, tattha ``bhavaṃ kaccāno. mā bhavanto evaṃ avacutthā''tiādīsu viya aññasmiṃ atthe patanato ekavacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti, tasmā ``santo sappurisā loke''ti ettha ``santo''ti padassa viya ``arahanto sammāsambuddhā''ti ettha ``arahanto''ti padassa viya ca ``bhavanto''ti padassa bahuvacanattaṃ nijjhānakkhamaṃ. ``mahanto, caranto, tiṭṭhanto''tiādīnaṃ pana bahuvacanattaṃ na nijjhānakkhamaṃ viya amhe paṭibhāti. na hi katthacipi ``santo, arahanto, bhavanto''ti padavajjitānaṃ ``gacchanto, mahanto, caranto''tiādīnaṃ anekapadasatānaṃ bahuvacanantatāpayoge passāma. tathā hi --
[22] ekassapi bahukatte, pavatti na tu dissati..
[22] gahaṇe sati bahavo, dosā dissanti saccato..
[21] yathekamhi ghare daḍḍhe, daḍḍhā sāmīpikā gharā.

[03] evaṃ santepi yasmā ^b^``niruttipiṭakaṃ^eb^ nāma pabhinnapaṭisambhidena mahākhīṇāsavena ^b^mahākaccāyanena^eb^ kata''nti loke pasiddhaṃ, tasmā idaṃ ṭhānaṃ punappunaṃ upaparikkhitabbaṃ. kiñcāpettha there gāravena evaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi pāḷinayaṃ garuṃ katvā diṭṭhenekavacananayena adiṭṭho bahuvacananayo chaḍḍetabbo. evaṃ sati niggahītantesu nayo sobhano bhavati. ayaṃ pana amhākaṃ ruci --
[21] ``bhavaṃ karaṃ arahaṃ saṃ, mahaṃ'' iti padāni tu.
[21] ``gacchaṃ caraṃ dadaṃ tiṭṭhaṃ, cintayaṃ bhāvayaṃ vadaṃ.
[03] tatra ^a^M0.0225^ea^ tāva ^b^bhavanta^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccati -- ^b^bhavaṃ^eb^saddo hi ``vaḍḍhanto, honto''ti atthepi vadati. tesaṃ vasena ayaṃ nāmikapadamālā.

[03] bhavaṃ, bhavanto, bhavantā. bhavantaṃ, bhavante. bhavantena, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi. bhavantassa, bhavantānaṃ. bhavantā, bhavantasmā, bhavantamhā, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi. bhavantassa, bhavantānaṃ. bhavante, bhavantasmiṃ, bhavantamhi, bhavantesu. he bhavanta, he bhavantā.

[03] tattha ``bhavaṃ, bhavanto''tiādīnaṃ ``vaḍḍhantohonto''tiādinā attho daṭṭhabbo. tathā hi ``suvijāno bhavaṃ hoti. dhammakāmo bhavaṃ hoti. rājā bhavanto nānāsampattīhi modati. kuḷīradaho gaṅgāya ekābaddho, gaṅgāya pūraṇakāle gaṅgodakena pūrati, udake mandī bhavante dahato udakaṃ gaṅgāya otaratī''ti payogā bhavanti, tasmā ayaṃ nāmikapadamālā sārato paccetabbā. ettha ^b^bhavaṃ^eb^saddamattaṃ vajjetvā ^b^gacchamānacaramāna^eb^saddādīsu viya ^b^bhavanta^eb^sadde ``bhavanto, bhavantā''ti ^b^purisa^eb^nayopi labbhati, napuṃsakaliṅge vattabbe ``bhavantaṃ, bhavantānī''ti ^b^citta^eb^nayopi labbhati. evaṃ vaḍḍhanabhavanatthavācakassa ^b^bhavanta^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā veditabbā.

[03] ayañca viseso ``bhavanto''ti padaṃ vaḍḍhanabhavanatthato aññatthe vattamānaṃ bahuvacanameva hoti, yathā ``bhavanto āgacchantī''ti. vaḍḍhanabhavanatthesu vattamānaṃ ekavacanameva. atrime payogā ``anupubbena bhavanto viññutaṃ pāpuṇāti. samaṇena nāma īdisesu kammesu abyāvaṭena bhavitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhavanto hi samaṇo susamaṇo assā''ti. ``bhavaṃ'' iti padaṃ pana ubhayatthāpi ekavacanameva, tasmā ^a^M0.0226^ea^ idāni ``bhavaṃ ānando. bhavanto āgacchanti, appasaddā bhavanto hontu, mā bhonto saddamakatthā''ti evamādipayogadassanavasena vohāravisese pavattaṃ aññaṃ atthaṃ paṭicca aparāpi nāmikapadamālā vuccate --

[03] bhavaṃ, bhavanto, bhonto. bhavantaṃ, bhavante. bhavatā, bhotā, bhavantena, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi. bhavato, bhoto, bhavantassa, bhavantānaṃ, bhavataṃ. bhavatā, bhotā, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi. bhavato, bhoto, bhavantassa, bhavantānaṃ, bhavataṃ. bhavati, bhavante, bhavantasmiṃ, bhavantamhi, bhavantesu. bho, bhavanto, bhonto iti.

[03] ettha pana ``bho''iccādīni tīṇi padāni yasmā vohāravisesapavattāni ālapanapadāni honti, tasmā ``āvuso, bhante''ti padāni viya ^b^bho^eb^saddādiupapadavantāni na bhavanti, ``bho purisa, bhavanto brāhmaṇā, bhonto samaṇā, bho rāja''iccādīsu hi ^b^purisa^eb^saddādayoyeva ^b^bho^eb^saddādi upapadavanto bhavanti. idha ca ``bhavaṃ ānando''ti ettha ^b^bhavaṃ^eb^saddena samānatthāni ``bho, bhavanto, bhonto''ti padāni vuttāni, na pana ``dhammakāmo bhavaṃ hotī''ti ettha ^b^bhavaṃ^eb^saddena samānatthāni. paṭhamasmiñhi naye vaḍḍhanatthavasena ``bho bhavanta, bhavanto bhavantā, bhonto bhavantā''ti ^b^bho^eb^saddādayo ālapanapadānaṃ upapadāni bhavanti, na dutiyasmiṃ naye. āmeḍitavasena pana ``bho bho, bhavanto bhavanto, bhonto bhonto''ti padāni bhavanti yathā ``bhante bhante''ti.

[03] atridaṃ ^b^bhū^eb^dhātuvasena saṅkhepato pāḷinidassanaṃ -- kasmā bhavaṃ vijjanamaraññanissito. kathaṃ panāhaṃ bho taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ jānissāmi. evaṃ bhoti kho ambaṭṭho māṇavo ^a^M0.0227^ea^ brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa paṭissutvā. mā bhavanto evaṃ avacuttha. imaṃ bhonto nisāmetha. evaṃ bho purisa jānāhi, pāpadhammā asaññatā iccevamādi. ettha ``bhavaṃ''iccādīni ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayāni nāmapadānīti veditabbāni.

[03] apica tesu ``bho, bhavanto, bhonto''ti imāni nipātapadānipi hontīti vavatthapetabbaṃ. ``bho purisā''tiādīsu tesaṃ nipātānipātabhāve vivādo na karaṇīyo. ^b^kaccāyanasmiñhi^eb^ ``bho ge tū''ti vuttaṃ. aññattha pana ``āmantanatthe nipāto''tiādi vuttaṃ. tathā hi ^b^niruttimañjūsāyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ ``bhotidaṃ āmantanatthe nipāto. so na kevalaṃ ekavacanameva hoti, atha kho bahuvacanampi hotīti `bho purisā'ti bahuvacanappayogopi gahito. `bhavanto'ti padaṃ pana bahuvacanameva hotīti `purisā'ti puna vutta''nti. pāḷiyañhi aṭṭhakathāsu ca nipātabhūto ^b^bho^eb^saddo ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā dissati, itare pana bahuvacanavaseneva dissanti. tesaṃ tu nipātapadatte rūpanipphādanakiccaṃ natthi. tesu ^b^bho^eb^saddassa nipātapadattā āhaccabhāsite nijjīvālapane itthiliṅgavisayo ``ummujja bho puthusile, pariplava bho puthusile''ti payogopi dissati. atrimā ^b^bho^eb^saddassa pavattiparidīpanī gāthāyo --
[22] jīvaṃva lokiyā loke, ālapanti kadāci tu..
[22] yasmā diṭṭho tato viññū, dviliṅgeyeva taṃ vade..
[21] duppayogaṃ na taṃ yasmā, vohārakusalena ve.
[22] jinena bhāsite dhamme, duppayogā na vijjare..
[03] evaṃ ^b^bhavanta^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā pāḷinayānurūpaṃ dvidhā vibhattā vaḍḍhanabhavanatthatadaññatthavasena.

[03] karaṃ, karonto, karontā. karontaṃ, karonte. karotā, karontena, karontehi, karontebhi. karoto, karontassa, karontānaṃ, karotaṃ. karotā, karontā, karontasmā, karontamhā, karontehi, karontebhi. karoto, karontassa, karontānaṃ, karotaṃ. karonte, karontasmiṃ, karontamhi, karontesu. bho karonta, bhavanto karontāti rūpāni bhavanti.

[03] ``karoto na kariyati pāpa''nti idamettha ^b^karoto^eb^saddassa atthitānidassanaṃ. itthiliṅge vattabbe ``karontī, karontiyo''tiādinā yojetabbāni, napuṃsakaliṅge vattabbe ``karontaṃ, karontānī''tiādinā yojetabbāni.

[03] arahaṃ, arahanto. arahantaṃ, arahante. arahatā, arahantena, arahantehi, arahantebhi. arahato, arahantassa, arahantānaṃ, arahataṃ. arahatā, arahantā, arahantasmā, arahantamhā, arahantehi, arahantebhi. arahato, arahantassa, arahantānaṃ, arahataṃ. arahante, arahantasmiṃ ^a^M0.0230^ea^, arahantamhi, arahantesu. bho arahanta, bhavanto arahanto iti rūpāni bhavanti.

[03] ayaṃ guṇavācakassa ^b^arahanta^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā. ``arahā, arahanto, arahantā''iti ca. etañhi rūpaṃ ^b^samantapāsādikāyaṃ^eb^ manussaviggahaṭṭhāne dissati. uttarimanussadhammapāḷiyaṃ pana ``mayañcamhā anarahanto''ti padaṃ dissati. arahantaṃ, arahante. arahatā, sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. ayaṃ paṇṇattivācakassa ^b^arahanta^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā.

[03] tathā hi ``arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. arahaṃ sugato loke. arahanto sammāsambuddhā''tiādīsu ^b^arahaṃ^eb^saddādayo guṇavācakā. ``arahā ahosi. ahañhi arahā loke. eko arahā, ekasaṭṭhi arahanto loke ahesuṃ.
[21] gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale.

[03] mayañcamhā anarahanto''tiādīsu ^b^arahā^eb^saddādayo paṇṇattivācakāti daṭṭhabbā. idha itthinapuṃsakaliṅgavasena visuṃ vattabbanayo appasiddho. yadi evaṃ āsavakkhayaṃ pattā itthī kathaṃ vattabbā, āsavakkhayaṃ pattaṃ cittaṃ kathaṃ vattabbanti? itthī tāva ``yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho''ti vacanato ``araha''nti vattabbā guṇavasena, paṇṇattivasena pana ``itthī arahā ahosī''ti vattabbā. cittaṃ pana guṇavaseneva ``arahaṃ citta''nti vattabbanti.

[03] saṃ, santo, santo, santā. saṃ, santaṃ, sante. satā, santena, santehi, santebhi, sabbhi. sato, santassa, santānaṃ, sataṃ, satānaṃ. satā, santā, santasmā, santamhā, santehi, santebhi, sabbhi. sato, santassa, santānaṃ, sataṃ, satānaṃ. sati, sante, santasmiṃ, santamhi, santesu. bho santa, bhavanto santoti rūpāni bhavanti.

[03] ettha pana ``addhā hi tāta satanesa dhammo''ti ^b^jayaddisajātaka^eb^pāḷidassanato ``satāna''nti vuttaṃ. tattha hi ^b^satanesā^eb^ti satānaṃ esāti chedo, rassattaniggahītasaralopavasena ca rūpaniṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. tathā hi tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ``addhā ekaṃsena esa tāta satānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ dhammo sabhāvo''ti attho vutto. ayaṃ ye loke ``sappurisā''ti ca ``ariyā''ti ca ``paṇḍitā''ti ca vuccanti, tesaṃ vācakassa ^b^santa^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā. tappaṭisedhassa pana asaṃ, asanto, katthaci asantā iccapi. tathā hi ``asantā kira maṃ jammā, tāta tātāti bhāsare''ti pāḷi dissati. ``asaṃ, asantaṃ, asante. asatā''tiādinā yojetabbā. imasmiṃ atthe ``santo, asanto''timāni bahuvacanakāniyeva bhavanti, na katthacipi ekavacanakāni. kasmā? paṇṇattivācakattā. aññatra pana ``santo, danto''tiādīsu ekavacanāniyeva ṭhapetvā vijjamānatthavācaka^b^santo^eb^saddaṃ, kasmā? apaṇṇattivācakattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03] idāni paṇṇattivācakānaṃ tesaṃ kānici payogāni kathayāma --

[03] sameti ^a^M0.0232^ea^ asatā asaṃ. yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ. na sā sabhā yattha na santi santo. asanto nirayaṃ yanti, santo saggaparāyaṇā. asante nopaseveyya, sante seveyya paṇḍito. sabbhireva samāsetha. sataṃ dhammo iccevamādīni bhavanti.

[03] yo panamhehi padamālāyaṃ ``sabbhī''ti ayaṃ saddo tatiyāpañcamībahuvacanavasena yojito, so ca kho ^b^santa^eb^iti ^b^a^eb^kārantapakativasena, aññattha pana ``sabbhī''ti ^b^i^eb^kārantapakativasena yojetabbo. tathā hi ^b^sabbhī^eb^ti sappuriso nibbānañca, sundarādhivacanaṃ vā etaṃ sabbhīti. sabbo cāyamattho sāṭṭhakathāya ``bahumpetaṃ asabbhi jātavedā''ti imāya pāḷiyā ``santo have sabbhi pavedayantī''ti imāya ca dīpetabbo.

[03] atrāyaṃ yojanā -- bho sabbhi tiṭṭha, sabbhi tiṭṭhati, sabbhi saha gacchati, sabbhi apehi, asabbhirūpo puriso. yasmā panāyaṃ sāsanānukūlā, tasmā imissā tadanukūlattaṃ dassetuṃ idha sāsanato payoge dassessāma atakkāvacare vicitte sugatapāḷinaye sotūnaṃ visāradamatipaṭilābhatthaṃ. taṃ yathā? bahumpetaṃ asabbhi jātaveda, yaṃ taṃ vāladhinā'bhipūjayāma. sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṃ. yaṃ sālavanasmiṃ senako, pāpakammamakari asabbhirūpaṃ. ābādhoyaṃ asabbhirūpo. asammodako thaddho asabbhirūpo''ti ^a^M0.0233^ea^. tattha ālapanavacane diṭṭheyeva paccattavacanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatampi diṭṭhameva hoti. tathā karaṇavacane diṭṭheyeva nissakkavacanampi diṭṭhameva hoti. samāse saddarūpe diṭṭheyeva byāse saddarūpaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti ṭhapetvā ``hetusatthāradassana''ntiādīni. tattha ca nibbānavācako ce, ^b^sabbhi^eb^saddo itthiliṅgo ^b^santivisuddhi nibbuti^eb^saddā viya, so ca ^b^yamakamahāthera^eb^mate ^b^ratti^eb^nayena yojetabbo. sabbesamikārantitthiliṅgānaṃ sādhāraṇo hi so nayo. sundaratthavācako ce, ^b^aggi ratti aṭṭhi^eb^nayehi yojetabbo vāccaliṅgattā. ``sabbhidhammabhūtaṃ nibbāna''nti ettha hi sundaradhammabhūtaṃ nibbānanti attho. evaṃ pāḷinayavasena ālapanādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu ^b^sabbhi^eb^saddassa pavattiṃ ñatvā puna aṭṭhakathānayavasenapi tappavatti veditabbā. kathaṃ? yasmā sagāthāvaggassa ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ``santo `sabbhīhi saddhiṃ sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ upetī'ti pavedayantī''ti imasmiṃ padese ``sabbhīhī''ti ^b^hi^eb^vacanavasena saddaracanāviseso aṭṭhakathācariyehi dassito, tasmā ^b^sabbhi^eb^saddo sabbesupi vibhattivacanesu yojetabbo. atridaṃ vadāma --

[03] ``ovadeyyānusāseyya ^a^M0.0234^ea^, asabbhā ca nivāraye''ti ettha pana ``asabbhā''tipadaṃ vicitravuttīsu taddhitapaccayesu ^b^ṇya^eb^paccayavasena nipphattimupāgatanti veditabbaṃ. kathaṃ? yebhuyyena asabbhīsu bhavaṃ asabbhaṃ. kiṃ taṃ? akusalaṃ, tato asabbhā akusaladhammā nivāraye ca, kusaladhamme patiṭṭhapeyyāti attho. ``amhe asabbhāhi vācāhi vikkosamānā tibbāhi sattīhi hanissantī''ti ettha tu asabbhīnaṃ etāti asabbhā, na vā sabbhīnaṃ etātipi asabbhāti nibbacanaṃ, ^b^ṇya^eb^paccayavasena ca padasiddhi veditabbā. yā ca panettha amhehi santasaddassa ``saṃ, santo. saṃ, santaṃ, sante''tiādinā padamālā dassitā, tattha ``sameti asatā asa''nti pāḷiyaṃ ``asa''nti pade diṭṭheyeva ``sa''nti padaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anāgatampi diṭṭhameva hoti yugaḷabhāvena vijjamānatārahattā. evaṃ diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. atha vā ``asa''nti ettha na saṃ asanti samāsaviggahavasenādhigantabbattā ``sa''miti padaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. evamaññatrāpi nayo. tatra ^b^sa^eb^nti sappuriso. ^b^asa^eb^nti asappuriso. itthiliṅgevattabbe ``asatī, asā''ti rūpāni bhavanti. ``asatī, asatī, asatiyo, asā. asatiṃ, asatī, asatiyo. asāya, asatiyā, asatīhi, asatībhi. asatiyā, asatīna''nti vakkhamāna ^b^itthi^eb^nayena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.

[03] ettha pana ``asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati. mā ca vasaṃ asatīnaṃ nigacche''tiādīni dassetabbāni. ^b^asā^eb^ti cettha ^b^asatī^eb^ti ca samānatthā, asantajātikāti hi tesaṃ attho. yasmā pana ^b^jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ``asā^eb^ti asatiyo lāmikā, atha vā sātaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ, taṃ tāsu natthi, attani paṭibaddhacittānaṃ asātameva dentītipi asā ^a^M0.0235^ea^, dukkhā, dukkhavatthubhūtāti attho''ti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ, tasmā sātaṃ natthi etissanti ^b^asā^eb^ti atthe ``asā''ti padassa yathā ritto assādo etthāti ^b^rittassa^eb^ntipadassa luttuttarakkharassa ``rittassaṃ, rittassāni. rittassa''nti ^b^citta^eb^nayena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā, tathā ``asā, asā, asāyo. asaṃ, asā, asāyo. asāyā''ti ^b^kaññā^eb^nayena yojetabbā.
[03] ettha ca yo amhehi ``santo''iti saddo dassito. so katthaci ekavacanabahuvacanabhāvena ^b^saṃvijjamāna^eb^saddassatthampi vadati, tassa vasena ayaṃ nāmikapadamālā --

[03] santo, santo, santā. santaṃ, sante. satā, santena, santehi, santebhi. sato, santassa, sataṃ, santānaṃ. satā, santā, santasmā, santamhā, santehi, santebhi. sato, santassa, sataṃ, santānaṃ. sati, sante, santasmiṃ, santamhi, santesu. bho santa, bhavanto santo, bhavanto santā.

[03] ettha pana ``ayaṃ kho bhikkhave aṭṭhamo bhaddo assājānīyo santo saṃvijjamāno lokasmiṃ. cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhanti. bhave kho sati jāti hoti''iccevamādīni payogāni bhavanti. ``saṅkhāresu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī''tiādīsu pana ^b^sati^eb^saddo vacanavipallāsavasena ṭhitoti gahetabbo.

[03] tatra ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā ṭhitesu ^b^santo^eb^saddesu bahuvacana^b^santo^eb^saddaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā ^b^samāna^eb^saddassatthampi vadanti, tasmā ^b^``santo^eb^ti samāno, ^b^santā^eb^ti samānā''tiādinā ^a^M0.0236^ea^ attho kathetabbo. ^b^samāno^eb^ti imassa ca ``honto''ti attho ``pahu samāno vipulatthacintī, kiṃ kāraṇā me na karosi dukkha''ntiādīsu viya. payogāni pana --
[22] pahu santo na bharati, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ..
[22] punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā''ti

[03] apica ^b^santo^eb^saddo yasmā ``kilanto''ti ca ``upasanto''ti ca ``niruddho''ti ca atthaṃ vadati, tasmā tesaṃ vasena ^b^santa^eb^saddassa ``santo, santā. santaṃ, sante. santenā''ti ^b^purisa^eb^nayena nāmikapadamālā veditabbā. ettha ca ``santo tasito. dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ. santo danto niyato brahmacārī. santo niruddho atthaṅgato abbhatthaṅgato''tiādīni payogāni. napuṃsakaliṅge vattabbe ``santaṃ, santānī''ti ^b^citta^eb^nayena nāmikapadamālā. sā ca ``saṃvijjamānaṃ samānaṃ kilantaṃ upasantaṃ niruddha''miti atthadīpakāpadavatīti veditabbā. atha vā ``upādāne kho sati bhavo hotī''tiādīsu napuṃsakappayogadassanato ^b^santa^eb^saddassa ^b^saṃvijjamāna^eb^saddatthavācakatte tatiyāpañcamīcatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīṭhāne ``satā, sato, sataṃ, satī''ti padāni adhikāni vattabbāni, sesāni ^b^citta^eb^nayena ñeyyāni. itthiliṅge pana vattabbe ``santā, santā, santāyo. santaṃ, santā, santāyo. santāyā''ti ^b^kaññā^eb^nayena ca, santī, santī, santiyo ^a^M0.0237^ea^. santiṃ, santī, santiyo. santiyā''ti ^b^itthi^eb^nayena ca nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. etāsu paṭhamā ``saṃvijjamānā kilantā upasantā niruddhā''ti atthadīpakāpadavatī, ettha payogā suviññeyyāva. dutiyā pana ``saṃvijjamānā samānā''ti atthadīpakāpadavatī. tathā hi ``santī āpatti āvikātabbā''ti ettha saṃvijjamānā ``santī''ti vuccati.

[07] ettha pana samānā ``santī''ti vuccati. aparāpi itthiliṅge vattabbe padamālā veditabbā. ^b^santī^eb^saddassa hi ^b^saṃvijjamāna^eb^saddatthavācakatte ``jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī''tiādinā itthiliṅgappayogadassanato sattamīṭhāne ``sati, satiyā, satiyaṃ, santiyā, santiyaṃ, santīsū''ti rūpāni vattabbāni. sesāni ^b^itthi^eb^nayena ñeyyāni. ayaṃ tatiyā, ettha ca ``asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabba''nti pāḷi ``santiyā''iccādīnaṃ atthibhāve nidassanaṃ. aparo nayo -- ^b^satī^eb^saddassa ``samānā''ti imasmiṃ atthe ``yā tvaṃ vasasi jiṇṇassa, evaṃ dahariyā satī''ti ca ``ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ sati''nti ca pāḷidassanato ``satī, satī, satiyo. satiṃ, satī, satiyo. satiyā''tiādīnipi rūpāni yojetabbāni, saṃyoge ^b^na^eb^kāralopavasena vā.

[03] idāni ``santo, santā''ti padadvayassa payoganicchayaṃ kathayāma payogesu sotūnaṃ asammūḷhabhāvāya. tathā hi ``sappurisā''ti vā ``paṇḍitā''ti vā bahuvacanavasena atthaṃ ^a^M0.0238^ea^ vattukāmena ``santo danto''ti evaṃ vuttaekavacanasadisaṃ ``santo''ti bahuvacanaṃ vattabbaṃ. ``saṃvijjamāno''ti ekavacanavasena atthaṃ vattukāmena ``santo''ti ekavacanaṃ vattabbaṃ. ``saṃvijjamānā''ti bahuvacanavasena atthaṃ vattukāmena ``santo sappurisā''ti, ``santo saṃvijjamānā''ti ca evaṃ vuttabahuvacanasadisaṃ ``santo''ti vā ``santā''ti vā bahuvacanaṃ vattabbaṃ, ``kilanto''ti vā ``samāno''ti vā ``upasanto''ti vā ``niruddho''ti vā ekavacanavasena atthaṃ vattukāmena ``santo sappurisā''ti evaṃ vuttabahuvacanasadisaṃ ``santo''ti ekavacanaṃ vattabbaṃ. teyevatthe bahuvacanavasena vattukāmena pana ``santā sūnehi pādehi, ko ne hatthe gahessatī''ti ettha viya ``santā''ti bahuvacanaṃ vattabbaṃ. ayaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. idañhi mandabuddhīnaṃ sammohaṭṭhānaṃ. ayampi panettha saṅgaho veditabbo --

[03] mahaṃ, mahā, mahanto, mahantā. mahantaṃ, mahante. mahatā, mahantena, mahantehi, mahantebhi. mahato, mahantassa, mahantānaṃ, mahataṃ. mahatā, mahantā, mahantasmā, mahantamhā, mahantehi, mahantebhi. mahato, mahantassa, mahantānaṃ, mahataṃ. mahati, mahante, mahantasmiṃ, mahantamhi, mahantesu. bho maha, bho mahā, bhavanto mahantoti ayamamhākaṃ ruci.

[03] ettha ``mahanto, mahantā. mahantaṃ, mahante. mahantenā''ti ^b^purisa^eb^nayopi labbhati, tasmā ``bho mahanta, bhavanto mahantā''ti ālapanapadāni yojetabbāni. napuṃsakaliṅge vattabbe ^a^M0.0239^ea^ ``mahantaṃ, mahantānī''ti ^b^citta^eb^nayopi labbhati. itthiliṅge vattabbe ``mahatī, mahatī, mahatiyo. mahatiṃ, mahatī, mahatiyo. mahatiyā, mahatīhi mahatībhī''ti ^b^itthi^eb^nayopi labbhati. ``mahatiyā ca yakkhasenāyā''tiādīnettha nidassanapadāni. aparopi ``mahantā, mahantā, mahantāyo. mahanta''nti ^b^kaññā^eb^nayopi labbhati, ``mahantā nidhikumbhiyo''tiādīnettha nidassanapadāni. ^b^kaccāyane^eb^ pana ``mahantī''iti padaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. taṃ ``guṇavantī, kulavantī''iccādīni viya pāḷiyaṃ appasiddhattā vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.

[03] nanu bho yasmā sāsanepi ``gacchantī, carantī''tiādīni ca ``iddhimantī''ti ca padaṃ dissati, tasmā ``mahantī, guṇavantī''tiādīnipi bhavitabbanti? na bhavitabbaṃ tathārūpassa nayassa vasena aggahetabbattā, ``mahatī, guṇavatī''iccādinayasseva dassanato ca. tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ca ``seyyathāpi nāma mahatī naṅgalasīsā, itthī siyā rūpavatī, sā ca sīlavatī siyā. satimatī cakkhumatī. iddhimatī pattimatī''ti ca ``mahatiṃ senaṃ disvā mahosadhasenā mandā, ayaṃ ativiya mahatī senā dissatī''ti ca ādīni payogāni dissanti, na ``mahantī, rūpavantī''iccādīni.

[03] keci pana ^b^``mahā^eb^iti saddo byāse na labbhati, samāseyeva labbhati `mahāpuriso'ti ettha viyā''ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. ``mahā te upāsaka pariccāgo. mahā vatāyaṃ bhante bhūmicālo. ghoso ca vipulo mahā. bārāṇasirajjaṃ nāma mahā. senā sādissate mahā''ti payogadassanato. evaṃ byāsepi labbhatīti ^a^M0.0240^ea^ veditabbaṃ, tasmā ``mahaṃ, mahā, mahanto, mahantā. bho mahanta, bhavanto mahantā''ti pulliṅge, ``mahantaṃ, mahā, mahantāni. bho mahanta, bhavanto mahantānī''ti napuṃsakaliṅge, ``mahantā, mahā, mahantā, mahantāyo. bhoti mahante, bhotiyo mahantā, mahantāyo''ti itthiliṅge sabbaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ yojetabbaṃ. samāse pana ``mahāsatto mahāupāsako mahāupāsikā mahabbalo mahāvanaṃ mahaggataṃ mahapphalaṃ mahabbhaya''ntiādīni rūpāni bhavanti, taddhite ``mahattano mahattaṃ mahantattaṃ mahantatā''ti rūpāni bhavanti. ^b^gacchanta^eb^saddassa pana ``gacchanto gacchantā''ti rūpāni vatvā sesāni ^b^mahanta^eb^sadde vuttanayena vitthāretvā nāmikapadamālā veditabbā. tathā ``gacchanto, gacchantā''ti ^b^purisa^eb^nayo ca ``gacchantaṃ, gacchantānī''ti ^b^citta^eb^nayo ca ``gacchantī, gacchantī, gacchantiyo''ti ^b^itthi^eb^nayo ca gahetabbo. evaṃ liṅgattayavasena ``caraṃ caranto carantaṃ carantī, dadaṃ dadanto dadantaṃ dadantī''tiādīnaṃ anekapadasahassānaṃ nāmikapadamālā vitthāretabbā.

[03] ye panācariyā ``gacchanto''tiādīnaṃ paccattālapanabahuvacanattañca ``gacchaṃ''iccādīnaṃ ālapanekavacanattañca icchanti, te samamhehi payogo sāsane na diṭṭho nayavasenāgahetabbattā. tasmā tāni ettha na vadāma. ayaṃ pana viseso diṭṭho. seyyathidaṃ?
[21] adhammaṃ ^a^M0.0241^ea^ sārathi kayirā, mañce tvaṃ nikkhanaṃ vane''.

[03] idāni samagatikattepi ``jānaṃ, passa''ntiādīnaṃ liṅgavibhattivacanantaravasena yo viseso dissati, taṃ vadāma. tathā hi ``sā jānaṃyeva āha na jānāmīti, passaṃyeva āha na passāmī''ti evamādīsu ^b^jānaṃ passaṃ^eb^ saddānaṃ ``jānantī passantī''ti liṅgantaravasena parivattanaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. iminā ``gacchaṃ''iti saddassapi yathāpayogaṃ ``gacchantī''ti itthiyā kathanattho labbhati tehi samānagatikattā, na ``gacchanto''ti saddassa ``gacchantī''ti itthiyā kathanattho labbhati tehi asamānagatikattāti kāraṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. ``api nu tumhe āyasmanto ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ viharathā''ti ettha ``jānantā passantā''ti vacanantaravasena parivattanaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. iminā pana ``gacchaṃ''iti saddassapi yathāpayogaṃ ``gacchantā''ti bahuvacanattho labbhati tehi samānagatikattā, na ``gacchante''ti saddassa ``gacchantā''ti bahuvacanattho labbhati tehi asamānagatikattāti kāraṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. esa nayo uttaratrāpi. ``bharanti mātāpitaro, pubbe katamanussara''nti ettha ^b^anussaraṃ^eb^saddassa ``anussarantā''ti vacanantaravasena parivattanaṃ bhavati. ``saddhammo garukātabbo, saraṃ buddhāna sāsana''nti ettha ^b^saraṃ^eb^saddassa sarantenāti vibhattantaravasena parivattanaṃ bhavati. ``phusaṃ bhūtāni saṇṭhānaṃ, manasā gaṇhato ^a^M0.0242^ea^ yathā''ti ettha ^b^phusaṃ^eb^saddassapi ``phusantassā''ti vibhattantaravasena parivattanaṃ bhavati. tathā ``yācaṃ adadamappiyo''ti etthāpi ^b^yācaṃ^eb^saddassa ``yācantassā''ti vibhattantaravasena parivattanaṃ bhavati. ^b^yāca^eb^nti vā yācitabbaṃ dhanaṃ, iminā nayena nānappakārato parivattanaṃ veditabbaṃ. iti ``bhavaṃkara''ntiādīnaṃ visadisapadamālā ca ``gacchaṃ, cara''ntiādīnaṃ sadisapadamālā ca ``jānaṃ, passa''ntiādīnaṃ liṅgavibhattivacanantaravasena katthaci parivattananti ayaṃ tividhopi ākāro ākhyātikapadatthavibhāvanāya saddhiṃ kathito pāvacanavare sotūnaṃ saddesvatthesu ca visāradabuddhipaṭilābhatthaṃ. sabbametañhi sandhāya imā gāthā vuttā --
[21] ``bhavaṃ karaṃ arahaṃ saṃ, mahaṃ''iti padāni tu.
[21] ``gacchaṃ caraṃ dadaṃ tiṭṭhaṃ, cintayaṃ bhāvayaṃ vadaṃ.
[03] apica ayaṃ sabbesampi niggahītantapulliṅgānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ dvīsu liṅgesu chasu vibhattīsu terasasu vacanesu aññataraliṅgavibhattivacanavasena parivattanaṃ. ayampi panettha nīti veditabbā.
[03] idāni ^b^dhanabhūti^eb^iccetassa pakatirūpassa aññesañca taṃsadisānaṃ nāmikapadamālāvibhāgaṃ vakkhāmi pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā.

[03] aggi, aggī, aggayo. aggiṃ, aggī, aggayo. agginā, aggīhi, aggībhi. aggissa, aggino, aggīnaṃ. agginā, aggīhi, aggībhi. aggissa, aggino, aggīnaṃ. aggismiṃ, aggimhi, aggīsu. bho aggi, bho aggī, bhavanto aggayo. ^b^yamakamahāthera^eb^mataṃ.
[03] ettha kiñcāpi nissakkavacanaṭṭhāne ``aggismā, aggimhā''ti imāni nāgatāni, tathāpi tattha tattha taṃsadisappayogadassanato gahetabbāni. ``agginā, aggismā, aggimhā''ti kamo ca veditabbo.

[03] dhanabhūti, dhanabhūtī, dhanabhūtayo. dhanabhūtiṃ, dhanabhūtī, dhanabhūtayo. dhanabhūtinā, dhanabhūtīhi, dhanabhūtībhi. dhanabhūtissa, dhanabhūtino, dhanabhūtīnaṃ. dhanabhūtinā, dhanabhūtismā, dhanabhūtimhā, dhanabhūtīhi, dhanabhūtībhi. dhanabhūtissa, dhanabhūtino, dhanabhūtīnaṃ. dhanabhūtismiṃ, dhanabhūtimhi, dhanabhūtīsu. bho dhanabhūti, bho dhanabhūtī, bhavanto dhanabhūtayo.
[22] gini joti dadhi pāṇi, isi sandhi muni maṇi..
[21] byādhi ^a^M0.0244^ea^ gaṇṭhi ravi muṭṭhi, kavi giri kapi nidhi.
[22] kucchi vatthi vidhi sāli, vīhi rāsi ahi masi..
[21] sāti kesi kimi bondi, bodhi dīpi pati hari.
[22] ari dhani timi kali, sārathyudadhi añjali,

[03] atha vā etesu ^b^adhipati^eb^saddassa ``adhipatiyā sattā''ti pāḷidassanato ``adhipatiyā''ti sattamīrūpampi icchitabbaṃ. apica ``asāre sāramatino''ti pāḷiyaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantasamāsapadato ^b^yo^eb^vacanassa ^b^no^eb^ādesadassanato kvaci ^b^adhipati^eb^iccādīnaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantasamāsapadānaṃ ``adhipatino''tiādināpi paccattopayogarūpāni icchitabbāni ^b^ī^eb^kārantānaṃ daṇḍīsaddādīnaṃ ``daṇḍino''tiādīni paccattopayogasampadānasāmivacanarūpāni viya. ^b^gahapatijānipati^eb^saddādīnaṃ pana samāsapadānampi evarūpāni paccattopayogarūpāni na icchitabbāni ``gahapatayo jānipatayo''tiādinā nayena yathāpāvacanaṃ gahetabbarūpattā. ^b^isi muni^eb^saddānaṃ panālapanaṭṭhāne ``ise, muse''ti rūpantarampi gahetabbaṃ ``putto uppajjataṃ ise. paṭiggaṇha mahāmune''ti dassanato.

[03] ye panettha amhehi ^b^aggini gini^eb^saddā vuttā, tatreke evaṃ vadanti ^b^``aggini^eb^saddo paccattekavacanabhāveyeva labbhati, na paccattabahuvacanabhāve upayogabhāvādīsu vā''ti. keci pana ``pāḷiyaṃ ^b^aggini^eb^saddo nāma natthi, ^b^gini^eb^saddoyeva atthī''ti vadanti. keci ^b^``gini^eb^saddo nāma natthi, ^b^aggini^eb^saddoyevatthī''ti ^a^M0.0245^ea^ vadanti. sabbametaṃ na yujjati ^b^aggini gini^eb^saddānamupalabbhanato, sabbāsupi vibhattīsu dvīsu vacanesu yojetabbatādassanato ca. tathā hi suttanipāte ^b^kokālikasutte^eb^ --

[07] imasmiṃ padese ``aggini''nti upayogavacanaṃ dissati. tenāha aṭṭhakathācariyo ^b^``agginiṃ sampajjalita^eb^nti samantatojālaṃ sabbadisāsu ca sampajjalitamaggi''nti. tatreva ca suttanipāte ^b^kokālikasutte^eb^ --

[07] imasmiṃ padese samāsavisayattā ^b^agginisañjalita^eb^nti agginīhi sañjalitanti attho labbhati, tathā ^b^agginisamāsū^eb^ti agginīhi sadisāsūti atthopi. evaṃ samāsavidhānamukhena ``agginīhī''ti karaṇavacanampi dissati.

[03] ^b^gini^eb^saddopi ca pāḷiyaṃ dissati. tathā hi ``tameva kaṭṭhaṃ dahati, yasmā so jāyate ginī''ti ^b^cūḷabodhicariyāyaṃ gini^eb^saddo diṭṭho. keci panettha sandhivasena ^b^a^eb^kāralopaṃ saññogādissa ca ^b^ga^eb^kārassa lopaṃ vadanti, tampi na yujjati tassā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^``yasmā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0246^ea^ yato kaṭṭhā. ^b^ginī^eb^ti aggī''ti evaṃ ^b^gini^eb^saddassa ulliṅgetvā vacanato. tathā ``channā kuṭi āhito ginī''ti imassa ^b^dhaniyasutta^eb^ssa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^``āhito^eb^ti ābhato jālito vā. ^b^ginī^eb^ti aggī''ti vacanato, tatheva ca ``mahāgini pajjalito, anāhāropasammatī''ti imissā ^b^theragāthāya^eb^ saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ^b^``ginī^eb^ti aggī''ti vacanato. yadi hi ^b^gini^eb^saddo visuṃ na siyā, aṭṭhakathācariyā ``jāyate ginī''tiādīni ``jāyate agginī''tiādinā padacchedavasena atthaṃ vadeyyuṃ. yasmā evaṃ na vadiṃsu, ^b^``ginī^eb^ti aggī''ti pana vadiṃsu, tena ñāyati ^b^``gini^eb^saddopi visuṃ atthī''ti. ye ^b^``gini^eb^saddo natthī''ti vadanti, tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbameva sāsane ginisaddassupalabbhanato. ^b^suttanipātaṭṭhakathā^eb^yañhi ``channā kuṭi āhito ginī''ti pāṭhassa saṃvaṇṇanāyameva ``tesu ṭhānesu aggini `ginī'ti vohariyatī''ti tassa abhidhānantaraṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā mayamettha gāthāracanaṃ karissāma --
[22] tamhi ṭhāne manussānaṃ, bhāsā eva giniccayaṃ..

[03] iti ^b^alābu lābu^eb^saddā viya ^b^aggini gini^eb^saddāpi bhagavato pācane dissantīti veditabbā. yathā pana ^b^aggini^eb^saddassa sabbāsu vibhattīsu dvīsu vacanesu yojetabbatā siddhā, tathā ^b^gini^eb^saddassapi siddhāva hoti. tasmātra --

[03] aggini ^a^M0.0247^ea^, agginī, agginayo. agginiṃ, agginī, agginayo. aggininā, agginīhi, agginībhi. agginissa, agginīnaṃ. aggininā, agginismā, agginimhā, agginīhi, agginībhi. agginissa, agginīnaṃ. agginismiṃ, agginimhi, agginīsu. bho aggini, bhavanto agginī, bhavanto agginayo.

[03] ``gini, ginī, ginayo. giniṃ, ginī, ginayo, gininā''ti sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ. iti pāḷinayānusārena ^b^aggini gini^eb^saddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā yojitā. atha vā yathā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ ^b^satva paddhasvāminī^eb^ti saññogavasena vuttānaṃ saddānaṃ māgadhabhāsaṃ patvā ^b^sattavapadumasuvāminī^eb^ti nissaññogavasena uccāritā pāḷi dissati ``tvañca uttamasattavo''tiādinā, tathā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ ^b^agnī^eb^ti saññogavasena vuttassa māgadhabhāsaṃ patvā ``agginī''ti saññoganakāravasena uccāritā pāḷi dissati ``agginiṃ sampajjalitaṃ pavisantī''tiādikā. yathā ca veyyākaraṇehi sakkaṭabhāsābhūto ^b^agni^eb^saddo sabbāsu vibhattīsu tīsu vacanesu yojiyati, tathā māgadhabhāsābhūto ^b^aggini^eb^saddopi sabbāsu vibhattīsu dvīsu vacanesu yojetabbova hoti, tasmā so idhamhehi yojiyati, ^b^gini^eb^saddopi ^b^aggini^eb^saddena samānatthattā, īsakañca sarūpattā tatheva yojiyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ettha siyā -- yadi ^b^aggini^eb^saddo sabbesu vibhattivacanesu yojetabbo, atha kasmā ^b^kaccāyane^eb^ ``aggissinī''ti lakkhaṇena ^b^si^eb^mhi pare ^b^aggi^eb^saddantassa ^b^ini^eb^ādeso dassitoti? saccaṃ, yathā navakkhattuṃ ṭhapetvā katekasesassa ^b^dasa^eb^saddassa ^b^yo^eb^vacanamhi ^b^navā^eb^desaṃ katvā ^b^yo^eb^vacanassa ^b^uti^eb^ādesaṃ kasmā ``navutī''ti rūpe nipphanne puna ``navutī''ti pakatiṃ ṭhapetvā tato ^b^naṃ^eb^vacanaṃ katvā ``navutīna''nti rūpaṃ nipphāditaṃ ^a^M0.0248^ea^. itthiliṅge pana ^b^nā^eb^diekavacanāni katvā tesaṃ ^b^yā^eb^ādesaṃ katvā ``navutiyā''ti rūpaṃ nipphāditaṃ. tathā hi ``channavutīnaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃ dhammānaṃ pavaraṃ yadidaṃ sugatavinayaṃ navutiyā haṃsasahassehi parivuto''tiādīni payogāni dissanti. tathā ^b^si^eb^mhi ^b^aggi^eb^saddantassa ^b^ini^eb^ādesakaraṇavasena ``agginī''ti rūpe nipphannepi puna ``agginī''ti pakatiṃ ṭhapetvā tato ^b^yoaṃnā^eb^dayo vibhattiyo katvā ``aggini, agginī, agginayo. agginiṃ, agginī, agginayo. aggininā''tiādīni kathaṃ na nipphajjissantīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ.
[03] idāni ^b^bhāvī^eb^ iccetassa pakatirūpassa aññesañca taṃsadisānaṃ nāmikapadamālāvibhāgaṃ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā.

[03] daṇḍī, daṇḍī, daṇḍino. daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍī, daṇḍino. daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi. daṇḍissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṃ. daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi. daṇḍissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṃ. daṇḍismiṃ, daṇḍimhi, daṇḍīsu. bho daṇḍi, bho daṇḍī, bhavanto daṇḍino. ^b^yamakamahāthera^eb^mataṃ.

[03] ettha kiñcāpi ``daṇḍina''nti upayogekavacanañca ``daṇḍismā, daṇḍimhā''ti nissakkavacanañca ``daṇḍinī''ti bhummekavacanañca nāgataṃ, tathāpi tattha tattha taṃsadisassa payogassa dassanato gahetabbameva.
[22] santi hi daharā pakkhī, paññavanto jutindharā''ti
[07] ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``pakkhī''iti paccattabahuvacanassa dassanato pana ``daṇḍī''iti paccattopayogabahuvacanāni vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] bhāvī, bhāvī, bhāvino. bhāviṃ, bhāvinaṃ, bhāvī, bhāvino. bhāvinā, bhāvīhi, bhāvībhi. bhāvissa, bhāvino, bhāvīnaṃ. bhāvinā, bhāvismā, bhāvimhā, bhāvīhi, bhāvībhi. bhāvissa, bhāvino, bhāvīnaṃ. (bhāvini) bhāvismiṃ, bhāvimhi, bhāvīsu. bho bhāvi, bho bhāvī, bhavanto bhāvino.
[21] evaṃ vibhāvī sambhāvī, paribhāvī dhajī gaṇī.
[22] sukhī rogī sasī kuṭṭhī, makuṭī kusalī balī..
[21] jaṭī yogī karī yānī, tomarī musalī phalī.
[22] dantī mantī sudhī medhī, bhāgī bhogī nakhī sikhī..
[21] dhammī saṅghī ñāṇī atthī, hatthī cakkhī pakkhī dāṭhī.
[22] raṭṭhī chattī mālī cammī, cārī cāgī kāmī sāmī..
[21] vajjadassī ca pāṇī ca, yasassiccādayopi ca.
[22] etesaṃ koci bhedo tu, ekadesena vuccate..
[03] ^b^ī^eb^kārantapulliṅgapadesu hi ``vajjadassī, pāṇī''iccevamādīnaṃ upayogabhummavacanaṭṭhāne ``vajjadassinaṃ, pāṇine''tiādīnipi rūpāni bhavanti. ettha ca --
[22] evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca, adhivattanti pāṇine..
[22] ucchinno saha raṭṭhena, majjhāraññaṃ tadā ahu..

[07] evamādayo payogā veditabbā, ayaṃ nayo ^b^daṇḍī^eb^padādīsupi labbhateva samānagatikattā ^b^daṇḍī^eb^padādīnaṃ ^b^vajjadassī^eb^padādīhi. tasmā upayogaṭṭhāne ``daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍinaṃ, daṇḍino, daṇḍine''ti yojetabbaṃ. bhummaṭṭhāne ``daṇḍismiṃ, daṇḍimhi, daṇḍini, daṇḍine, daṇḍīsu, daṇḍinesū''ti yojetabbaṃ. esa nayo ^b^gāmaṇī senānī^eb^iccādīni vajjetvā yathārahaṃ ^b^ī^eb^kārantapulliṅgesu netabbo.

[03] idāni ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayānaṃ ^b^u^eb^kārantapulliṅgānaṃ appasiddhattā aññesaṃ ^b^u^eb^kārantapulliṅgānaṃ vasena pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālaṃ pūressāma. katamāni tāni? ``bhikkhu hetu setu ketu rāhu bhāṇu khāṇu saṅku ucchu veḷu maccu jantu sindhu bandhu ruru neru sattu babbu paṭu bindu garu''iccādīni.

[03] bhikkhu, bhikkhū, bhikkhavo. bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhū, bhikkhavo. bhikkhunā, bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūbhi. bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṃ. bhikkhunā, bhikkhusmā, bhikkhumhā, bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūbhi. bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṃ. bhikkhusmiṃ, bhikkhumhi, bhikkhūsu. bho bhikkhu, bhavanto bhikkhū, bhikkhave, bhikkhavo. ^b^bhikkhu^eb^ādīni aññāni ca taṃsadisāni evaṃ ñeyyāni.
[03] ayampi ^a^M0.0251^ea^ panettha viseso ñeyyo -- hetu, hetū, hetuyo, hetavo. hetuṃ, hetū, hetuyo, hetavo. bho hetu, bhavanto hetū, hetave, hetavo. sesaṃ ^b^bhikkhu^eb^samaṃ.

[03] atha vā ``hetuyā''tiādīnaṃ dassanato ``dhenuyā''ti itthiliṅgarūpena sadisaṃ ``hetuyā''ti pulliṅgarūpampi sattamīṭhāne icchitabbaṃ. kānici hi pulliṅgarūpāni kehici itthiliṅgarūpehi sadisāni bhavanti. taṃ yathā? ``uṭṭhehi katte taramāno. ehi bālekhamāpehi, kusarājaṃ mahabbalaṃ. bhātarā mātarā adhipatiyā rattiyā hetuyo dhenuyo matyā petyā''ti evaṃ nayadassanena ``hetuyā tīṇi. adhipatiyā satta. uṭṭhehi katte''tiādīsu liṅgavipallāsacintā na uppādetabbā.
[03] jantu, jantū, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo. jantuṃ, jantū, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo. bho jantu, bhavanto jantū, jantave jantavo. sesaṃ ^b^bhikkhu^eb^samaṃ.

[03] garu, garū, garavo, garuno. garuṃ, garū, garavo, garuno. bho garu, bhavanto garū, garavo, garuno. sesaṃ ^b^bhikkhu^eb^samaṃ. ettha pana ``bhattu ca garuno sabbe, paṭipūjeti paṇḍitā''tipāḷinidassanaṃ. tatra ``bhikkhave''ti āmantanapadaṃ cuṇṇiyapadesveva dissati, na gāthāsu. ``bhikkhavo''ti paccattapadaṃ gāthāsuyeva dissati, na cuṇṇiyapadesu, apica ``bhikkhave''ti āmantanapadaṃ sāvakassa bhikkhūnaṃ āmantanapāḷiyaṃ sandhivisayeyeva dissati, na asandhivisaye, buddhassa pana bhikkhūnaṃ āmantanapāḷiyaṃ sandhivisayepi asandhivisayepi dissati. ``bhikkhavo''ti āmantanapadaṃ buddhassa bhikkhūnaṃ āmantanapāḷiyaṃ gāthāsu ca dissati ^a^M0.0252^ea^, cuṇṇiyapadesu ca sandhivisayeyeva dissati. sāvakassa pana bhikkhūnaṃ āmantanapāḷiyaṃ na dissatīti ayaṃ dvinnaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo. tathā hi ``evañca pana bhikkhave imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā''tiādīsu ``bhikkhave''ti padaṃ cuṇṇiyapadesveva diṭṭhaṃ. ``bhikkhavo tisatā ime, yācanti pañjalīkatā''tiādīsu ``bhikkhavo''ti paccattapadaṃ gāthāsuyeva diṭṭhaṃ. ``āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi āvuso bhikkhave''ti evamādīsu sāvakassa bhikkhūnaṃ āmantanapāḷīsu sandhivisayeyeva ``bhikkhave''ti padaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. ``bhikkhū āmantesi sotukāmattha bhikkhave''ti ``idha bhikkhave bhikkhū''tiādīsu pana buddhassa bhikkhūnaṃ āmantanapāḷīsu sandhivisayāvisayesu ``bhikkhave''ti padaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. ``araññe rukkhamūle vā, suññāgāreva bhikkhavo''ti ``tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi bhikkhavo''ti evamādīsu buddhassa bhikkhūnaṃ āmantanapāḷīsu ``bhikkhavo''ti āmantanapadaṃ gāthāsu ca diṭṭhaṃ, cuṇṇiyapadesu ca sandhivisayeyeva diṭṭhaṃ. iccevaṃ --
[03] idāni pana ^b^sayambhū^eb^iccetassa pakatirūpassa taṃsadisānañca nāmikapadamālaṃ kathayāma --

[03] sayambhū ^a^M0.0253^ea^, sayambhū, sayambhuvo. sayambhuṃ, sayambhū, sayambhuvo. sayambhunā, sayambhūhi, sayambhūbhi. sayambhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṃ. sayambhunā, sayambhusmā, sayambhumhā, sayambhūhi, sayambhūbhi. sayambhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṃ. sayambhusmiṃ, sayambhumhi, sayambhūsu. bho sayambhu, bho sayambhū, bhavanto sayambhū, sayambhuvo. evaṃ ^b^pabhū abhibhūvibhū^eb^ iccādīnipi.

[03] sabbaññū, sabbaññū, sabbaññuno. sabbaññuṃ, sabbaññū, sabbaññuno. bho sabbaññu, bhavanto sabbaññū, sabbaññuno, sesāsu vibhattīsu padāni ^b^bhikkhu^eb^sadisāni bhavanti, evaṃ vidū viññū kataññū maggaññū dhammaññū atthaññū kālaññū rattaññū mattaññū vadaññū avadaññū iccādīni.

[03] tatra ``ye ca laddhā manussattaṃ, vadaññū vītamaccharā''ti ettha ``vadaññū''ti paccattabahuvacanassa dassanato ^b^sayambhū sabbaññū^eb^ iccādīnampi paccattopayogabahuvacanattaṃ gahetabbaṃ. apica ``vidū, viññū''tiādīsu ``paracittavidunī''ti itthiliṅgadassanato itthiliṅge vattabbe ``vidunī, vidunī, viduniyo. viduniṃ, vidunī, viduniyo. viduniyā''ti ^b^itthi^eb^nayena padamālā kātabbā. tathā ``viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṃ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ ājānitu''nti ettha ``viññū''ti itthiliṅgadassanato ``kodhanā akataññū ca, pisuṇā mittabhedikā''ti ettha ca ``akataññū''ti itthiliṅgadassanatopi ``viññū, viññū, viññuyo. viññuṃ, viññū, viññuyo. viññuyā''ti ca ``kataññū, kataññū, kataññuyo. kataññuṃ, kataññū, kataññuyo, kataññuyāti ca ^b^jambū^eb^nayena padamālā kātabbā. evaṃ ``maggaññū, dhammaññū''iccādīsupi. ``sayambhū''ti pade pana ^a^M0.0254^ea^ ``sayambhu ñāṇaṃ gotrabhu citta''nti dassanato napuṃsakaliṅgatte vattabbe ``sayambhu, sayambhū, sayambhūni. sayambhuṃ, sayambhū, sayambhūnī''ti napuṃsake ^b^āyu^eb^nayopi gahetabbo. esa nayo sesesupi yathārahaṃ gahetabbo.

[03] yasmā panāyaṃ samattopi pāvacanādīsu yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ sotūnaṃ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṃ dissati, tattha tattha sotūnamanuggahāya codanāsodhanāvasena saṃsayaṃ samugghāṭetvā puna vattabbo hoti, tasmā kiñci padesamettha kathayāma.

[03] yaṃ kira bho pāḷiyaṃ ``saññate brahmacārayo, apace brahmacārayo''ti ca rūpaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantassa ^b^aggi^eb^saddassa ``aggayo''ti rūpamiva vuttaṃ, taṃ tathā avatvā ^b^ī^eb^kārantassa ^b^daṇḍī^eb^saddassa ``daṇḍino''ti rūpamiva ``brahmacārino''icceva vattabbanti? saccaṃ, tattha ``brahmaṃ caratīti brahmacāri yathā munātīti munī''ti evaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantavasena icchitattā. ``munayo aggayo''ti rūpāni viya ``brahmacārayo''ti rūpaṃ bhavati. aññattha pana ``brahmaṃ caraṇasīloti brahmacārī, yathā dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ karaṇasīloti dukkaṭakammakārī''ti evaṃ tassīlatthaṃ gahetvā ^b^ī^eb^kārantavasena gahaṇe ``dukkaṭakammakārino''ti rūpamiva ``daṇḍo assa atthīti daṇḍī''ti ^b^ī^eb^kārantassa saddassa ``daṇḍino''ti rūpamiva ca ``brahmacārino''ti rūpaṃ bhavati. tathā hi ``ime hi nāma dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino ^a^M0.0255^ea^ sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissantī''ti pāḷi dissati. evaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantavasena ``brahmacārayo''ti paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpaṃ yujjati, puna ^b^ī^eb^kārantavasena ``brahmacārino''ti paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpampi yujjati, tasmā ``brahmacāri, brahmacārī, brahmacārayo''ti ^b^aggi^eb^nayena, ``brahmacārī, brahmacārī, brahmacārino''ti ^b^daṇḍī^eb^nayena ca padamālā gahetabbā.

[03] yaṃ pana āyasmā ^b^buddhaghoso^eb^ ``yathā sobhanti yatino, sīlabhūsanabhūsitā''ti ettha ^b^yati^eb^saddassa ^b^i^eb^kārantassa ^b^aggi^eb^saddassa ``aggayo''ti rūpaṃ viya ``yatayo''ti rūpaṃ avatvā kasmā ^b^ī^eb^kārantassa ^b^daṇḍī^eb^saddassa ``daṇḍino''ti rūpaṃ viya ``yatino''ti rūpaṃ dasseti. nanvesā pamādalekhā viya dissati. yathā hi ``kukkuṭā maṇayo daṇḍā sivayo deva te kuddhā''ti pāḷigatiyā upaparikkhiyamānāya ``yatayo''ti rūpeneva bhavitabbaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantattāti? nāyaṃ pamādalekhā. ``vadanasīlo vādī''ti ettha viya tassīlatthaṃ gahetvā ^b^ī^eb^kārantavasena yojane niddosattā, tasmā ``yatanasīlo yatī''ti evaṃ tassīlatthaṃ cetasi sannidhāya ^b^ī^eb^kārantavasena ``yatino''ti sampadānasāmīnamekavacanasadisaṃ paccattabahuvacanarūpaṃ bhadantena buddhaghosena dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. upayogālapanabahuvacanarūpampi tādisameva.

[03] yattha pana tassīlatthaṃ aggahetvā ``yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī''ti ettha viya ``yatati vīriyaṃ karotīti yatī''ti kattukārakavasena ^b^i^eb^kārantabhāvo gayhati. tattha ``munayo maṇayo sivayo''ti ^b^yo^eb^kārantarūpāni viya ``yatayo''ti ^b^yo^eb^kārantaṃ paccattabahuvacanarūpañca ^a^M0.0256^ea^ upayogālapanabahuvacanarūpañca bhavati, evaṃ ^b^ī^eb^kārantapulliṅgānaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu ^b^yo^eb^kārantāneva rūpāni bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] yadi evaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantapulliṅgānaṃ sāramati suddhadiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhimicchādiṭṭhivajirabuddhi saddādī kathanti? etesaṃ pana ^b^i^eb^kārantavasena niddiṭṭhānampi samāsapadattā ^b^aggi^eb^naye aṭṭhatvā yathāsambhavaṃ ^b^daṇḍī^eb^naye tiṭṭhanato ^b^no^eb^kārantāneva rūpāni. tathā hi ``asāre sāramatino''ti ^b^no^eb^kārantapaccattabahuvacanapāḷi dissati, upayogālapanabahuvacanarūpampi tādisameva daṭṭhabbaṃ. nanu ca bho ^b^kaccāyana^eb^ppakaraṇe ``atthe visāradamatayo''ti ettha samāsapadassa ikārantapulliṅgassa ^b^yo^eb^kārantassa paccattabahuvacanapāṭhassa dassanato ^b^sāramati^eb^saddādīnampi ``visāradamatayo''ti rūpena viya ^b^yo^eb^kārantehi rūpehi bhavitabbanti? napi bhavitabbaṃ buddhavacane samāsapadānaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantapulliṅgānaṃ ``visāradamatayo''ti rūpasadisassa rūpassa adassanatoti.

[03] nanu ca bho buddhavacane ``pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṃsā. te honti jānipatayo, aññamaññaṃ piyaṃvadā''ti samāsapadānaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantapulliṅgānaṃ ``visāradamatayo''ti rūpasadisāni ^b^yo^eb^kārantāni rūpāni dissanti. evaṃ sante kasmā ``buddhavacane samāsapadānaṃ ^b^i^eb^kārantapulliṅgānaṃ ``visāradamatayo''ti rūpasadisassa ^b^yo^eb^kārantassa rūpassa adassanato''ti vuttanti? ettha vuccate -- visadisattaṃ paṭicca. ^b^gahapati^eb^saddādīsu hi yasmā ^b^pati^eb^saddo sabhāveneva pulliṅgo, na tu samāsato pubbe itthiliṅgapakatiko hutvā pacchā pulliṅgabhāvaṃ patto, tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu ``gahapatayo, jānipatayo''ti ^b^yo^eb^kārantāni, ``senāpatayo, senāpatino''ti ^b^yo no^eb^kārantāni ^a^M0.0257^ea^ ca paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpāni bhavanti. tathā hi ``tattakā senāpatino''ti aṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati. yasmā pana sāramati suddhadiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi vajirabuddhi saddādīsu ^b^matidiṭṭhi^eb^saddādayo samāsato pubbe itthiliṅgapakatikā hutvā pacchā bahubbīhisamāsavasena pulliṅgabhāvappattā, tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu ``sāramatino suddhadiṭṭhino sammādiṭṭhino micchādiṭṭhino vajirabuddhino''tiādīnib^'nob^kārantāniyeva paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpāni bhavanti, sampadānasāmīnamekavacanehi sadisānīti niṭṭhametthāvagantabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^seṭṭhi sārathicakkavattisāmi^eb^iccetesu kathanti? ettha pana ayaṃ viseso veditabbo -- katthaci pāṭhe ``seṭṭhī sārathī cakkavattī sāmī''ti antakkharassa dīghattaṃ dissati, katthaci pana ``seṭṭhi sārathi cakkavatti sāmi''iti antakkharassa rassattaṃ dissati. kiñcāpi rassattametesaṃ dissati, tathāpi tattha tattha paccattavacanādibhāvena ``seṭṭhino sārathino''tiādipayogadassanato rassaṃ katvā etāni uccāriyantīti ñāyati, tasmā evaṃ nibbacanattho gahetabbo -- seṭṭhaṃ dhanasāraṃ, ṭhānantaraṃ vā assa atthīti ^b^seṭṭhī^eb^. assadammādayo sāraṇasīloti ^b^sārathī^eb^. cakkaṃ pavattanasīloti ^b^cakkavattī^eb^. saṃ etassa atthīti ^b^sāmī^eb^ti. assatthikatassīlatthasaddā hi ^b^no^eb^kārantarūpavasena samānagatikā bhavanti yathā ``daṇḍino bhūmisāyino''ti. aparopi nibbacanattho ^b^ī^eb^kārantavasena assadammādayo sāretīti ^b^sārathī^eb^. tathā hi ``purisadamme sāretīti purisadammasārathī''ti vuttaṃ. cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkavattī. evaṃ kattukārakavasena ^b^ī^eb^kārantattaṃ gahetvā katthaci labbhamānampi ^b^i^eb^kārantattaṃ anapekkhitvā buddhavacanānurūpena ``sārathino ^a^M0.0258^ea^ cakkavattino''tiādīni ^b^no^eb^kārantarūpāni gahetvā ^b^daṇḍī^eb^nayena yojetabbāni ``daṇḍinī''tiādikaṃ vajjitabbaṃ vajjetvā. evaṃ ``seṭṭhino sārathino cakkavattino sāmino''tiādīni ^b^no^eb^kārantāniyeva rūpāni ñeyyāni.

[03] atra kiñci payogaṃ nidassanamattaṃ kathayāma. ``tāta tayo seṭṭhino amhākaṃ bahūpakārā''ti ca ``te katabhattakiccā `mahāseṭṭhino mayaṃ gamissāmā'ti vadiṃsū''ti ca ``sārathino āhaṃsū''ti ca ``dve cakkavattino''ti ca evamādīni. tattha kiñcāpi katthaci ``seṭṭhi sārathi''iccādi rassattapāṭho dissati, tathāpi so sabhāvena rassattabhāvo pāṭho na hoti, dīghassa rassattakaraṇapāṭhoti veditabbo. padamālā cassa vuttanayena veditabbā.

[03] ^b^mahesī^eb^ti ettha kathanti? ``mahesī''ti ettha kiñcāpi ^b^mahesī^eb^saddo ^b^ī^eb^kārantavasena niddisiyati, tathāpi ^b^isi^eb^saddena samānagatikattā ^b^isi^eb^saddassa ^b^aggi^eb^saddena samānapadamālattā ^b^aggi^eb^nayena padamālā kātabbā. nanu ca bho ettha tassīlattho dissati ``mahante sīlakkhandhādayo dhamme esanasīloti mahesī''ti, tasmā ``bhūmisāyī''ti padassa viya ^b^daṇḍī^eb^nayeneva padamālā kātabbāti? na kātabbā tassīlatthassa asambhavato. imassa hi ``mahante sīlakkhandhādayo dhamme esi gavesi esitvā ṭhitoti mahesī''ti atassīlattho eva yujjati. katakaraṇīyesu buddhādīsu ariyesu pavattanāmattā. ^b^isi^eb^saddena cāyaṃ saddo īsakaṃ samāno kevalaṃ samāsapariyosāne dīghavasena uccāriyati, rassavasena pana ``mahā isi mahesī''ti sandhiviggaho ^a^M0.0259^ea^. yasmā rassattaṃ gahetvā tassa padamālākaraṇaṃ yujjati, tasmā ``saṅgāyiṃsu mahesayo''ti ^b^i^eb^kārantarūpaṃ dissati. na hi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane katthacipi catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanarūpaṃ viya ``mahesino''ti paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpaṃ dissati. tasmā ^b^ī^eb^kārantavasena uccāritassapi sato rassavasena uccāritassa viya ``mahesi, mahesī, mahesayo. mahesiṃ, mahesī, mahesayo. mahesinā''ti padamālā kātabbā. apica ^b^mahesī^eb^saddo yattha rājaggubbarivācako, tattha itthiliṅgo hoti, tabbasena pana ``mahesī, mahesī, mahesiyo. mahesiṃ, mahesī, mahesiyo. mahesiyā''ti ca vakkhamāna^b^itthī^eb^nayena padamālā kātabbā. ^b^hatthī^eb^sadde kathanti? ^b^hatthī^eb^saddassa pana hattho assa atthīti evaṃ ^b^ī^eb^kārantavasena gahaṇe ``hatthino''ti rūpaṃ bhavati. tathā hi ``vane hatthino''ti payogo dissati. tasseva tasmiṃyevatthe rassaṃ katvā gahaṇe ``hatthayo''ti rūpaṃ bhavati. tathā hi --
[21] ``haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, hatthayo pasadā migā.
[22] sabbe sīhassa bhāyanti, natthi kāyasmi tulyatā..
[22] sopi tattha mahā hoti, neva bālo sarīravā''ti

[07] imasmiṃ ^b^keḷisīlajātake^eb^ ``hatthayo''ti āhaccapadaṃ dissati. evamassa ^b^daṇḍī^eb^nayena ca ^b^aggi^eb^nayena ca dvidhā padamālā, veditabbā. iminā nayena avuttesupi ṭhānesu pāḷinayānurūpena ^a^M0.0260^ea^ porāṇaṭṭhakathānurūpena ca padamālā yojetabbā.
[03] ettāvatā ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayānaṃ pulliṅgānaṃ nāmikapadamālā saddhiṃ liṅgantarehi saddantarehi atthantarehi ca nānappakārato dassitā.
[26] sadā suṭṭhu cinteti vāceti yo so,
[06] iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ

[03] atha itthiliṅgesu ^b^ā^eb^kārantassa ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayassa pakatirūpabhūtassa ^b^bhāvikā^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālāyaṃ vattabbāyampi pasiddhassa tāva ^b^kaññā^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma --

[03] kaññā, kaññā, kaññāyo. kaññaṃ, kaññā, kaññāyo. kaññāya, kaññāhi, kaññābhi. kaññāya, kaññānaṃ. kaññāya, kaññāhi, kaññābhi. kaññāya, kaññānaṃ. kaññāya, kaññāyaṃ, kaññāsu. bhoti kaññe, bhotiyo kaññā, kaññāyo. ayamamhākaṃ ruci.

[03] mātā, mātā, mātaro. mātaraṃ, mātaro. mātarā, mātuyā, matyā, mātūhi, mātūbhi. mātu, mātuyā, matyā, mātarānaṃ, mātānaṃ, mātūnaṃ. mātarā, mātuyā, matyā, mātūhi, mātūbhi. mātu, mātuyā, matyā, mātarānaṃ, mātānaṃ, mātūnaṃ. mātari, mātuyā, matyā, mātuyaṃ, matyaṃ, mātūsu. bhoti mātā, bhotiyo mātā, mātaro.

[03] ettha pana yasmā pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgānaṃ ^b^sa^eb^kārantāni rūpāni ^b^ehi ebhi esu^eb^kārantādīni ca ^b^ena^eb^ntādīni ca na dissanti, tasmā kehici vuttānipi ``mātussa mātarehī''tiādīni na vuttāni, esa nayo itaresupi. ``yaṃkiñcitthikataṃ puññaṃ, mayhañca mātuyā ca te. anuññāto ahaṃ matyā''ti pāḷidassanato pana karaṇasampadānanissakkasāmibhummavacanaṭṭhāne ``mātuyā, matyā''ti ca vuttaṃ itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne samānagatikattā tesaṃ vacanānaṃ. tathā hi ^b^ummādantijātake^eb^ ``matyā''ti padaṃ pañcamītatiyekavacanavasena āgataṃ, yathā pana ``khattiyā''ti padaṃ majjhasaralopavasena ``khatyā''ti bhavati, tathā ``mātuyā mātuya''nti ca padaṃ ``matyā, matya''nti bhavati, ayaṃ nayo ^b^dhītu^eb^saddādīsu na labbhati.

[03] dhītā, dhītā, dhītaro. dhītaṃ, dhītaraṃ, dhītaro. dhītuyā, dhītūhi, dhītūbhi. dhītu, dhītuyā, dhītarānaṃ, dhītānaṃ, dhītūnaṃ. dhītarā, dhītuyā, dhītūhi, dhītūbhi. dhītu, dhītuyā, dhītarānaṃ, dhītānaṃ, dhītūnaṃ. dhītari, dhītuyā, dhītuyaṃ, dhītūsu. bhoti dhītu, bhoti dhītā, bhotiyo dhītā, dhītaro. ettha pana.

[07] pāḷiyaṃ ``dhīta''nti dassanato upayogavacanaṭṭhāne ``dhīta''nti vuttaṃ, tasmā idaṃ sārato gahetabbaṃ, tathā pāḷiyaṃ ``assamaṇī hoti asakyadhītarā''ti samāsapadassa dassanato tatiyekavacanantapadasadisaṃ ``seṭṭhidhītarā''tiādikaṃ paṭhamekavacanantampi samāsapadaṃ gahetabbameva, ^b^niruttipiṭake^eb^ pana ``mātā dhītā''ti padadvayaṃ ^b^saddhā^eb^naye pakkhitta, tamamhehi ``saddhāyā''ti padassa viya ``mātāyā''tiādīnaṃ pāḷiādīsu byāse adassanato visuṃ gahitaṃ samāseyeva hi īdisiṃ saddagatiṃ passāma ``rājamātāya rājadhītāya seṭṭhidhītāyā''ti. evaṃ ^b^kaññā^eb^nayopi ekadesena labbhati, tathā ``acchariyaṃ nandamāte, abbhutaṃ nandamāte''ti pāḷiyaṃ ``nandamāte''ti dassanato ``bhoti rājamāte, bhoti rājadhīte''ti evamādinayopi labbhati, tatra ^b^nandamāte^eb^ti nandassa mātā nandamātā, bhoti nandamāte, evaṃ samāseyeva īdisī saddagati hoti, tasmā samāsapadatte ``mātu dhītu duhitu''iccetesaṃ pakatirūpānaṃ dve koṭṭhāsā gahetabbā paṭhamaṃ dassitarūpakoṭṭhāso ca ^b^kaññā^eb^nayo rūpakoṭṭhāso cāti. ^b^nattā^eb^dīni padāni na kevalaṃ pulliṅgāniyeva honti, atha kho itthiliṅgānipi. tathā hi ``visākhāya nattā kālaṅkatā hoti. catasso mūsikā gādhaṃ kattā, no vasitā''tiādīni payogāni sāsane dissanti.

[03] nattā, nattā, nattāro. nattaṃ, nattāraṃ, nattāro. nattārā, nattuyā, nattūhi, nattūbhi. nattu, nattuyā, nattārānaṃ ^a^M0.0265^ea^ nattānaṃ, nattūnaṃ. nattārā, nattuyā, nattūhi, nattūbhi. nattu, nattuyā, nattārānaṃ, nattānaṃ, nattūnaṃ. nattari, nattuyā, nattuyaṃ, nattūsu. bhoti natta, bhoti nattā, bhotiyo nattā, nattāro.

[03] idāni ^b^bhūmi^eb^padādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā --

[03] ``bhūmi, bhūmī, bhūmiyo. bhūmiṃ, bhūmī, bhūmiyo''ti sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. evaṃ ``bhūti satti patti vutti mutti kitti khanti titti siddhi iddhi vuddhi suddhi buddhi bodhi pīti nandi mati asani vasani sati gati vuḍḍhi yuvati aṅguli bondi diṭṭhi tuṭṭhi nābhi'' iccādīnampi nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. apica ``ratyo amoghā gacchanti. divā ca ratto ca haranti ye baliṃ. na bhūmyā caturaṅgulo. seti bhūmyā anutthunaṃ. bhūmyā so patitaṃ pāsaṃ. gīvāya paṭimuñcati. imā ca nabhyo satarājicittitā. sateratā vijjurivappabhāsare''ti evamādīnaṃ ^a^M0.0266^ea^ payogānaṃ dassanato ^b^ratti bhūmi nābhi^eb^saddādīnaṃ ayampi nāmikapadamālāviseso veditabbo. kathaṃ?

[03] ratti, rattī, rattiyo, ratyo. rattiṃ, rattī, rattiyo, ratyo. rattiyā, ratyā, rattīhi, rattībhi. rattiyā, ratyā, rattīnaṃ. rattiyā, ratyā, rattīhi, rattībhi. rattiyā, ratyā, rattīnaṃ. rattiyā, ratyā, rattiyaṃ ratyaṃ, ratto, rattīsu. bhoti ratti, bhotiyo rattī, rattiyo, ratyo.
[03] ettha ``ratto''ti rūpanayaṃ vajjetvā ``bhūmi, bhūmī, bhūmiyo, bhūmyo''ti sabbaṃ neyyaṃ.

[03] nābhi, nābhī, nābhiyo, nabhyo. nābhiṃ, nābhī, nābhiyo, nabhyo. nābhiyā, nabhyā, nābhīhi, nābhībhi. nābhiyā, nabhyā, nābhīnaṃ. nābhiyā, nabhyā, nābhīhi, nābhībhi. nābhiyā, nabhyā, nābhīnaṃ. nābhiyā, nabhyā, nābhiyaṃ, nabhyaṃ, nābhīsu. bhoti nābhi, bhotiyo nābhī, nābhiyo, nabhyo.

[03] ettha pana ``bujjhassu jina bodhiyaṃ. aññatra bojjhā tapasā''ti vicitrapāḷinayadassanato vicitranayā nāmikapadamālā vuttā. sabbopi cāyaṃ nayo aññatthāpi yathārahaṃ yojetabbo.
[03] idāni ^a^M0.0267^ea^ ^b^bhūrī^eb^saddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā --

[03] itthī, itthī, itthiyo. itthiṃ, itthī, itthiyo. itthiyā, itthīhi, itthībhi. itthiyā, itthīnaṃ. itthiyā, itthīhi, itthībhi. itthiyā, itthīnaṃ. itthiyā, itthiyaṃ, itthīsu. bhoti itthi, bhotiyo itthiyo. ^b^yamakamahāthera^eb^mataṃ.

[03] ``bhūrī, bhūrī, bhūriyo. bhūriṃ, bhūrī, bhūri yo''ti ^b^itthi^eb^yā samaṃ. evaṃ ^b^bhūtī bhotī vibhāvinī^eb^ iccādīnaṃ ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayānaṃ aññesañca ^b^ī^eb^kārantasaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. ^b^e^eb^tthaññe ^b^ī^eb^kārantasaddā nāma --
[22] vāpī pokkharaṇī devī, nāgī yakkhinī rājinī..

[03] tathā hi ``pokkharañño sumāpitā. tā ca sattasatā bhariyā, dāsyo sattasatāni ca. dārake ca ahaṃ nessaṃ ^a^M0.0268^ea^, brāhmaṇyā paricārake. najjo sandanti. najjā nerañjarāya tīre. lakkhyā bhava nivesanaṃ.

[07] evamādīnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ dassanato ^b^pokkharaṇī^eb^ iccādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālāyo savisesā yojetabbā. kathaṃ? `pokkharaṇī, pokkharaṇī, pokkharaṇiyo, pokkharañño. pokkharaṇi''ntiādinā vatvā karaṇasampadānanissakkasāmivacanaṭṭhāne ``pokkharaṇiyā, pokkharaññā''ti ekavacanāni vattabbāni. bhummavacanaṭṭhāne pana ``pokkharaṇiyā, pokkharaññā, pokkharaṇiyaṃ, pokkharañña''nti ca ekavacanāni vattabbāni. sabbattha ca padāni paripuṇṇāni kātabbāni. tathā ``dāsī, dāsī, dāsiyo, dāsyo. dāsiṃ, dāsiyaṃ, dāsī, dāsiyo, dāsyo''ti vatvā karaṇavacanaṭṭhānādīsu ``dāsiyā, dāsyā''ti ekavacanāni vattabbāni. bhummavacanaṭṭhāne pana ``dāsiyā, dāsyā, dāsiyaṃ, dāsya''nti ca ekavacanāni vattabbāni. sabbattha padāni paripuṇṇāni kātabbāni. ettha pana ``yaṭṭhiyā paṭikoṭeti, ghare jātaṃva dāsiyaṃ. phusissāmi vimuttiya''nti payogānaṃ dassanato ^b^aṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^ya^eb^mādesavasena ``dāsiya''nti vuttaṃ. tesu ca ``ghare jātaṃva dāsiya''nti ettha ^b^aṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^ya^eb^mādesato aññopi saddanayo labbhati. kathaṃ? yathā daharī eva ``dahariyā''ti vuccati, evaṃ dāsī eva ``dāsiyā''ti.

[03] ettha pana ``passāmi vohaṃ dahariṃ, kumāriṃ cārudassana''nti ca ``ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ sati''nti ca pāḷi nidassanaṃ ^a^M0.0269^ea^, upayogavacanicchāya ``dāsiya''nti vuttaṃ, imasmiṃ panādhippāye ``dāsiyā, dāsiyā, dāsiyāyo. dāsiyaṃ, dāsiyā, dāsiyāyo. dāsiyāyā''ti ^b^kaññā^eb^nayeneva nāmikapadamālā bhavati ``kumāriyā''ti saddasseva. tathā hi ``kumāriye upaseniye''ti pāḷi dissati. tathā ``pupphavatiyā, pupphavatiyaṃ, pupphavatiyāya, pupphavatiyāyaṃ, bhoti pupphavatiye''ti ^b^kaññā^eb^nayanissitena ekavacananayena nāmikapadamālā bhavati.

[03] ettha pana ``atīte ayaṃ bārāṇasī pupphavatiyā nāma ahosi. rājāsi luddakammo, ekarājā pupphavatiyāyaṃ. uyyassu pubbena pupphavatiyāyā''ti pāḷi ca aṭṭhakathāpāṭho ca nidassanaṃ. aparo nayo -- ``dāsiyā dahariyā kumāriyā''tiādīsu ^b^ka^eb^kārassa ^b^ya^eb^kārādesopi daṭṭhabbo. ^b^brāhmaṇī^eb^saddassa tu ``brāhmaṇī, brāhmaṇī, brāhmaṇiyo, brāhmaṇyo. brāhmaṇi''ntiādīni vatvā karaṇavacanaṭṭhānādīsu ``brāhmaṇiyā, brāhmaṇyā''ti ekavacanāni vattabbāni, sabbattha ca padāni paripuṇṇāni kātabbāni. ^b^nadī^eb^saddassa ``nadī, nadī, nadiyo, najjo. nadi''ntiādinā vatvā ``nadiyā, najjā''ti ca ``nadiyaṃ, najja''nti ca vattabbaṃ, sabbattha ca padāni paripuṇṇāni kātabbāni. itthiliṅgesu hi paccattabahuvacane diṭṭheyeva upayogabahuvacanaṃ anāgatampi diṭṭhameva hoti, tathā upayogabahuvacane diṭṭheyeva paccattabahuvacanaṃ anāgatampi diṭṭhameva hoti, karaṇasampadānanissakkasāmibhummavacanānampi aññatarasmiṃ diṭṭheyeva aññataraṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. tathā hi ``dāsā ca dāsyo anujīvino cā''ti ettha ``dāsyo''ti paccattabahuvacane diṭṭheyeva aparampi ``dāsyo''ti upayogabahuvacanaṃ taṃsadisattā diṭṭhameva hoti.
[21] ``sakko ^a^M0.0270^ea^ ca me varaṃ dajjā, so ca labbhetha me varo.

[07] ettha ``ummādantyā''ti karaṇavacane diṭṭheyeva taṃsadisāni sampadānanissakkasāmibhummavacanānipi diṭṭhāniyeva honti. ``brāhmaṇyā paricārake''ti ettha ``brāhmaṇyā''ti sāmivacane diṭṭheyeva taṃsadisāni karaṇasampadānanissakkabhummavacanānipi diṭṭhāniyeva honti. ``seti bhūmyā anutthuna''nti ettha ``pathabyā cārupubbaṅgī''ti ettha ca ``bhūmyā, pathabyā''ti sattamiyā ekavacane diṭṭheyeva taṃsadisāni karaṇasampadānanissakkasāmivacanānipi diṭṭhāniyeva honti. ``bārāṇasyaṃ mahārājā''ti ettha ``bārāṇasya''nti bhummavacane diṭṭheyeva taṃsadisāni aññānipi ``brāhmaṇyaṃ ekādasyaṃ pañcamya''ntiādīni bhummavacanāni diṭṭhāniyeva honti.
