[03] ku, kū, kuyo. kuṃ, kū, kuyo. kuyā, kūhi, kūbhi. kuyā, kūnaṃ. kuyā, kūhi, kūbhi. kuyā, kūnaṃ. kuyā, kuyaṃ, kūsu. bhoti ku, bhotiyo kū, bhotiyo kuyo.

[03] tatrindriyaṃ ^a^M0.0318^ea^ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ gatinivāsabhāvato ``kha''nti vuccati, ākāsaṃ vivittaṭṭhena. saggo katasucaritehi ekantena gantabbatāya ``kha''nti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. ``khago yathā hi rukkhagge, nilīyantova sākhino. sākhaṃ ghaṭṭetī''ti ca, ``khe nimmito acari aṭṭhasataṃ sayambhū''ti ca ādi ettha nidassanaṃ.
[03] khaṃ, khāni, khā. khaṃ, khāni, khe. khena, khehi, khebhi. khassa, khānaṃ. khā, khasmā, khamhā, khehi, khebhi. khassa, khānaṃ. khe, khasmiṃ, khamhi, khesu. bho kha, bhavanto khāni, bhavanto khā.
[21] go goṇe cindriye bhūmyaṃ, vacane ceva buddhiyaṃ.
[22] tesu atthesu goṇe thi-pumā ca itare pumā..

[03] tathā hi ``gosu duyhamānāsu gato. gopañcamo''tiādīsu ^b^go^eb^saddo goṇe vattati. gocaroti etthindriyepi vattati gāvo cakkhādīnindriyāni caranti etthāti gocaro. tathā hi porāṇā kathayiṃsu ``gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gocaro viya gocaro, abhiṇhaṃ caritabbaṭṭhānaṃ. gāvovācakkhādīnindriyāni, tehi caritabbaṭṭhānaṃ gocaro''ti. ``gomatiṃ gotamaṃ name''ti porāṇakaviracanāyaṃ pana pathaviyaṃ vattati. ``bhūripaññaṃ gotamaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃvandāmī''ti hi attho. tathā ^b^suttanipātaṭṭhakathāya^eb^vāseṭṭhasuttasaṃvaṇṇanappadese ^b^``gorakkha^eb^nti khettarakkhaṃ, kasirakkhanti vuttaṃ hoti. pathavī hi ``go''ti vuccati, tappabhedo ca khetta''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] ``gottavasena ^a^M0.0319^ea^ gotamo''ti ettha tu vacane buddhiyañca vattati. tenāhu porāṇā ``gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ. gotamoti hi pavattamānaṃ gaṃ vacanaṃ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti gottaṃ. yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati, evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. ko pana soti? aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabba''nti. tathā hi taṃgottajātā suddhodanamahārājādayopi gotamotveva vuccanti. bhena bhagavā attano pitaraṃ suddhodanamahārājānaṃ ``atikkantavarā kho gotama tathāgatā''ti avoca. vessavaṇopi mahārājā bhagavantaṃ ``vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ, buddhaṃ vandāma gotama''nti avoca, āyasmāpi vaṅgīso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ``sādhu nibbāpanaṃ brūhi, anukampāya gotamā''ti avoca. evaṃ idaṃ sāmaññarūpaṃ gaṃ tāyatīti gottanti vuttaṃ. taṃ pana gotamagottakassapagottādivasena bahuvidhaṃ.

[03] tathā ^b^go^eb^saddo ādicce vattati. ``gogottaṃ gotamaṃ name''ti porāṇakaviracanā ettha nidassanaṃ, ādiccabandhuṃ gotamaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ vandāmīti attho. ādiccopi hi gotamagotte jāto bhagavāpi, evaṃ tena samānagottatāya tattha tattha ``ādiccabandhū''tiādinā bhagavato thomanā dissati ``pucchāmi taṃ ādiccabandhu, vivekaṃ santipadañca mahesī''ti ca, ``vande jetavanaṃ niccaṃ, vihāraṃ ravibandhuno''ti ca, ``lokekabandhu'maravindasahāyabandhu''nti ca. ``uṇhagū''ti ettha pana ^b^go^eb^saddo rasmiyaṃ ^a^M0.0320^ea^ vattati. uṇhā gāvo rasmiyo etassāti uṇhagū, sūriyo. pubbācariyāpi hi ^b^chandovicitisatthe^eb^ imamevatthaṃ byākariṃsu.

[03] ``gosītacandana''nti ettha pānīye vattati. ^b^go^eb^saddena hi jalaṃ vuccati. ^b^go^eb^ viya sītaṃ candanaṃ, tasmiṃ pana uddhanato uddharitapakkuthitatelamhi pakkhitte taṅkhaṇaññeva taṃ telaṃ susītalaṃ hoti.

[03] ettheke vadanti ``kasmā bho ^b^`go^eb^padatthe vattamāno ^b^go^eb^saddo itthiliṅgo ceva pulliṅgo cā'ti vadatha, kasmā ca pana `indriyapathavīvacanabuddhisūriyarasmipānīyesu vattamāno pulliṅgo'ti vadatha, etesu sūriyatthe vattamāno pulliṅgo hotu, nanu indriyavacanapānīyesu vattamānena pana ^b^go^eb^saddena napuṃsakaliṅgena bhavitabbaṃ, pathavībuddhirasmīsu vattamānena itthiliṅgena bhavitabbaṃ indriyādipathavādipadatthesu vattamānānaṃ ^b^indriya^eb^saddādi^b^pathavī^eb^saddādīnaṃ napuṃsakitthiliṅgavasena niddesassa dassanato''ti? tanna, niyamābhāvato. itthipadatthe vattamānassāpi hi sato kassaci saddassa pulliṅgavasena niddeso dissati yathā ``orodho''ti. purisapadatthe vattamānassāpi ca sato kassaci itthiliṅgavasena niddeso dissati, yathā ``atthakāmosi me yakkha, hitakāmāsi devate''ti. itthipurisapadatthesu pana avattamānānampi sataṃ kesañci saddānaṃ ekasmiṃyeva ñāṇādiatthe vattamānānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsakaliṅgavasena niddeso dissati yathā ``paññā amoho ñāṇa''nti, ``taṭaṃtaṭītaṭo''ti ca. tathā hi anitthibhūtopi samāno ``mātulā''ti itthiliṅgavasena rukkhopi ^a^M0.0321^ea^ nāmaṃ labhati, tabbasena nagarampi. tenāha ^b^cakkavattisuttaṭīkāyaṃ ``mātulā^eb^ti itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmo eko rukkho, tāya āsannappadese māpitattā nagarampi `mātulā'tveva paññāyittha. tena vuttaṃ mātulāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare''ti.

[03] ^b^mo^eb^ vuccati cando, ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ``mā vuccati cando''ti ākārantapāṭho dissati, ^b^o^eb^kārantapāṭhena tena bhavitabbaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāya ^b^ekakkharakosato^eb^ nayaṃ gahetvā ``mo sivo candimā cevā''ti ^b^o^eb^kārantavasena vattabbattā. ettha ca ^b^o^eb^kārantavasena vuttassa ^b^ma^eb^saddassa candavācakatte ``puṇṇamī, puṇṇamā''ti ca nidassanapadāni. tattha puṇṇo mo etthāti puṇṇamī, evaṃ puṇṇamā, rattāpekkhaṃ itthiliṅgavacanaṃ. ettha pana ``visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyā paṭhamayāmepubbenivāsaṃ anussarī''ti idaṃ nidassanaṃ. ettha siyā -- yadi ``puṇṇamā''ti ayaṃsaddo rattāpekkho itthiliṅgo.

[07] ādīsu kathaṃ ``puṇṇamāye''ti padasiddhīti? ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ^b^ye^eb^kārādesavasena. dhammissarena hi bhagavatā ``puṇṇamāyā''ti vattabbe ``puṇṇamāye''ti vadatā ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ṭhāne ^b^ye^eb^kāro paṭhito itthiliṅgavisaye ^b^ttā^eb^kārassa ṭhāne ^b^tte^eb^kāro ^a^M0.0322^ea^ viya, ^b^nī^eb^kārassa ṭhāne ^b^ne^eb^kāro viya ca. tathā hi yathā ``abyayataṃ vilapasi viratte kosiyāyane''ti imasmiṃ ^b^rādhajātake^eb^ ``virattā''ti vattabbe ``viratte''ti vadantena ^b^ttā^eb^kārassa ṭhāne ^b^tte^eb^kāro paṭhito, ``kosiyāyanī''ti ca vattabbe ``kosiyāyane''ti vadantena ^b^nī^eb^kārassa ṭhāne ^b^ne^eb^kāro paṭhito. evaṃ ``puṇṇamāyā''ti vattabbe ``puṇṇamāye''ti vadatā ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ṭhāne ^b^ye^eb^kāro paṭhito. yathā ca ``dakkhitāye aparājitasaṅgha''nti imasmiṃ ^b^mahāsamayasutta^eb^ppadese ``dakkhitāyā''ti vattabbe ``dakkhitāye''ti vadatā ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ṭhāne ^b^ye^eb^kāro paṭhito, evamidhāpi. yathā pana ``sabhāye vā dvāramūle vā''ti ettha ``sabhāya''nti liṅgabyattayavasena sabhā vuttā, na tathā idha ``puṇṇamāya''nti liṅgabyattayena ^b^puṇṇamā^eb^ vuttā, atha kho ``puṇṇamā''ti ^b^ā^eb^kārantitthiliṅgavasena vuttā. tathā hi ``puṇṇamāyo''ti padaṃ ^b^ya^eb^kāraṭṭhāne ^b^ye^eb^kāruccāraṇavasena sambhūtaṃ bhummavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^mā^eb^ vuccati sirī. tathā hi ^b^vidvamukhamaṇḍanaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ ``mālinī''ti padassatthaṃ vadatā ``mā vuccati lakkhī, alinī bhamarī''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^lakkhī^eb^saddo ca ^b^sirī^eb^saddena samānattho, tena ``mā vuccati sirī''ti attho amhehi anumato, tathā porāṇehipi ``maṃ siriṃ dhāreti vidadhāti cāti mandhātā''ti attho pakāsito, tasmā ``mālinī mandhātā''ti ca imānettha nidassanapadāni. tatra pulliṅgassa tāva ^b^ma^eb^saddassa ayaṃ nāmikapadamālā --
[03] mo, mā. maṃ, me. mena, mehi, mebhi. massa, mānaṃ. mā, masmā, mamhā, mehi, mebhi. massa, mānaṃ. me, masmiṃ, mamhi, mesu. bho ma, bhavanto mā.
[03] mā, mā, māyo. maṃ, mā, māyo. māya, māhi, mābhi. māya, mānaṃ. māya, māhi, mābhi. māya, mānaṃ. māya, māyaṃ, māsu. bhoti me, bhotiyo māyo.
[03] ettha pana sirīvācako ^b^mā^eb^saddo ca saddavācako ^b^rā^eb^saddo cāti ime samānagatikā ekakkharattā nicca^b^mā^eb^kārantapakatikattā itthiliṅgattā ca.

[03] tatra ^b^saṃ^eb^ vuccati santacitto puriso. yaṃ loke ``sappuriso''ti ca, ``ariyo''ti ca, ``paṇḍito''ti ca vadanti, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ yadidaṃ ``sa''nti. evaṃ sappurisāriyapaṇḍitavācakassa ^b^saṃ^eb^saddassa paccattavacanavasena atthibhāve ``sameti asatā asa''nti idaṃ payoganidassanaṃ. ettha hi ``na saṃ asa''nti samāsacintāya sappurisāsappurisapadatthā ^b^saṃ asaṃ^eb^saddehi vuttāti ñāyanti, tasmā ``sappurisapadattho paccattavacanena ^b^saṃ^eb^saddena vutto natthī''ti vacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ. ye ``natthī''ti vadanti, tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbaṃ. nāmikapadamālā panassa ``saṃ, santaṃ, sante''tiādinā heṭṭhā pakāsitā. napuṃsakaliṅgatte ^b^saṃ^eb^ vuccati dhanaṃ, ``manussassaṃ. parassaṃ. sabbassaṃ. sabbassaharaṇaṃ. parassaharaṇa''ntiādīnettha nidassanapadāni. tattha manussassa saṃ manussassaṃ. evaṃ parassa saṃ parassaṃ. sabbassa saṃ sabbassaṃ. tassa haraṇaṃ parassaharaṇaṃ sabbassaharaṇanti samāso. tathā ^b^saṃ^eb^ vuccati sukhaṃ santi ca. vuttañhi tabbācakattaṃ porāṇakaviracanāyaṃ --

[07] tasmā ayamettha gāthā, ``sakalalokasaṅkaro dīpaṅkaro''ti ettha ``saṅkaro''ti padañcanidassanaṃ. ``saṃ, sāni, sā. saṃ, sāni, se. sena''iccādi pubbe pakāsitanayena ñeyyaṃ. ettha ca sotūnaṃ sugatamatavare kosallajananatthaṃ samāsantagatassa ^b^saṃ^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā kathayāma --

[03] manussassaṃ, manussassāni, manussassā. manussassaṃ, manussassāni, manussasse. manussassena, manussassehi, manussassebhi. manussassassa, manussassānaṃ. manussassā, manussassasmā, manussassamhā, manussassehi, manussassebhi. manussassassa, manussassānaṃ. manussasse, manussassasmiṃ, manussassamhi, manussassesu. bho manussassa, bhonto manussassāni, manussassā. esa nayo ``parassaṃ sabbassa''ntiādīsupi, sabbānetāni padāni abhidheyyaliṅgānīti gahetabbāni.
[03] iccevaṃ heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhānaṃ ^b^ko vi sā^eb^dīnaṃ nāmikapadamālā saddhiṃ atthantaranidassanapadehi vibhattā. tatridaṃ liṅgavavatthānaṃ --
[21] ^b^ko vi sā^eb^ honti pulliṅge, ^b^bhā rā thī dhī ku bhū^eb^ thiyaṃ.
[21] ^b^mo^eb^ pume itthiliṅge ^b^mā, saṃ^eb^ pume ca napuṃsake.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0325^ea^ viññūnaṃ nayaññūnaṃ saddaracanāvisaye paramavisuddhavipulabuddhipaṭilābhatthaṃ paramasaṇhasukhumatthesu payogesu asammohatthaṃ suvaṇṇatale sīhavijambhanena kesarīsīhassa vijambhanamiva tepiṭake buddhavacane ñāṇavijambhanena vijambhanatthañca adhikūnekakkharavasena liṅgattayaṃ missetvā nāmikapadamālā vibhattā.
[21] sadde bhavanti kusalā na tu keci atthe,
[22] atthe bhavanti kusalā na tu keci sadde..

[03] tattha ^b^vāccaliṅgānī^eb^ti appadhānaliṅgāni, guṇanāmasaṅkhātāni vā liṅgāni. ^b^abhidheyyaliṅgānī^eb^ti padhānaliṅgāni, guṇīpadasaṅkhātāni vā liṅgāni. yasmā pana tesu vāccaliṅgāni nāma abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattakāni bhavanti, tasmā sabbāni ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayāni ca vāccaliṅgāni abhidheyyaliṅgānurūpato yojetabbāni. tesaṃ ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayāni vāccaliṅgāni sarūpato nāmikapadamālāya ayojitānipi tattha tattha nayato yojitāni ^a^M0.0326^ea^, tasmā na dāni dassessāma. a^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayānipi kiñcāpi nayato yojitāni, tathāpi sotārānaṃ payogesu kosallajananatthaṃ kathayāma, nāmikapadamālañca nesaṃ dassessāma kiñci payogaṃ vadantā.
[21] dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ.

[03] dīgho, dīghā. dīghaṃ, dīghe. dīghena, dīghehi, dīghebhi. dīghassa, dīghānaṃ. dīghā, dīghasmā, dīghamhā, dīghehi, dīghebhi. dīghassa, dīghānaṃ. dīghe, dīghasmiṃ, dīghamhi, dīghesu. bho dīgha, bhavanto dīghā. ``dīghāti maṃ pakkoseyyāthā''ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.
[03] dīghā, dīghā, dīghāyo. dīghaṃ, dīghā, dīghāyo. dīghāya. sesaṃ ^b^kaññā^eb^nayena ñeyyaṃ.

[03] dīghaṃ, dīghāni, dīghā. dīghaṃ, dīghāni, dīghe. dīghena. sesaṃ ^b^citta^eb^nayena ñeyyaṃ. ^b^rassā^eb^dīni ca evameva vitthāretabbāni. ayaṃ vāccaliṅgānaṃ nāmikapadamālā, ``guṇanāmānaṃ nāmikapadamālā''ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03] bhavo ca abhavo ca ^b^bhavābhavaṃ^eb^. atha vā bhavo ca abhavo ca bhavābhavāni, ayaṃ viggaho. tatra ^b^bhavo^eb^ti khuddako bhavo. ^b^abhavo^eb^ti mahanto bhavo. vuddhatthavācako hettha ^b^a^eb^kāro. ettha ca sugatiduggativasena hīnapaṇītavasena ca khuddakamahantatā veditabbā. atha vā ^b^bhavo^eb^ti vuddhi. ^b^abhavo^eb^ti avuddhi. ayaṃ padattho. ayaṃ pana nāmikapadamālā --

[03] bhavābhavaṃ, bhavābhavaṃ, bhavābhavena, bhavābhavassa, bhavābhavā, bhavābhavasmā, bhavābhavamhā, bhavābhavassa, bhavābhave, bhavābhavasmiṃ, bhavābhavamhi, bho bhavābhava. iti ^b^bhavābhava^eb^padaṃ ekavacanakaṃ bhavati. dissati ca tassekavacanatā pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca --
[22] imasmiṃ kappe caritaṃ, pavakkhissaṃ suṇohi me''
[07] iti vā evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ^b^bhavābhava^eb^ padassa ekavacanatā diṭṭhā.

[03] bhavābhavāni, bhavābhavā, bhavābhavāni, bhavābhave, bhavābhavehi, bhavābhavebhi, bhavābhavānaṃ, bhavābhavehi, bhavābhavebhi, bhavābhavānaṃ, bhavābhavesu, bhavanto bhavābhavāni. iti ^b^bhavābhava^eb^padaṃ bahuvacanakampi bhavati. dissati ca tassa bahuvacanakatā pāḷiyaṃ ``dhonassa hi natthi kuhiñci loke. pakappikā diṭṭhi bhavābhavesū''ti. ubhayampi nayaṃ vomissetvā nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. kathaṃ? ``bhavābhavaṃ, bhavābhavāni. bhavābhavaṃ, bhavābhavāni. bhavābhavena, bhavābhavehi, bhavābhavebhi''iccevamādinā ^b^citta^eb^nayena yojetabbā.
[21] ``bhavo ca abhavo cā''ti, samāsatthaṃ vade budho.

[03] yathā ^a^M0.0329^ea^ cettha ^b^bhavābhava^eb^padassa nāmikapadamālā yojitā, evaṃ ``kammākammaṃ phalāphala''ntiādīnampi nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. atthopi nesaṃ yathārahaṃ vattabbo. yebhuyyenetāni ekavacanakāni bhavanti. evaṃ tāva ^b^bhavābhava^eb^padādīnaṃ visesavantatā daṭṭhabbā.

[03] laṅkādīpo, laṅkādīpaṃ, laṅkādīpena, laṅkādīpassa, laṅkādīpā, laṅkādīpasmā, laṅkādīpamhā, laṅkādīpassa, laṅkādīpe, laṅkādīpasmiṃ, laṅkādīpamhi, bho laṅkādīpa. ayaṃ samāsatte nāmikapadamālā. asamāsattepi pana yojetabbā.

[03] laṅkā dīpo, laṅkaṃ dīpaṃ, laṅkāya dīpena, laṅkāya dīpassa, laṅkāya dīpā, laṅkāya dīpasmā, laṅkāya dīpamhā, laṅkāya dīpassa, laṅkāya dīpe, laṅkāya dīpasmiṃ, laṅkāya dīpamhi, bhoti laṅke dīpa. ayaṃ byāse nāmikapadamālā. ayaṃ nayo ``jambudīpo''ti ettha na labbhati kevalena ^b^jambū^eb^saddena jambudīpassa akathanato, yathā kevalena ^b^laṅkā^eb^saddena laṅkādīpo kathiyati. ayaṃ pana byāse padamālānayo visesato kabbaracanāyaṃ kavīnaṃ upakārāya saṃvattati sāsanassāpi. tathā hi byāsavasena porāṇakaviracanā dissati --
[07] sāsanepi byāsavasena ``dibbo ratho pāturahu, vedehassa yasassino''tiādikā pāḷi dissati.

[03] yathā ^a^M0.0330^ea^ pana ``jambudīpo''ti ettha ayaṃ nayo na labbhati, tathā ``nāgadīpo''tiādīsupi kevalena ^b^jambū^eb^saddena jambudīpassa akathanamiva kevalena ^b^nāga^eb^saddādinā nāgadīpādīnaṃ akathanatoti. nanu ca bho ``buddhassa jambunadaraṃsino taṃ, dāṭhaṃ mayaṃ jambunarā namāmā''ti porāṇakaviracanāyaṃ ^b^jambū^eb^saddena jambudīpo vutto ``jambudīpanarā''ti atthasambhavatoti? saccaṃ ``jambudīpanarā''ti attho sambhavati, kevalena pana ^b^jambū^eb^saddena jambudīpatthaṃ na vadati, kintu ``jambudīpanarā''ti vattabbe gāthāvisayattā adhikakkharadosaṃ parivajjantena ^b^dīpa^eb^saddalopaṃ katvā ``jambunarā''ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ uttarapadalopavasena vutto ^b^jambu^eb^saddo ^b^nara^eb^saddaṃ paṭicca samāsabalena ``jambudīpanarā''ti atthappakāsane samattho hoti, na kevalo byāsakāle, tathā hi ``jambū''ti vutte jambudīpo na ñāyati, atha kho jamburukkhoyeva ñāyati.

[03] kiṃ pana bho ``kāko dāso, kākaṃ dāsaṃ, kākena dāsenā''ti ayaṃ nayo labbhati, na labbhatīti? labbhati, ^b^kāka^eb^saddena kākanāmakassa dāsassa kathanaṃ hoti. yadi evaṃ ``jambudīpo''ti etthāpi ``jambunāmako dīpo''ti atthaṃ gahetvā ``jambū dīpo, jambuṃ dīpaṃ, jambuyā dīpenā''ti ayaṃ nayo labbhatīti? na labbhati ^b^jambū^eb^saddassa paṇṇattivasena dīpe appavattanato. ^b^jambū^eb^saddo hi rukkheyeva paṇṇattivasena pavattati, na dīpe. yathā pana ^b^citta^eb^vohāro cittanāmake gahapatimhipi manepi pavattati ``citto gahapati. cittaṃ mano mānasa''ntiādīsu. yathā ca ^b^kusa^eb^vohāro kusanāmake raññepi kusatiṇepi pavattati --

[07] ādīsu, tathā ^b^kāka^eb^saddopi vāyase, evaṃnāmake dāsepi pavattati ``kāko ravati, kāko nāma dāso saṭṭhiyojanāni gacchatī''tiādīsu. ^b^jambū^eb^saddo pana gahapatimanādīsu ^b^citta kusa kāka^eb^saddā viya paṇṇattivasena dīpasmiṃ na pavattati, tasmā yathāvuttoyeva nayo manasikaraṇīyo.

[03] yathā panettha ``laṅkādīpo''ti saddassa nāmikapadamālā samāsavasena byāsavasena ca yojitā, evaṃ ``pubbavidehadīpo, aparagoyānadīpo, uttarakurudīpo, assayujanakkhattaṃ, citramāso, vessantararājā, setavatthaṃ, dibbaratho''tiādīnampi nāmikapadamālā samāsavasena byāsavasena ca yojetabbā. ^b^pubbavidehā^eb^disaddehi pubbavidehadīpādīnaṃ kathanañca veditabbaṃ. ``dibbaratho''tiādīnaṃ samāsagatapadānaṃ payojane sati byāsavasena visuṃ kattabbatā ca veditabbā. tathā hi byāsavasena ``dibbo ratho''tiādinā dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇavasena paccekavibhattiyuttabhāve sati gāthāsu vuttipālanasukhuccāraṇaguṇo bhavati. so ca sāsanānukūlo hi ayaṃ nayo ṭhapito. tathā hi pāvacane ``dibbo ratho pāturahu, vedehassa yasassino''tiādikā pāḷiyo bahū dissanti, evaṃ ^b^laṅkādīpā^eb^disaddānaṃ visesavantatā bhavati.
[22] dāmā dāmaṃ tathā saddhā, saddhaṃ taṭaṃ taṭī taṭo..

[03] etesu hi ^b^bodhi^eb^saddassa tāva ``bodhi rājakumāro''ti ca, ``ariyasāvako `bodhī'ti vuccati, tassa bodhissa aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo''ti ca evaṃ puggalavacanassa ``bodhi, bodhī, bodhayo. bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhayo. bodhinā''ti pulliṅge ^b^aggi^eb^nayena nāmikapadamālā bhavati.
[03] rukkhamagganibbānasabbaññutaññāṇavacanassa pana ``bodhi, bodhī, bodhiyo. bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhiyo. bodhiyā''ti itthiliṅge ^b^ratti^eb^nayena nāmikapadamālā bhavati.

[03] keci pana ``rukkhavacano bodhisaddo pulliṅgo''ti vadanti, taṃ āgamena viruddhaṃ viya dissanato vicāretabbaṃ. na hi āgame rukkhavacanassa ^b^bodhi^eb^saddassa pulliṅgabhāvo dissati, puggalavacanassa pana dissati. yadi ca ``sālo dhavo khadīro''tiādīnaṃ viya rukkhavacanassa ^b^bodhi^eb^saddassa pulliṅgattaṃ siyā, ^b^jambū simbalī pāṭalī^eb^saddādīnaṃ rukkhavācakattā pulliṅgattaṃ siyā, na tesaṃ imassa ca rukkhavācakattepi pulliṅgabhāvo upalabbhati. yadi hi rukkhavacano ^b^bodhi^eb^saddo pulliṅgo, evaṃ sante nibbānavacano sabbaññutaññāṇavacano ca ^b^bodhi^eb^saddo napuṃsakaliṅgo siyā ``nibbāna''ntiādinā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena niddiṭṭhassa nibbānādino atthassa kathanato.

[03] ye evaṃ vadanti ``rukkhavacano ^b^bodhi^eb^saddo pulliṅgo''ti, te ``bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ettha bhagavā pattoti ^a^M0.0333^ea^ rukkhopi bodhicceva vuccatī''ti vuttamatthaṃ cetasi sannidhāya ``bujjhati etthāti bodhī''ti nibbacanavasena ``kiṃ rukkhavacano ^b^bodhi^eb^saddo pulliṅgo na bhavissatī''ti maññamānā vadanti maññe. nevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, evañca pana daṭṭhabbaṃ, ``bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ettha bhagavā pattoti rukkhopi bodhicceva vuccatī''ti vadantehi garūhi ñāṇavacanaṃ itthi liṅgabhūtaṃ bodhīti ñāṇassa nāmaṃ paṇṇattiantaraparikappanenatthaṃ parikappentena bujjhanaṭṭhānabhūte rukkhe āropetvā rukkho ``bodhī''ti vutto, tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu nibbacane ādaro na kātabbo. na hi ``bujjhati etthāti bodhī''ti nibbacanakaraṇaṃ rukkhavacanassa ^b^bodhi^eb^saddassa pulliṅgattaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti saṅketasiddhattā vohārassa, tasmā rukkhaṃ sayaṃ abodhimpi samānaṃ bodhiyā paṭilābhaṭṭhānattā saṅketasiddhena ``bodhī''ti itthiliṅgavohārena voharanti sāsanikā, bodhiyā vā kāraṇattā phalavohārena. etamatthaṃyeva hi sandhāya ``bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ettha bhagavā pattoti rukkhopi bodhicceva vuccatī''ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, evaṃ ``bodhī''ti itthiliṅgavasena rukkhanāmaṃ pavattatīti. tenāha ^b^āyasmā sāriputto^eb^ dhammasenāpati anudhammacakkavattī vohārakusalo itthiliṅgavohārena ``buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho''ti. apica tattha tattha ``bodhiyā sākhā''ti ca, ``kenaṭṭhena mahābodhi, kassa sambandhinī ca sā''ti ca,
[22] uggantvāna tadā muñci, chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo subhā''ti ca

[03] atha vā rukkhavācako ^b^bodhi^eb^saddo dviliṅgo pumitthiliṅgavasena. tathā hi ^b^samantapāsādikāyaṃ^eb^ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ mahāveyyākaraṇassa pāḷinayaviduno ^b^buddhaghosā^eb^cariyassa evaṃ saddaracanā dissati ``sakkhissasi tvaṃ tāta pāṭaliputtaṃ gantvā mahābodhinā saddhiṃ ayyaṃ saṅghamittattheriṃ ānetu''nti ca, ``sāpi kho mahābodhisamārūḷhā nāvā passato mahārājassa mahāsamuddatalaṃ pakkhandā''ti ca tassa rukkhavācakassa ^b^bodhi^eb^saddassa ``bujjhati etthāti bodhī''ti nibbacanavasena ``bodhi, bodhī, bodhayo. bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhayo. bodhinā''tiādinā padamālā veditabbā. rukkhavācakasseva pana tassa ñāṇe pavattitthiliṅgavohārena saṅketasiddhena rūḷhatthadīpakena ``bodhi, bodhī, bodhiyo. bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhiyo. bodhiyā''tiādinā padamālā veditabbā. iccevaṃ --

[03] ^b^sandhi^eb^saddādīnampi nayānusārena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. ^b^sandhi^eb^saddo hi sarasandhiādivācako pulliṅgo, paṭisandhiyādivācako itthiliṅgo ``sandhino. sandhiyā''tiādidassanato. ^b^vibhatti^eb^saddo vibhajanavācako itthiliṅgo ^a^M0.0335^ea^, ^b^syā^eb^divācako pulliṅgo ceva itthiliṅgo ca ``vibhattissa. vibhattiyā''tiādidassanato.
[03] ^b^āyu^eb^saddo pana jīvitindriyavācakoyeva hutvā punnapuṃsakaliṅgo, ``punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā''ti ``ettakaṃyeva te āyu, cavanakālo bhavissatī''ti ca dassanato.
[03] ^b^dhātu^eb^saddo sabhāvādivācako itthiliṅgo, ^b^karapacā^eb^divācako pumitthiliṅgo ``cakkhudhātuyā. karotissa dhātussa. dhātuyo dhātuyā''ti dassanato.

[03] ^b^pajāpati^eb^saddo devavisesavācako pulliṅgo, kalattajinamātucchāvācako itthiliṅgo ``pajāpatissa devarājassa dhajaggaṃ ullokeyyātha'', ``attano pajāpatiyā saddhiṃ mahāpajāpatiyā''ti ca dassanato.

[03] ^b^dāmā dāmaṃ^eb^ saddā mālatīdāmādibhedabhinnassa ekassa vatthussa yathākkamaṃ itthinapuṃsakaliṅgā. tathā hi ``mālatīdāmā lolāḷiṅgalīlā. mālatīdāmaṃ. siṅghitaṃ dāmaṃ bhamarehi. ratanadāmā. ratanadāma''nti ca dviliṅgabhāve lokikappayogā dissanti sāsanānukūlā.

[03] ^b^saddhaṃ saddhā^eb^saddā pana bhinnavatthūnaṃ vācakā itthinapuṃsakaliṅgā, ^b^saddhā^eb^saddo pasādalakkhaṇavācako itthiliṅgo, ^b^saddhaṃ^eb^saddo matakabhattavācako napuṃsakaliṅgo ``saddhā saddahanā. mayamassubho gotamabrāhmaṇā nāma dānāni dema saddhāni karomā''ti dassanato. imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ``saddho puriso ^a^M0.0336^ea^, saddhā itthī, saddhaṃ kula''nti imāni vāccaliṅgattā saṅgahaṃ na gacchantīti daṭṭhabbāni.
[03] ^b^taṭaṃ taṭī taṭo^eb^time saddā tīrasaṅkhāte ekasmiṃyevatthe thīpunnapuṃsakaliṅgā.

[03] ^b^byañjana^eb^saddo upasecanaliṅgavākyāveṇikasarīrāvayavavācako napuṃsakaliṅgo, akkharavācako punnapuṃsakaliṅgo. tatrupasecane ``sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā''ti napuṃsakaniddeso dissati. tathā liṅge ``itthibyañjanaṃ purisabyañjana''nti napuṃsakaniddeso. vākye ``padabyañjanāni sādhukaṃ uggahetvā''ti napuṃsakaliṅganiddeso. āveṇike ``asīti anubyañjanānī''ti napuṃsakaniddeso. sarīrāvayave ``kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato anubyañjana''nti evaṃ napuṃsakaniddeso. ettha hi anubyañjanaṃ nāma hatthapādasitahasitakathitavilokitādibhedo ākāro. so eva ``sarīrāvayavo''ti vuccatīti. akkhare ``byañjano. byañjana''nti ca punnapuṃsakaniddeso.

[03] ^b^attha^eb^saddo nibbānavacano napuṃsakaliṅgo, abhidheyyadhanakāraṇapayojananivatyābhisandhānādivacano pana pulliṅgo. tathā hi ^b^kathāvatthumhi^eb^ ``atthatthamhī''ti imissā pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ``atthaṃ vuccati nibbāna''nti napuṃsakaliṅganiddesena ^b^attha^eb^saddo vutto. iti ^b^attha^eb^saddo dviliṅgo.

[03] ^b^akkhara^eb^saddo ca ``yo pubbo akkharo akkharānī''ti ca dassanato. apica ^b^akkhara^eb^saddo nibbānavacano nāmapaṇṇattivacano ca sabbadānapuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati ``padamaccutamakkharaṃ, mahājanasammatoti ^a^M0.0337^ea^ kho vāseṭṭha `mahāsammato'tveva paṭhamaṃ akkharaṃ nibbatta''nti evamādīsu. ``akkharāya deseti, akkharakkharāya āpatti pācittiyassā''ti ettha pana pulliṅgotipi napuṃsakaliṅgotipi vattabbo, itthiliṅgoti pana na vattabbo. ayañhi ``asakkatā casma dhanañcayāya. viramathāyasmanto mamavacanāyā''tiādīsu ``dhanañcayāya, vacanāyā''ti saddā viya vibhattivipallāsena vutto, na liṅgavipallāsavasenāti.
[03] ^b^ajjava maddava gārava^eb^saddā pana punnapuṃsakaliṅgā. ``ajjavo ca maddavo ca. ajjavamaddavaṃ. gāravo ca nivāto ca. saha āvajjite thūpe, gāravaṃ hoti me tadā''ti ca ādidassanato.

[03] ^b^vacovacī^eb^saddā pana ^b^ghaṭoghaṭī^eb^saddā viya pumitthiliṅgā, tattha ^b^vacī^eb^saddassa ``vacī, vacī, vaciyo. vaciṃ, vacī, vaciyo. vaciyā''ti nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. keci ``duccaritapayogaviññattisaddādīsu paresu ^b^vaca^eb^saddassanto ^b^ī^eb^kāro hoti, tena ``vacīduccarita''ntiādīni rūpāni dissantī''ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ ^b^vaca^eb^saddato visuṃ ^b^vacī^eb^saddassa dassanato. atrimāni pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca nidassanapadāni. ``vacī vacīsaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro vacī, vaciñca vacīsaṅkhāre ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva vacī, na ca vacīsaṅkhāro. gadito vacībhi satimābhinande''ti imāni pāḷito nidassanapadāni. ``copanasaṅkhātā vacī eva viññatti vacīviññatti, vaciyā bhedo vacībhedo''ti imāni aṭṭhakathāto nidassanapadāni. iminā nayena aññesampi sarūpāsarūpapadānaṃ ^a^M0.0338^ea^ yathārahaṃ dvitiliṅgatā vavatthapetabbā. evaṃ abhidheyyakaliṅgesu savisesāni abhidheyyaliṅgāni veditabbāni.
[03] idāni katthaci vāccaliṅgabhūtānaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgānañca taddhibhantaliṅgānañca dhammādivasena nāmikapadamālā vuccate. tathā hi --
[22] padaṃ samaṃ visamañca, jaññā sabbasamampi ca..
[03] kathaṃ? ``micchādiṭṭhi, micchāsaṅkappo, micchāvācā, micchāvāco, micchādiṭṭhiko, micchāsaṅkappī'' iccetesaṃ nāmikapadamālā evaṃ veditabbā.

[03] ``micchādiṭṭhi, micchādiṭṭhī, micchādiṭṭhiyo. micchādiṭṭhiṃ, micchādiṭṭhī, micchādiṭṭhiyo. micchādiṭṭhiyā''ti evaṃ dhammato, ``micchādiṭṭhi, micchādiṭṭhī, micchādiṭṭhino. micchādiṭṭhiṃ, micchādiṭṭhī, micchādiṭṭhino. micchādiṭṭhinā''ti evaṃ puggalato, ``micchāsaṅkappo, micchāsaṅkappā. micchāsaṅkappa''nti evaṃ dhammapuggalato, ``micchāvācā, micchāvācā, micchāvācāyo. micchāvācaṃ, micchāvācā micchāvācāyo. micchāvācāya'' evaṃ ekantadhammato, ``micchāvāco, micchāvācā. micchāvācaṃ, micchāvāce. micchāvācena'' evaṃ ekantapuggalato, ``micchādiṭṭhiko. micchādiṭṭhikā. micchādiṭṭhika''nti evampi ekantapuggalato, ``micchāsaṅkappī, micchāsaṅkappino. micchāsaṅkappi''nti evampi ekantapuggalato nāmikapadamālā bhavati. paccattopayogavacanādivasena pana padaṃ sadisaṃ visadisaṃ sabbathā sadisampi ca bhavati. esa nayo ^b^sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappā^eb^dīsupi.

[03] atrime ^a^M0.0339^ea^ āhaccabhāsitā payogā -- avijjāgatassa bhikkhave aviddasuno micchādiṭṭhi pahoti. micchādiṭṭhissa micchāsaṅkappo pahoti. micchāsaṅkappassa micchāvācā pahoti. micchāvācassa micchākammanto pahoti. micchākammantassa micchāājīvo pahoti. micchāājīvassa micchāvāyāmo pahoti. micchāvāyāmassa micchāsati pahoti. micchāsatissa micchāsamādhi pahotīti. vijjāgatassa bhikkhave viddasuno sammādiṭṭhi pahoti. sammādiṭṭhissa sammāsaṅkappo pahotīti vitthāro, evaṃ katthaci vāccaliṅgabhūtānaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgānañca taddhitantaliṅgānañca nāmikapadamālā sappayogā kathitā.

[03] idāni nevābhidheyyaliṅgassa ^b^bhavitabba^eb^saddassa ca abhidheyyaliṅgānaṃ ^b^sotthi suvatthi^eb^ saddānañca vāccaliṅgābhidheyyaliṅgassa ^b^abbhuta^eb^saddassa ca vāccaliṅgassa ^b^abhūta^eb^saddassacāti imesaṃ kiñci visesaṃ kathayāma, nāmikapadamālañca yathārahaṃ yojessāma. etesu hi ^b^bhavitabba^eb^saddo ekantabhāvavācako napuṃsakaliṅgo ekavacanantoyeva hoti. tatiyantapadehi ^b^evaṃ^eb^sadda ^b^na^eb^saddādīhi ca yojetabbo ca hoti. nāssa nāmikapadamālā labbhati, atrime ca payogā ``saddhammagarukena bhavitabbaṃ, no āmisagarukena, iminā corena bhavitabbaṃ, imehi corehi bhavitabbaṃ, imāya coriyā bhavitabbaṃ, imāhi corīhi bhavitabbaṃ, anena cittena bhavitabbaṃ, imehi cittehi bhavitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhavitabbaṃ, aññathā bhavitabba''nti. atridaṃ vuccati --
[03] sotthi bhaddante hotu rañño, sotthiṃ gacchati nhāpito. sotthināmhi samuṭṭhito. suvatthi, suvatthiṃ, suvatthinā, ayaṃ ^b^dhasātthi^eb^saddādīnaṃ viseso.

[03] ayaṃ pana ``abbhutaṃ abhūta''nti dvinnaṃ viseso. ^b^bhū^eb^saddassa bbhū, saṃyogapare paṭisedhatthavati ^b^a^eb^itinipāte upapade sati ekantena rassattamupayāti. kvatthe? ``abhūtapubbaṃ bhūta''ntiādīsvatthesu. tathāvidhe asaññogapare rassattaṃ na upayāti. kvatthe? ``asacca''ntiādīsvatthesu. tathā hi ``abbhuta''nti padassa ``abhūtapubbaṃ bhūta''ntipi attho bhavati, ``abbhutakaraṇa''ntipi attho bhavati. ``abhūta''nti padassa pana ``asacca''ntipi attho bhavati, ``ajāta''ntipi attho bhavati. tatra ``acchariyaṃ vata bho abbhutaṃ vata bho. accheraṃ vata lokasmiṃ, abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ'' iccevamādayo ``abhūtapubbaṃ bhūta''nti atthe payogā.

[07] iccevamādayo abbhutakaraṇatthe payogā. evaṃ rassavasena, dīghavasena pana nissaṃyoge ``abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ. atathaṃ''iccevamādayo ^a^M0.0341^ea^ asaccatthe payogā, ``abhūtaṃ ajātaṃ asañjāta''nti iccevamādayo ajātatthe payogā. bhavanti catra --

[03] abbhutaṃ, abbhutāni. ^b^citta^eb^nayena, abbhuto, abbhutā. abbhutaṃ, ^b^purisa^eb^nayena, abbhutā, abbhutā, abbhutāyo. abbhutaṃ. ^b^kaññā^eb^nayena ñeyyaṃ. evaṃ ^b^bhūta^eb^saddassapi nāmikapadamālā tidhā gahetabbā. atra ``abbhuta''miti padaṃ vāccaliṅgampi bhavati abhidheyyaliṅgampi. ``abhūta''miti padaṃ pana vāccaliṅgaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgampi vā ^b^sacca^eb^saddo viya katthaci. itissa yathārahaṃ ayampi sappayogā nāmikapadamālā kathitā.

[03] idāni āgamikānaṃ kosallajananatthaṃ padasamodhānavasena nāmikapadamālā vuccate -- buddho bhagavā, buddhā bhagavanto. buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ, buddhe bhagavante. buddhena bhagavatā, sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. ayaṃ padamālā ekavacanabahuvacanavasena ñeyyā.
[03] devā tāvatiṃsā. deve tāvatiṃse. devehi tāvatiṃsehi. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. bahuvacanavasena ñeyyā padamālā.

[03] so ^a^M0.0342^ea^ bhagavā jānaṃ passaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, taṃ bhagavantaṃ jānantaṃ passantaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena, tassa bhagavato jānato passato arahato sammāsambuddhassa. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. ekavacanavasena ñeyyā padamālā.
[03] rājā suddhodano, rājānaṃ suddhodanaṃ, raññā suddhodanena. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] rājā passenadī kosalo, rājānaṃ passenadiṃ kosalaṃ, raññā passenadinā kosalena. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro, rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ, raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto, rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ, raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] mahāpajāpatī gotamī, mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ, mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyāti pañcakkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ. mahāpajāpatiyaṃ gotamiyaṃ, bhoti mahāpajāpati gotami.
[03] makkhali gosālo. makkhaliṃ gosālaṃ. makkhalinā gosālena. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] sāriputtamoggallānaṃ sāvakayugaṃ. sāriputtamoggallānaṃ sāvakayugaṃ, sāriputtamoggallānena sāvakayugena, sāriputtamoggallānassa ^a^M0.0343^ea^ sāvakayugassa. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. sabbāpetā padamālā ekavacanavasena ñeyyā. sāriputtamoggallānā aggasāvakā, sāriputtamoggallāne aggasāvake, sāriputtamoggallānehi aggasāvakehi. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. bahuvacanavasena ñeyyā. ito aññesupi eseva nayo.

[03] so dāro, sā dārā. saṃ dāraṃ, se dāre. sena dārena. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. sā nārī, sā nāriyo. saṃ nāriṃ, sā nāriyo. sāya nāriyā. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. saṃ kammaṃ, sāni kammāni. sena kammena. saṃ phalaṃ, sāni phalāni. sena phalena. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, paṭhamena jhānena, paṭhamassa jhānassa. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] catutthī disā, catutthiṃ disaṃ, catutthiyā disāya.

[03] dhammī kathā, dhammiṃ kathaṃ, dhammiyā kathāya, dhammiyaṃ kathāyaṃ. evaṃ anupubbī kathā, evarūpī kathā. iminā nayena aññesupi ṭhānesu padasamodhānavasena liṅgato ca antato ca vacanato ca apekkhitabbaṃ. padato ca nānappakārā nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.

[03] idāni ekappakārānaṃ saddānaṃ liṅgāntavasena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ. kathaṃ? yādiso, yādisī, yādisaṃ. tādiso, tādisī, tādisaṃ. etādiso, etādisī, etādisaṃ. kīdiso, kīdisī, kīdisaṃ. īdiso, īdisī, īdisaṃ. ediso ^a^M0.0344^ea^, edisī, edisaṃ. sadiso, sadisī, sadisaṃ. kadāci pana ``yādisā tādisā''ti evamādīni itthiliṅgarūpānipi bhavanti. nāmikapadamālā nesaṃ ^b^purisa itthī citta^eb^nayena yojetabbā.
[03] idāni samāsataddhitapadabhūtānaṃ ^b^amama^eb^saddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālā vuccate -- amamo, amamā, amamaṃ, amame. amamena. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] mayhako, mayhakā. mayhakaṃ, mayhake. mayhakena. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] āmā, āmā, āmāyo. āmaṃ, āmā, āmāyo. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] tatra ^b^amamo^eb^ti natthi taṇhāmamattaṃ diṭṭhimamattañca etassāti amamo, ko so, arahāyevāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. apica yesataṇhāpi sadiṭṭhīpi ``mama ida''nti mamattaṃ na karonti, tepi amamāyeva. ettha ca ``manussā tattha jāyanti, amamā apariggahā''ti idaṃ sāsanato nidassanaṃ. ``amamo nirahaṅkāro''ti idaṃ pana lokato nidassanaṃ. itthiliṅge vattabbe ``amamā, amamā, amamāyo''ti padamālā. napuṃsake vattabbe ``amamaṃ, amamānī''ti padamālā. tatra ^b^mayhako^eb^ti ``idampi mayhaṃ idampi mayha''nti vippalapatīti mayhako, eko pakkhiviseso. vuttañhetaṃ ^b^jātake^eb^ --

[03] itthiliṅge vattabbe ``mayhakī, mayhakī, mayhakiyo''ti padamālā. tatra ^b^āmā^eb^ti ``āma ahaṃ tumhākaṃ dāsī''ti evaṃ dāsibhāvaṃ paṭijānātīti āmā. gehadāsī. vuttañhetaṃ ^b^jātakesu^eb^ ^a^M0.0345^ea^ ``yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni gacchatī''ti ca, ``āmāya dāsāpi bhavanti loke''ti ca, tasmā imānevettha nidassanapadāni.

[03] idāni ^b^kati katipaya katimī^eb^saddānaṃ viseso vuccate yathārahaṃ nāmikapadamālā ca. tatra ^b^katimī^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā na labbhati ``ajja bhante katimī''ti evaṃ pucchāvasena āgatamattato. ^b^kati katipaya^eb^saddānaṃ pana labbhateva, sā ca bahuvacanikā. ^b^visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ pana katipaya^eb^saddo ekavacaniko vutto. kati purisā tiṭṭhanti, kati purise passati. kati itthiyo, kati kulāni. kati lokasmiṃ chiddāni yattha cittaṃ na tiṭṭhati. kati kusalā. kati dhātuyo. kati āyatanāni. katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ. katibhi rajamāneti, katibhi parisujjhati. katipayā purisā, katipayā itthiyo, katipayāni cittāni. imā pana nāmikapadamālā.

[03] katipayā. katipayehi, katipayebhi. katipayānaṃ. katipayesu. katipayāyo. katipayāhi, katipayābhi. katipayānaṃ. katipayāsu. katipayāni. katipaye. katipayehi, katipayebhi. katipayānaṃ. katipayesūti. sabbāpetā sattannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ vasena ñeyyā, samāsavidhimhipi ^b^kati^eb^ ^a^M0.0346^ea^ ^b^katipaya^eb^saddā bahuvacanavaseneva yojetabbā. ``katisaṅgātigo bhikkhu, oghatiṇṇoti vuccati. katipayajanakata''ntiādīsu hi ``kati kittakā saṅgā katisaṅgā''tiādinā sabbadā bahuvacanasamāso daṭṭhabbo.

[03] idāni rūḷhīsaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā vuccate -- idha ^b^rūḷhīsaddā^eb^ nāma ^b^yevāpanaka^eb^saddādayo. yevāpanako, yevāpanakā. yevāpanakaṃ. yevāpano, yevāpanā. yevāpanaṃ. yaṃvāpanakaṃ, yaṃvāpanakāni. sesaṃ sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ. tatra ^b^yevāpanako^eb^ti ``phasso hoti vedanā hotī''tiādinā vuttā phassādayo viya sarūpato avatvā ``ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā''ti evaṃ ``yevāpanā''ti padena vutto yevāpanako, evaṃ ``yevāpano''ti etthāpi. tathā ``yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpa''nti evaṃ ``yaṃvāpanā''ti padena vuttaṃ ^b^yaṃvāpanakaṃ^eb^. esa nayo yathārahaṃ ^b^yassakaṃ yatthaka^eb^ntiādīsupi netabbo.

[03] ettha siyā -- nanu ca bho ^b^pana^eb^saddo nipāto, nipātānañca abyayabhāvo siddho tīsu liṅgesu sabbavibhattivacanesu ca vayābhāvato, so kasmā ``yevāpano''ti ^b^o^eb^kāranto jātoti? saccaṃ ^b^pana^eb^saddo nipāto, so ca kho ``ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye''ti vā, ``yaṃ vā panaññampī''ti vā, ``brāhmaṇā panā''ti vā evamādīsu nipāto, ``yevāpanako''ti vā, ``yevāpano''ti vā evamādīsu nipāto nāma na hoti. anukaraṇamattañhetaṃ, tasmā īdisesu ^b^pana^eb^saddasahitā payogā rūḷhīsaddāti gahetabbā. yajjevaṃ kasmā nibbacanamudāhaṭanti? atthassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ.
[03] tayodhammajātakaṃ ^a^M0.0347^ea^. tayodhammajātakaṃ. tayodhammajātakena. tayodhammajātakassa. tayodhammajātakā, tayodhammajātakasmā. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] tayosaṅkhārā. tayosaṅkhāre. tayosaṅkhārehi, tayosaṅkhārebhi. tayosaṅkhārānaṃ. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
[03] cattāripurisayugo saṅgho. cattāripurisayugaṃ saṅghaṃ. cattāripurisayugena saṅghena. cattāripurisayugassa saṅghassa. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] satokārī, satokārī, satokārino. satokāriṃ, satokārī, satokārino. satokārinā, satokārīhi, satokārībhi. satokārissa. sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. ettha ^b^satokārī^eb^ti saratīti sato, sato eva hutvā karaṇasīloti satokārī.
[03] aparesampi rūḷhīsaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā vuccate saddhimatthavibhāvanāya. aṅgā. aṅge. aṅgehi, aṅgebhi. aṅgānaṃ. aṅgehi, aṅgebhi. aṅgānaṃ. aṅgesu. bhonto aṅgā.

[03] aṅgā janapado. aṅge janapadaṃ. aṅgehi, aṅgebhi janapadena. aṅgānaṃ janapadassa. aṅgehi, aṅgebhi janapadasmā. aṅgānaṃ janapadassa. aṅgesu janapade. bhonto aṅgā janapada. evaṃ ^b^magadhakosalā^eb^dīnampi yojetabbā.

[03] itthiliṅge kāsī, kāsiyo, kāsī, kāsiyo. kāsīhi, kāsībhi. kāsīnaṃ. kāsīhi, kāsībhi. kāsīnaṃ. kāsīsu. bhotiyo kāsiyo. atrāyamatthavibhāvanā -- kāsī, kāsiyo janapado. kāsī, kāsiyo janapadaṃ ^a^M0.0348^ea^. kāsīhi, kāsībhi janapadena. kāsīnaṃ janapadassa. kāsīhi, kāsībhi janapadasmā. kāsīnaṃ janapadassa. kāsīsu janapade. bhotiyo kāsiyo janapada. evaṃ ^b^avantīcetī vajjī^eb^ iccetesampi padānaṃ yojetabbā. tenāhu ^b^aṭṭhakathācariyā^eb^ ``kurūsu janapade''ti. evaṃ ^b^aṅgā^eb^dīni atthassa ekattepi janapadanāmattā rūḷhīvasena bahuvacanāneva bhavanti. tathā hi tattha tattha ``aṅgesu viharati. magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno''tiādinā, ``aṅgānaṃ magadhānaṃ kāsīnaṃ kosalāna''ntiādinā ca bahuvacanapāḷiyo dissanti. evaṃ rūḷhīsaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā bhavanti.

[03] idāni aparāpi ito savisesatarā saddabhede sammohaviddhaṃsanakārikā paramasukhumañāṇāvahā nāmikapadamālāyo kathayāma sotūnaṃ atthabyañjanaggahaṇe paramakosallasampādanatthaṃ. tā ca kho ``sambuddho paṭijānāsi. kassako paṭijānāsi. upāsako paṭijānāsi. sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā''tiādayo pāḷinaye nissāyeva. tattha ^b^sambuddhopaṭijānāsī^eb^ti ``tvaṃ `ahaṃ sammāsambuddho'ti paṭijānāsī''ti ^b^iti^eb^saddalopavasena attho gahetabbo. esa nayo ``kassako paṭijānāsī''tiādīsupi. ``sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato''ti ettha pana ``ahaṃ sammāsambuddho''ti paṭijānantassa tavāti evaṃ ^b^iti^eb^saddalopayojanāvasena añño saddasanniveso teneva añño atthapaṭivedho ca bhavati. ``khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānatoti''ādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato^eb^ti ``ahaṃ sammāsambuddho, sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhā''ti ^a^M0.0349^ea^ evaṃ paṭijānato tavāti yo attho vutto, sopi yathādassito atthoyeva. evaṃpakāraṃ ñatvā paṇḍitajātiyena kulaputtena amhehi vuccamānā ``ahaṃ sammāsambuddho'ti tvaṃ paṭijānāsī''ti etasmiṃ atthe sakriyāpadā ayaṃ padamālā vavatthapetabbā --

[03] sammāsambuddho tvaṃ paṭijānaṃ tiṭṭhasi. sammāsambuddhaṃ taṃ paṭijānantaṃ passati. sammāsambuddhena te paṭijānatā dhammo desito. sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato dīyate. sammāsambuddhasmā tayā paṭijānatā apeti. sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato dhammo. sammāsambuddhasmiṃ tayi paṭijānante patiṭṭhitanti. tathā ``khīṇāsavo tvaṃ paṭijānāsī''tiādināpi vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] iddhimā bhikkhu ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti. iddhimanto bhikkhū ekopi hutvā bahudhā honti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontīti imasmiṃ panatthe ayampi sakriyāpadā padamālā vavatthapetabbā --

[03] ekopi hutvā bahudhā honto bahudhāpi hutvā eko honto bhikkhu tiṭṭhati, ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontā bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontā bhikkhū tiṭṭhanti. ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontaṃ bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati, ekopi hutvā bahudhā honte bahudhāpi hutvā eko honte bhikkhū passati. ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontena bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontena bhikkhunā dhammo desito, ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontehi bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontehi bhikkhūhi dhammo desito. ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontassa bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontassa bhikkhuno dīyate. sesaṃ ^a^M0.0350^ea^ vitthāretabbaṃ. bho ekopi hutvā bahudhā honta bahudhāpi hutvā eko honta bhikkhu tvaṃ dhammaṃ desehi, bhonto ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontā bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontā tumhe dhammaṃ desethāti. imasmiṃ ṭhāne ^b^kevaṭṭasuttaṃ^eb^ sādhakaṃ. ``idha kevaṭṭa bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti. ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti, āvibhāvaṃ...pe0... tamenaṃ aññataro saddho pasanno passati taṃ bhikkhuṃ anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhontaṃ ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontaṃ bahudhāpi hutvā eko honta''nti idaṃ kevaṭṭasuttaṃ.

[03] ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappento bhikkhu evaṃ vadati, ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappentā bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti. ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappentaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati, ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappente bhikkhū passati. sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. ettha pana ``na tveva ekoekāya, mātugāmena sallape''tiādikaṃ pāḷipadaṃ sādhakaṃ. ettha hi ^b^ekoekāyā^eb^ti idaṃ abyayapadasadisaṃ rūḷhīpadanti gahetabbaṃ, ^b^aññamañña^eb^nti saddassa viya ca ekapadattūpagamanañcassa veditabbaṃ. bhikkhu vinā dutiyena sayaṃ eko hutvā ekāya itthiyā saddhinti imasmiṃ atthe ``ekoekāyā''ti idaṃ padaṃ na rūḷhīpadanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. evaṃ santepi na ``eko''ti saddo ``bhikkhū''ti padena samānādhikaraṇo. yadi samānādhikaraṇo siyā, ``nisajjaṃ kappenta''ntiādi na vattabbaṃ siyā. ``ekāyā''ti saddopi na ajjhāharitabbena ``itthiyā''ti padena samānādhikaraṇo. yadi samānādhikaraṇo siyā, ``mātugāmenā''ti ^a^M0.0351^ea^ na vattabbaṃ siyā visesābhāvato dviruttabhāvāpajjanato ca. kiñca bhiyyo ``mātugāmenā''ti vuttattā ``ekenā''ti vattabbaṃ siyā, ekantato pana ``ekoekāyā''ti idaṃ padaṃ pumitthisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ apekkhati, na samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ, tasmā ``dve jānipatayo aññamaññaṃ sallapentī''tiādīsu ``aññamañña''nti padassa viya ca ``ekoekāyā''ti imassa ekapadattañca nisajjaṃ kappentassa bhikkhuno visesanattañca veditabbaṃ. atha vā yassaṃ nisajjakriyāyaṃ bhikkhupi ekova hoti, itthīpi ekāva. sā kriyā rūḷhīvasena ``ekoekāyā''ti vuccati, tādisāya ekoekāya nisajjakriyāya bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhintipi attho gahetabbo. iminā nayena aññesampi rūḷhīsaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā yathāpayogaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanavasena yojetabbā. iccevaṃ vāccābhidheyyaliṅgādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālā nānappakārato pakāsitā.
[06] iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ

[03] ettāvatā ^a^M0.0352^ea^ ^b^bhū^eb^dhātumayānaṃ pulliṅgānaṃ itthiliṅgānaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgānañca nāmikapadamālā yathārahaṃ liṅgantarehi saddantarehi atthantarehi ca saddhiṃ nānappakārato dassitā. sabbanāmāni hi ṭhapetvā nayato aññāni kānici nāmāni aggahitāni nāma natthi.
[21] yāni honti tiliṅgāni, anukūlāni yāni ca.
[21] tesu kānici rūpehi, sesāññehi ca yujjare.
[22] kānici pana saheva, etesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ idaṃ..
[21] etasmā lakkhaṇā muttaṃ, na padaṃ sabbanāmikaṃ.
[03] sabbanāmāni nāma -- sabba katara katama ubhaya itarāñña aññatara aññatama pubba para apara dakkhiṇa uttara adharayata eta ima amukiṃ eka ubha dviti catu tumha amha iccetāni sattavīsa.

[03] etesu ^b^sabba^eb^saddo sakalattho, so ca sabbasabbādivasena ñeyyo. ^b^katara katama^eb^saddā pucchanatthā. ^b^ubhaya^eb^saddo dviavayavasamudāyavacano. ^b^itara^eb^saddo vuttapaṭiyogīvacano. ^b^añña^eb^saddo adhigatāparavacano. ^b^aññatara aññatama^eb^saddā aniyamatthā. ^b^pubbā^eb^dayo ^b^uttara^eb^pariyantā disākālādivavatthāvacanā. tathā hi ^b^pubba^eb^ ^a^M0.0353^ea^ ^b^parā para dakkhiṇuttara^eb^saddā pulliṅgatte yathārahaṃ kāladesādivacanā, itthiliṅgatte disādivacanā, napuṃsakaliṅgatte ṭhānādivacanā. ^b^adhara^eb^saddopi heṭṭhimatthavācako vavatthāvacanoyeva, so ca tiliṅgo ``adharo patto. adharā araṇī, adharaṃ bhājana''miti, ^b^yaṃ^eb^saddo aniyamattho. ^b^taṃ^eb^saddo parammukhāvacano. ^b^eta^eb^saddo samīpavacano. ^b^ima^eb^saddo accantasamīpavacano. ^b^amu^eb^saddo dūravacano. ^b^kiṃ^eb^saddo pucchanattho. ^b^eka^eb^saddo saṅkhādivacano. vuttañhi --

[02] ^b^eka^eb^saddo aññatthaseṭṭhāsahāyasaṅkhādīsu dissati. tathā hesa ``sassato attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti, ittheke abhivadantī''tiādīsu aññatthe dissati. ``cetaso ekodibhāva''ntiādīsu seṭṭhe. ``eko vūpakaṭṭho''tiādīsu asahāye. ``ekova kho bhikkhave khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā''tiādīsu saṅkhāyanti.

[03] yatthesa saṅkhāvacano, tatthekavacanantova. ^b^ubha^eb^saddo ^b^dvi^eb^saddapariyāyo. ^b^dviticatu^eb^saddā saṅkhāvacanā, sabbakālaṃ bahuvacanantāva. ^b^tumha^eb^saddo yena katheti, tasmiṃ vattabbavacanaṃ. ^b^amha^eb^saddo attani vattabbavacanaṃ.

[03] sabbo, sabbe. sabbaṃ, sabbe. sabbena, sabbehi, sabbebhi. sabbassa, sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ. sabbasmā, sabbamhā, sabbehi, sabbebhi. sabbassa, sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ. sabbasmiṃ, sabbamhi, sabbesu. bho sabba, bhavanto sabbe.

[03] tatra ^a^M0.0354^ea^ ``sabbo bhūto, sabbe bhūtā''tiādinā, ``sabbo puriso, sabbe purisā''tiādinā ca nayena sabbāni pulliṅganāmehi saddhiṃ yojetabbāni. yāni pana ^b^yamakamahātherena^eb^ punnapuṃsakavisaye ^b^sabba katara katamā^eb^dīnaṃ aññānipi rūpāni vuttāni. taṃ yathā?

[03] sabbā, sabbā, sabbāyo. sabbaṃ, sabbā, sabbāyo. sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāhi, sabbābhi. sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāsaṃ. sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāhi, sabbābhi. sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāsaṃ. sabbāyaṃ, sabbassā, sabbassaṃ, sabbāsu. bhoti sabbe, bhotiyo sabbā, sabbāyo. itthiliṅgatte nāmikapadamālā.

[03] ettha ``sabbā bhāvikā, sabbā bhāvikāyo''ti, ``sabbā kaññā, sabbā kaññāyo''ti ca ādinā itthiliṅgasabbanāmāni sabbehi itthiliṅgehi saddhiṃ yojetabbāni. ettha ca ``sabbassā''ti padaṃ tatiyācatutthīpañcamīchaṭṭhīsattamīvasena pañcadhā vibhattaṃ ``tassā kumārikāya saddhi''nti karaṇappayogādidassanato. sabbassā kaññāya kataṃ. sabbassā kaññāya deti. ayaṃ kaññā sabbassā kaññāya hīnā virūpā. ayaṃ kaññā sabbassā kaññāya uttamā abhirūpā. sabbassā kaññāya apeti, sabbassā kaññāya dhanaṃ. sabbassā kaññāya patiṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] sabbaṃ, sabbāni. sabbaṃ, sabbāni. sabbena, sabbehi, sabbebhi. sabbassa, sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ. sabbasmā, sabbamhā, sabbehi, sabbebhi ^a^M0.0355^ea^. sabbassa, sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ. sabbasmiṃ, sabbamhi, sabbesu. bho sabba, bhavanto sabbāni. napuṃsakaliṅgatte nāmikapadamālā.

[03] ettha ``sabbaṃ bhūtaṃ, sabbāni bhūtāni. sabbaṃ cittaṃ, sabbāni cittānī''ti ca ādinā napuṃsakaliṅgasabbanāmāni sabbehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi saddhiṃ yojetabbāni. evaṃ ^b^sabba^eb^saddassa liṅgattayavasena padamālā bhavati.

[03] idānissa parapadena saddhiṃ samāso veditabbo ``sabbasādhāraṇo sabbaverī''iti. tattha sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇo ^b^sabbasādhāraṇo^eb^. sabbesaṃ verī, sabbe vā verino yassa soyaṃ ^b^sabbaverī^eb^ti samāsaviggaho. yathā pana ^b^sabba^eb^saddassa padamālā liṅgattayavasena yojitā, evaṃ ^b^katara^eb^saddādīnampi ^b^adhara^eb^saddapariyantānaṃ yojetabbā.

[03] kataro, katare. kataraṃ...pe0... bho katara, bhavanto katare. katamo, katame. itaro, itare. añño, aññe. aññataro, aññatare. aññatamo, aññatame. pubbo, pubbe. paro, pare. aparo, apare. dakkhiṇo, dakkhiṇe. uttaro, uttare. adharo, adhare...pe0... bho adhara, bhavanto adhareti.

[03] kataraṃ, katarāni. kataraṃ...pe0... bho katara, bhavanto katarāni. katamaṃ. ubhayaṃ. itaraṃ. aññaṃ. aññataraṃ. aññatamaṃ. pubbaṃ. paraṃ. aparaṃ. dakkhiṇaṃ. uttaraṃ. adharaṃ, adharāni. adharaṃ...pe0... bho adhara, bhavanto adharānīti.

[03] idāni ^a^M0.0356^ea^ punnapuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ ^b^para^eb^saddādīnaṃ rūpantaraniddeso vuccati. ^b^kaccāyana^eb^smiñhi ``purisā''ti viya ``parā''ti paṭhamābahuvacanaṃ dissati. evarūpo nayo ^b^aparasabbakatarā^eb^dīsu ^b^aññatama^eb^pariyosānesu navasu appasiddho, labbhamāno ^b^pubbadakkhiṇuttarādharesu^eb^ catūsu labbheyya. tathā ``purise''ti viya pāḷiādīsu ``pubbe''ti saccasaṅkhepe ``itare''ti, ^b^kaccāyane^eb^ ca ``pare''ti sattamīekavacanaṃ dissati. evarūpo nayo ^b^sabba añña^eb^saddesu appasiddho, labbhamāno ^b^katarakatamā^eb^dīsu sesesu ^b^adhara^eb^pariyosānesu dvādasasu labbheyya. tathā ``purisā''ti viya ^b^sabbā katarā^eb^ iccādi pañcamīekavacananayo pāḷiādīsu appasiddho. evaṃ santepi ayaṃ nayo punappunaṃ upaparikkhitvā yutto ce, gahetabbo.

[03] katarā, katarā, katarāyo. kataraṃ...pe0... bhoti katare, bhotiyo katarā, katarāyo. katamā. ubhayā. itarā. aññatarā. aññatamā. pubbā. parā. aparā. dakkhiṇā. uttarā. adharā, adharā, adharāyo. adharaṃ...pe0... bhoti adhare, bhotiyo adharā, adharāyoti.

[03] yasmā panetesu ^b^itara añña aññatara aññatamā^eb^naṃ pāḷiyādīsu ``itarissā''tiādidassanato koci bhedo vattabbo ^a^M0.0357^ea^, tasmā catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ ekavacanaṭṭhāne ``itarissā, itarāya, aññissā, aññāya. aññatarissā, aññatarāya, aññatamissā, aññatamāyā''ti yojetabbaṃ. tathā tatiyāpañcamīnamekavacanaṭṭhāne ``tassā kumārikāya saddhiṃ. kassāhaṃ kena hāyāmī''ti karaṇanissakkappayogadassanato sattamiyā panekavacanaṭṭhāne ``itarissā, itarissaṃ, itarāya, itarāyaṃ, aññissā, aññissaṃ, aññāya, aññāyaṃ, aññatarissā, aññatarissaṃ, aññatarāya, aññatarāyaṃ, aññatamissā, aññatamissaṃ, aññatamāya, aññatamāya''nti yojetabbaṃ ``aññataro bhikkhu aññatarissā itthiyā paṭibaddhacitto hotī''ti pāḷidassanato.

[03] tatra ^b^sabba^eb^saddo sabbasabbaṃ, padesasabbaṃ, āyatanasabbaṃ, sakkāyasabbanti catūsu visayesu diṭṭhappayogo. tathā hesa ``sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī''tiādīsu sabbasabbasmiṃ āgato. ``sabbesaṃ vo sāriputtā subhāsitaṃ pariyāyenā''tiādīsu padesasabbasmiṃ. ``sabbaṃ vo bhikkhave desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmi...pe0... katamañca bhikkhave sabbaṃ cakkhuñceva rūpā ca...pe0... mano ceva dhammā cā''ti ettha āyatanasabbasmiṃ. ``sabbaṃ sabbato sañjānātī''tiādīsu sakkāyasabbasmiṃ. tattha sabbasabbasmiṃ āgato nippadeso, itaresu tīsu sappadesoti veditabbo. iccevaṃ --

[03] ^b^katara katama^eb^saddesu ^b^katara^eb^saddo appesu ekaṃ vā dve vā tīṇi vā bhiyyo vā appamupādāya vattati. ^b^katama^eb^saddo bahūsu ekaṃ vā dve vā tīṇi vā bahuṃ vā upādāya vattati. ^b^katara^eb^saddo hi appavisayo, ^b^katama^eb^saddo bahuvisayo. tatrime payogā ``katarena maggena gantabbaṃ. samuddo kataro ayaṃ. katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti. katame dhammā kusalā. disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disatā, imāyo, katamaṃ disaṃ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā''. iccevamādayo bhavanti. ubhayo. ubhayaṃ. ubhayo. ubhayena. sesaṃ pulliṅge ^b^sabba^eb^saddasamaṃ. ubhayo janā tiṭṭhanti. ubhayo jane passati. yathā ubho puttā. ubho putteti. ``ubhayo''ti hi padaṃ ``ubho''ti padamiva bahuvacanantabhāvena pasiddhaṃ, na tvekavacanantabhāvena. ettha hi --

[03] ``ubhayo te pitābhātaro''ti tadatthasādhakāni nidassanapadāni veditabbāni. yadā panāyasmanto ``ubhayo''ti ekavacanantaṃ passeyyātha, tadā sādhukaṃ manasi karotha. ko hi samattho anantanayapaṭimaṇḍite sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake jinasāsane niravasesato nayaṃ daṭṭhuṃ ^a^M0.0359^ea^ dassetuñca aññatra āgamādhigamasampannena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena. idañcetthupalakkhitabbaṃ --

[03] idāni asabbanāmesu saṅgaho vuccate -- tattha ^b^añña^eb^saddo tāva yadā bālavācako, tadā sabbanāmaṃ nāma na hoti. asabbanāmattā ca sabbathāpi ^b^purisa kaññā citta^eb^nayeneva yojetabbo. tathā hi na jānātīti añño, bālo puriso. na jānātīti aññā, bālā itthī. na jānātīti aññaṃ, bālaṃ kulanti vacanattho. evaṃ viditvā pulliṅgaṭṭhāne ``añño, aññā. aññaṃ, aññe''tiādinā ^b^purisa^eb^nayeneva nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne ``aññā, aññā, aññāyo''tiādinā ^b^kaññā^eb^nayeneva, napuṃsakaliṅgaṭṭhāne ``aññaṃ, aññānī''tiādinā ^b^citta^eb^nayeneva yojetabbā.

[03] imasmiñhi atthavisese bālajane vattukāmena ``aññā janā''ti avatvā ``aññe janā''ti vutte tassa taṃ vacanaṃ adhippetatthaṃ na sādheti aññathā atthassa gahetabbattā. tathā ``aññānaṃ janāna''nti avatvā ``aññesaṃ janānaṃ, aññesānaṃ janāna''nti vā vutte tassa taṃ vacanaṃ adhippetatthaṃ na sādheti. tathā ``aññānaṃ itthīna''nti avatvā ``aññāsaṃ itthīna''nti vuttepi, ``aññānaṃ kulāna''nti avatvā ``aññesaṃ kulānaṃ, aññesānaṃ kulāna''nti vā vuttepi. sabbanāmikavasena pana adhigatāparavacanicchāyaṃ ``aññe janā''tiādinā vattabbaṃ, na ``aññā janā''tiādinā. tathā hi ``aññā janā''tiādinā vuttavacanaṃ adhippetatthaṃ na sādheti aññathā atthassa ^a^M0.0360^ea^ gahetabbattā. iti yattha ``aññā janā''tiādivacanaṃ upapajjati, ``aññe janā''tiādivacanaṃ nupapajjati, yattha pana ``aññe janā''tiādivacanaṃ upapajjati, ``aññā janā''tiādivacanaṃ nupapajjati. yā etasmiṃ atthavisese sallakkhaṇā paññā, ayaṃ nītiyā maggo yuttāyuttivicāraṇe hetuttā, lokasmiñhi yuttāyuttivicāraṇā ^b^nītī^eb^ti vuttā. sā ca vinā paññāya na sijjhati. evaṃ ^b^añña^eb^saddo asabbanāmikopi bhavati.

[03] ^b^pubba dakkhiṇuttara para^eb^saddesu ^b^pubba^eb^saddo yattha padhānavācako, yattha ca ``semhaṃ pubbo''tiādīsu lohitakopajavācako, tattha asabbanāmiko. paṭhamatthe tiliṅgo, dutiyatthe ekaliṅgo. uttamatthavācako pana ^b^uttara^eb^saddo ca ^b^para^eb^saddo ca asabbanāmiko tiliṅgoyeva. tathā ``dakkhiṇassā vahantima''nti ettha viya susikkhitatthacaturatthavācako ^b^dakkhiṇa^eb^saddo. ``petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dajjā''tiādīsu pana deyyadhammavācako ^b^dakkhiṇā^eb^saddo niyogā itthiliṅgo asabbanāmikoyeva. evaṃ ^b^añña pubba dakkhiṇuttara para^eb^saddā asabbanāmikāpi santīti tesaṃ sabbanāmesupi asabbanāmesupi saṅgaho veditabbo.

[03] idāni ^b^katara^eb^saddādīnaṃ parapadena saddhiṃ samāso nīyate ``kataragāmavāsī katamagāmavāsī. ubhayagāmavāsino, itaragāmavāsī aññataragāmavāsī, pubbadisā, parajano, dakkhiṇadisā, uttaradisā, adharapatto''ti. tatra ``kataro gāmo kataragāmo, katamo gāmo katamagāmo, ubhayo gāmā ubhayagāmā''tiādinā yathārahaṃ samāsaviggaho, ^b^katara^eb^saddassa pana ^b^katama^eb^saddena saddhiṃ samāsaṃ icchanti dvidhā ca rūpāni garū ``kataro ca katamo ca katarakatame katarakatamā vā''ti ^a^M0.0361^ea^. tasmā sabbanāmikanayena suddhanāmikesu ^b^purisa^eb^nayena ca ^b^katara katama^eb^saddassa nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā, tenassa sampadānasāmivacanaṭṭhānesu ``katarakatamesaṃ, katarakatamesānaṃ, katarakatamāna''nti tīṇi rūpāni siyuṃ ``katarā ca katamā ca katarakatamā''ti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena katasamāse pana sabbanāmikanayena, suddhanāmikesu ^b^kaññā^eb^nayena ca yojetabbā. ``katarañca katamañca katarakatamānī''ti evaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgavasena katasamāse sabbanāmikanayena, suddhanāmikesu ^b^citta^eb^nayena ca yojetabbā.

[03] ayaṃ panettha visesopi veditabbo -- ^b^pubbāparā^eb^disaddā dvandasamāsādividhiṃ patvā sehi rūpehi rūpavanto na honti, taṃ yathā? pubbāparā, adharuttarā, māsapubbā purisā, diṭṭhapubbā purisā, tathāgataṃ diṭṭhapubbā sāvakā, idaṃ pulliṅgatte paṭhamābahuvacanarūpaṃ. e^b^tthe^eb^kāro ādesabhūto na dissati. pubbāparānaṃ adharuttarānaṃ, māsapubbānaṃ purisānaṃ, idaṃ pulliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ bahuvacanarūpaṃ. ettha ^b^saṃ sāna^eb^miccete ādesabhūtā na dissanti. tathāgataṃ diṭṭhapubbānaṃ sāvakānaṃ, tathāgataṃ diṭṭhapubbānaṃ sāvikānaṃ, kulānaṃ vā, idaṃ tiliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ bahuvacanarūpaṃ. etthāpi ^b^saṃ sāna^eb^miccete ādesabhūtā na dissanti. māsapubbāyaṃ māsapubbāya, piyapubbāyaṃ piyapubbāya, idamitthiliṅgatte sattamīcatutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ ekavacanarūpaṃ. etthādesabhūtā ^b^saṃ sā^eb^ na dissanti. māsapubbānaṃ itthīnaṃ, piyapubbānaṃ itthīnaṃ, idamitthiliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhībahuvacanarūpaṃ. ettha panādesabhūto ^b^sa^eb^micceso na dissati. aññānipi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbāni, ^b^pubbāparā^eb^dīnaṃ samāsaviggahaṃ samāsaparicchede pakāsessāma.

[03] yo, ye. yaṃ, ye. yena, yehi, yebhi. yassa, yesaṃ, yesānaṃ. yasmā, yamhā, yehi, yebhi. yassa, yesaṃ, yesānaṃ. yasmiṃ, yamhi, yesu. idaṃ pulliṅgaṃ. yaṃ, yāni. yaṃ, yāni. yena. sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ. atha vā yaṃ, yāni, yā. yaṃ, yāni, ye. yena. sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ. katthaci hi ^b^ni^eb^kāralopo bhavati. atha vā pana ^b^ni^eb^kārassa ^b^ā^eb^kā^b^re^eb^kārādesāpi gāthāvisaye.
[22] nimittāni padissanti, tāni ajja padissare''ti ca,
[03] ``kiṃ māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto hare akkhadhutto''ti ca idamettha pāḷinidassanaṃ. idaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ.

[03] yā, yā, yāyo. yaṃ, yā, yāyo. yāya, yāhi, yābhi. yāya, yassā, yāsaṃ. yāya, yāhi, yābhi. yāya, yassā, yāsaṃ. yassaṃ, yāyaṃ, yāsu. itthiliṅgaṃ. evaṃ ^b^yaṃ^eb^saddassa liṅgattayavasena padamālā bhavati. etthālapanapadāni na labbhanti. tathā ^b^taṃ^eb^saddādīnaṃ padamālādīsupi.

[03] ettha pana ^b^ya^eb^nti saddassa atthuddhāro vuccate -- ^b^ya^eb^nti saddo ``yaṃ me bhante devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ, ārocemi taṃ bhante bhagavato''tiādīsu paccattavacane dissati. ``yantaṃ apucchimha akittayī no, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhī''tiādīsu upayogavacane. ``aṭṭhā nametaṃ bhikkhave anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā''tiādīsu karaṇavacane. ``yaṃ vipassī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ^a^M0.0363^ea^ loke udapādī''tiādīsu bhummavacane dissati. etthedaṃ vuccati --
[21] ``paccatte upayoge ca, bhumme ca karaṇepi ca.

[03] parapadena saddhiṃ ^b^yaṃ^eb^saddassa samāsopi veditabbo ``yaṃkhandhādi, yaṃguṇā, yagguṇā''ti. tattha yo khandhādi ^b^yaṃkhandhādi,^eb^ ye guṇā ^b^yaṃguṇā^eb^ti samāsaviggaho. tathā hi ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ ``yaṃguṇanemittikañcetaṃ nāmaṃ, tesaṃ guṇānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ vadantī''ti etasmiṃ pade ``ye guṇā yaṃguṇā, yaṃguṇā eva nimittaṃ yaṃguṇanimittaṃ, tato jātaṃ `bhagavā'ti idaṃ nāmanti ^b^yaṃguṇanemittika''^eb^nti nibbacanamicchitabbaṃ. ^b^yagguṇā^eb^ti ettha pana ``yassa guṇā yagguṇā''ti nibbacanaṃ. tathā hi --
[22] atha kā tassa vijaññā, taṃ buddhaṃ bhūguṇaṃ name''ti

[03] ettha ca mayaṃ me vo nosaddānamatthuddhāro vuccate -- ^b^te^eb^saddassa pana vuttova. yasmā aṭṭhakathācariyā ^b^mayaṃ^eb^saddaṭṭhānepi ^b^mayā^eb^saddo, ^b^mayā^eb^saddaṭṭhānepi ca ^b^mayaṃ^eb^saddo icceva vadanti, tasmā mayampi tatheva vadāma. ^b^mayaṃ^eb^saddo ``anuññātapaṭiññātā, tevijjāmayamasmubho''tiādīsu asmadatthe āgato ^a^M0.0386^ea^. ``mayaṃ nissāya hemāya, jātā mandosisūpagā''ti ettha paññattiyaṃ. ``manomayā pītibhakkhā sayaṃpabhā''tiādīsu nibbattiatthe. bāhirena paccayena vinā manasāva nibbattāti manomayā. ``yaṃnūnāhaṃ sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ kareyya''ntiādīsu vikāratthe. ``dānamayaṃ sīlamaya''ntiādīsu padapūraṇamatte. ``pīṭhaṃ te sovaṇṇamayaṃ uḷāra''nti ettha vikāratthe padapūraṇamatte vā daṭṭhabbo. yadā hi suvaṇṇameva sovaṇṇanti ayamattho, tadā suvaṇṇassa vikāro sovaṇṇamayanti vikāratthe ^b^maya^eb^saddo daṭṭhabbo. nibbattiatthotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. yadā pana suvaṇṇena nibbattaṃ sovaṇṇanti ayamattho, tadā sovaṇṇameva sovaṇṇamayanti padapūraṇamatte ^b^maya^eb^saddo daṭṭhabbo.
